font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">FOR EXAMPLE IN PERSIA THE GOD AS ASURA MAZDA \u2013&nbsp; &nbsp;PERSIANS\nDON\u2019T UTTER \u201cS\u201d THEY INSTEAD INSERT H<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVER NOTICED THAT CHINESE CANT SAY R\u2014THEY &nbsp;INSERT L.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nWHEN CHINESE &nbsp;SING THE SONG NOORIE\nTHEY SAY--- NOOOLLLIEEE AAJA LEEE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JAPS CANT SAY L \u2013 THEY INSERT R.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;WHEN THEY WANT TO SAY I LOVE YOU\u2014THEY\nSAY I ROVE YOU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Danu\u2019s son is Vritra.&nbsp; The Vltava is the longest river in the Czech\nrepublic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Celt's priestly caste, the Druids\u2014the intellectuals\n, the Danavas, the Aryans<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Druids were not simply priesthood. They\nwere the intellectual caste of ancient Celtic society, incorporating all the\nprofessions: judges, doctors, ambassadors, mathematicians , astronomers, historians\nand so forth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Only Roman and later Christian propaganda\nturned them into \"shamans,\" \"wizards\" and\n\"magicians.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Celtic root dru which means\n\"immersion\" also appears in Sanskrit. So a Druid was one\n\"immersed in knowledge.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Celtic cosmology is a parallel to Vedic cosmology.\nAncient Celtic astrologers used a similar system based on twenty-seven lunar\nmansions, called nakshatras in Vedic Sanskrit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Drp4Zju1bmg/V-jUvJyXvMI/AAAAAAABMH0/8tu_Y_62hgYGyDEpGC14ax-Y7i0tVmLZwCLcB/s1600/imaggts.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Drp4Zju1bmg/V-jUvJyXvMI/AAAAAAABMH0/8tu_Y_62hgYGyDEpGC14ax-Y7i0tVmLZwCLcB/s1600/imaggts.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Even today nobody knows why the British\nStonehenge has 27 portals.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Billions have been spent of research about\nStonehenge\u2014finally it takes a blogger to reveal all this.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5L0JbAP3ae8/V-jUQ8O3fuI/AAAAAAABMHw/tZ4leTqvYfYY3frkC7CmAEmvk1XaEBmgwCLcB/s1600/gods-of-the-tuatha-de-dadnann-4-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5L0JbAP3ae8/V-jUQ8O3fuI/AAAAAAABMHw/tZ4leTqvYfYY3frkC7CmAEmvk1XaEBmgwCLcB/s640/gods-of-the-tuatha-de-dadnann-4-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CHECK OUT THE IRONY-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">JNU COMMIE PROFESSOR ROMILA THAPAR EVEN TODAY\nSTICKS TO HER LYING STORY OF HOW BLUE EYED BLONDE WHITE SKINNED ARYANS INVADED\nINDIA AND WROTE THE VEDAS AFTER INVENTING SANSKRIT<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE TRUTH IS DANAVAS ARE THE ARYANS AND THE\nINDUS VALLEY , HARAPPA , MOHENJODARO , MEHRGARH , SUMERIAN, MESOPOTAMIAN , PAGAN GREEK/ ROMAN, &nbsp;GOBLEKI , EGYPTIAN etc CIVILIZATIONS BELONG TO THE\nDANAVAS .</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/the-yazidis-of-iraq-ethnic-cleansing-by.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/the-yazidis-of-iraq-ethnic-cleansing-by.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>In 4000\nBC when the river Saraswati dried up, the Danavas ( Aryans ) simple came home\nwith the 4 Vedas and 108 Upanishads to Kerala, led by Lord Parashurama.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">&nbsp;The\nDanava civilization is several millenniums older peaking at the time of Maharishi\nShukracharya and King Mahabali</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">King Vrishparva\nof Kerala was a Danava king with great powers and magic. He fought and won many\nwars against Indra with the help of his Maharishi Shukracharya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Indra\u2019s\nwife\u2019s father King Puloman was a Danava. &nbsp;Danava women were very beautiful and chaste.\nIndra killed his own father in law by unfair means.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">King Viprachitti\nwas a Danava king\u2014brother of Puloman. Viprachitti married Holika who was sister\nof Hiranyakashipu . He was one of the 100 sons of Maharishi Kashyapa and Danu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><b>Every vestige of ancient knowledge was DANAVA\nknowledge</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/zAysyeFLTfI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/zAysyeFLTfI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/swastika-symbol-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/swastika-symbol-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Maya Danava who wrote Surya Siddhanta was the\nson of Danava king Vipracitti and Simhika.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Celtic scholar\nPeter Ellis notes, \u201c<i>Irish epic contains many episodes of the struggle between\nthe Children of Domnu, representing darkness and evil, and the Children of\nDanu, representing light and good. Moreover, the Children of Domnu are never\ncompletely overcome or eradicated from the world. Symbolically, they are the\nworld. The conflict is between the \u2018waters of heaven\u2019 and the \u2018world.'\u201d .&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The same thing could be said of the Vedic\nwars of Devas and Danavas or the Puranic/Brahmana wars of Devas and Asuras.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-t0O7Yjcv37k/V-jzAMeTfSI/AAAAAAABMIE/ts62typV3-ID-9XKJ_18hpYmu6g1kpT4wCLcB/s1600/downloafd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I ASK THE IRISH-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-m14o7DrhsrA/V-j0AWGa71I/AAAAAAABMIM/fjhFZMRfQwkGRn4wXHgXusBNyKM75ZH9wCLcB/s1600/st-pattyms-day.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_26.html?showComment=1474882996325#c1681822166668312467\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 26, 2016 at 3:13 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_4MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi h,<br />\n<br />\nAsuras and Devas both trace their lineage back to Rishi Kashyapa - Danavas being the sons of Kashyapa and Danu while Devas being the sons of Kashyapa and Aditi.<br />\n<br />\nIt so happens that the most famous Danava Kings were from Kerala .<br />\n<br />\nShukracharya was the mentor of Danava King Mahabali<br />\n<br />\nDevas were rivals. Brihaspati ( Skukracharya\u2019s classmate ) was mentor of Devas.<br />\n<br />\nThe enmity became deep rooted when Brihaspati\u2019s son Kacha did LOVE JIHAD on Shukrachara\u2019s beautiful daughter Devyani.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_5b+seed59xD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_5b+seed59xD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rig Veda contains\nmany instances where Danu has a positive meaning indicating abundance or even\nstanding for divine in general.&nbsp; &nbsp;Danucitra, meaning the richness of light,\noccurs a few times (RV I.174.7; V.59.8).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Maruts are called Jira-danu or\nplural Jira-danava or quick to give or perhaps fast Danus or fast Gods (RV\nV.54.9).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This term Jiradanu occurs elsewhere as the gift of the Maruts in the\nlast line of most of the hymns of Agastya (RV I.165-169, 171-178, 180-186, 189,\n190). Mitra and Varuna are said to be Sripra-danu or easy to give and their\nmany gifts, danuni, are praised (RV VIII.25.5-6).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Ashvins are called lords\nof Danuna, Danunaspati (RV VIII.8.16). Soma is also called Danuda and\nDanupinva, giving Danu or overflowing with Danu (RV IX.97.23), connecting Danu\nwith water or with rivers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Danava means a serpent</span>\n(RV V.32.1-2), which is not only a symbol of wisdom (<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> evolved with raised kundalini </span>) but of power\nand both Vedic and ancient European lore have their good and bad dragons or\nserpents.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xFSF3WdwSFc/V-j7L9NcBRI/AAAAAAABMIk/KR7wWuY5kykP0v50furokgUkauKBSefQgCLcB/s1600/hqsdefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xFSF3WdwSFc/V-j7L9NcBRI/AAAAAAABMIk/KR7wWuY5kykP0v50furokgUkauKBSefQgCLcB/s320/hqsdefault.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>As per lore, St Patrick drove\nthe serpents out of Ireland , though Ireland does NOT have a single snake.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-12lMWuYQvKE/V-j510mSQ1I/AAAAAAABMIc/ir2blZ0OEFIy3WHFtD9Nc6lm2zR5bXe7QCLcB/s1600/61JW3HFj72HL._SS500_.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-12lMWuYQvKE/V-j510mSQ1I/AAAAAAABMIc/ir2blZ0OEFIy3WHFtD9Nc6lm2zR5bXe7QCLcB/s640/61JW3HFj72HL._SS500_.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Danavas in the\nPuranas (VaP II.7) are the sons of the Rishi Kashyapa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kashyapa is a\nmaharishis connected to the Himalayas. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kashyapa is associated\nwith Kashmir (Kashyapa Mira or Kashyapa\u2019s lake) and other Himalayan regions\n(the Vedic lands of Sharyanavat and Arjika, RV IX.113.1-2), which connects the\nDanavas to the northwest.&nbsp; The Caspian\nSea is named after him .. The Proto-Europeans, therefore, are the sons of&nbsp; Kashyapa and Danu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;\nWe speak of three worlds: devaloka ( world of the celestials ),\nmanusyaloka ( this world of ours), and<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"> naraka ( hell )</span>. The first has nothing\nbut pleasure; in the second it is a mixture of happiness and sorrow; and in the\nthird there is nothing but pain and sorrow.&nbsp;\nAccording to our sastras a man who has committed terrible sins goes\nthrough torments of hell before taking <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">lowly birth </span>again in this world.&nbsp; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">And then I would make him take an oath , invoking his HONOUR..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nthey meet me the first thing they say is they remember my words when I first\nmet them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/06/capt-ajit-vadakayil-pep-talk-to-his.html\" style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/06/capt-ajit-vadakayil-pep-talk-to-his.html</a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When my cadets crossed\nthe equator for the first time &nbsp;I would\nconduct the EQUATOR CROSSING CEREMONY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And then I would say\u2014YOU\nARE NOW SEAMEN NOT MEN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I would give them a\nlovely EQUATOR CROSSING CERTIFICATE which I made myself.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The company would have\na circular , that they considered the ceremony as HAZING/ RAGGING and that it\nis banned under pain of dismissal from the company.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;I never care for this circular\u2014for this certificate\nFORMATTED HIS MIND .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once I was relieved of command\nby one of my cadets\u2014he opened his certificate folder \u2013and on page one was this\nequator crossing certificate\u2014given pride of place even before his certificate\nof competency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/equator-crossing-ceremony-at-sea-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/equator-crossing-ceremony-at-sea-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both my sons and my\nwife got this certificate <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the ceremony I\nwould dare the company to sack me by sending them hajaar photos of the ceremony.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nnever dared -- for even today if any cadet/ officer had sailed with me he\ninvoked a market premium for himself . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The grapevine was \u201cif\nyou sailed with that HARDCORE Captain , you cant be bad \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even foreign nationality\nthree stripers when they do job hunting, they would tell FIRST &nbsp;\u201c I sailed under\nthe command of Capt Vadakayil\u201d and that interview would end right them\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- for it meant he was mentored\n( <span style=\"background-color: orange;\">only animals are trained</span> ) the right way. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was taken for granted --he will NOT let his\nship down--- come what may\u2014though he may be a bit cocky . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_15M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/marine-engineering-self-examiner-ships.html?showComment=1419484706350#c4753192511358900224\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 25, 2014 at 10:48 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_15MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhi bz,</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nthe hindu must stop being SELF LOATHING. after that everything will fall into place.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n3 decades as ship captain- i made sure all were in AWE of India ( not capt ajit vadakayil ).</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">i used to attend GORA job interviews just for the heck of it -- just for kicks&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ni dared them to fail me, because the interview would be a panel - not a single man .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI had ZERO inclination of joining them. for i was the blue eyed boy of my company SCI, i worked in .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nJust one WEE example?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nin 1983 i appeared for a MOBIL interview for ship captain .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nwhy did i choose mobil -- because they had sacked ALL the Indian captains they had chosen till then , for incompetence .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nand i knew they would call me first -- for i had maximum of VLCC experience with COW / IG etc which nobody else had . &nbsp;VLCC is a ship which carries around 300,000 tonnes of crude.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNOW I WILL REVEAL AN INCIDENT WHICH WOULD HAVE GONE INTO MY BOOK \"GAMES CAPTAIN PLAYED \".</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n2 days before the interview with a certain englishman capt sindon ( a hard nut ) at mumbai yacht club, i was sleeping in seaman's club when my batchmate woke me up and told me \" ajit , capt aga senior wants to talk to you. he is waiting for you \".</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt aga senior ( a parsee ) was considered by all the grand old man of indian shipping.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nso i walked down to his chambers just 50 metres away .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAga told me \" son, all the Indian captains whom i have chosen have let me down -- all of them have been sacked , or will be sacked soon for incompetence, could you reverse this trend , or i stand to lose this agency . they will soon stop recruiting Indians \"</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\ni re-assured him \" <span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Sir, Capt Sindon will see me in his worst nightmares </span><span style=\"color: purple;\">!</span></b></span><span style=\"color: purple;\">\"</span></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ni wore a suit for the interview .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ni was the first to be called in, as i predicted .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nthere were 5 men in the panel ,which included capt aga with the GORA Capt Sindon , calling the shots.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nno good mornings from me -- so the red colour sprung on sindon's ears .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\na brown indian must grovel, right ?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhe was rude -</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhe asked me some trick questions whose answers i gave even before he could finish the questions - now his nose too became red .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">some of his questions - i answered with counter questions ( it requires brains to do that ) and now his whole face was red ..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nthen he reminded me brusquely -- that he is supposed to ask the questions in that room.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhe stuck to pure tanker work -- in this area i was the principal of the school where Englishman capt sindon would not even get admission in LKG.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhe asked me about a vent riser fire \u2013</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ni told him a revolutionary concept of cutting off the flame with a flame quencher wire mesh ( available in a store ) -- i used to play in the school lab on the bunsen burner .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhe said -- you cant do it.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ni said-- i can, your opinion is your opinion .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ninfuriated , capt sindon looked on either side and saw the interview panelists ( all wise experienced Indians all over 65 age ) were smirking with capt aga's gargantuan belly jumping like jelly.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhe now turned technical.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhe literally threw the tank profile of a product tanker -- this was supposed to be the failing question -- see i am gonna screw you-- you brown bastard .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ni saw from the corner of my eye that it was the tank profile of a russian product tanker on whose sister ship i had made 37 voyages as a chief officer -- carrying 4 grades of petrol, kerosene, naphtha ,and high speed diesel for IOC.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nif there was an expert on the planet on that sheet of paper it was ME alone .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ni asked him-- name the grades -- he did.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_15BR\" Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/marine-engineering-self-examiner-ships.html?showComment=1419484726581#c3475557689770040377\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 25, 2014 at 10:48 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_14MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\ni filled the sheet from forward part of the ship towards the aft - using only my PERIPHERAL VISION -- all the time eye balling the red faced gora gaand.<br />\n.<br />\ni must admit - it is IMPOSSIBLE to do that-- unless this tank profile was in your subconscious-- and i had not even looked at the sheet.<br />\n<br />\ni filled up the cargo grades and threw the sheet back at him , exactly the way he threw it at me . -- not an iota more - not an iota less.<br />\n<br />\ngora gaand was stunned -- he nearly fell of the chair .<br />\n<br />\nhe asked me what my considerations were - - and i told him - about contamination, the port rotation , max pumping rate -BLAH BLAH .<br />\n<br />\nALL THOSE WHO ARE CURIOUS AS TO WHAT THIS TAKES , WHEN MORE THAN 4 GRADES ARE INVOLVED ON A CHEMICAL TANKER \u2013CHECK OUT THE POST BELOW -<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/stowage-of-multiple-parcels-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nthinking i was lucky he gave me another blank tank profile sheet and gave me a different port rotation with different cargo rotation.<br />\n<br />\nAgain, i filled up the blanks using my peripheral vision , all the time eye balling our red faced gora gaand -- this time in reverse from aft of the ship to forward part <br />\n<br />\nthis is impossible even for an extremely intelligent person - but I had a secret of 37 voyages \u2014why should I tell him that ?<br />\n<br />\nit takes a great deal of perception even to fill up grade wise .<br />\n<br />\nby now the indian panelists were openly smirking PRR BRRR TTRRRRR and making merry-they had sort of thrown caution to the winds .<br />\n<br />\nFU#K YOU CHOOT CAPT SINDON , IS WHAT WENT ON IN THEIR HEARTS .<br />\n<br />\nby now 45 minutes had passed -it was like a exam--and i had come out with flying colours.<br />\n<br />\nhe asked the indian interview panel captains--would you like to ask Capt Ajit something ?<br />\n<br />\nthey aid NOPE -- you have asked him enough !!<br />\n<br />\nhe stuck his hand forwards and cried \" WELCOME TO MOBIL! \"<br />\n<br />\ni ignored his outstretched hand and said -- so far you have asked me all the questions , now it is my turn \u2013<br />\n<br />\nwhat are my terms and conditions ?<br />\n<br />\ngora gaand now nearly got a stroke-- he hissed at the Indians \"have you not told him about this already- what the hell is happening , BLAH BLAH \"<br />\n<br />\ni interjected \" they told me about your mobil logo boiler suit and your safety shoes --that is not what i look for -- what are my terms for wife carriage , i plan to get married soon ?\"<br />\n<br />\nnow he nearly frothed from his mouth , he went back to interview mode .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">he hissed - dont you think wives are a disturbing influence on the ship.</span><br />\n<br />\ni drawled -- not indian wives!<br />\n<br />\nall indians started smirking again--PRR TTEE BRRR TSSS!<br />\n<br />\nthen he asked - if your second mate's wife has an affair with the mate , what action?<br />\n<br />\ni lisped- as far as i know my second mate and mate will be indian -- so i will NOT have this problem- that is the answer .<br />\n<br />\nhe started off- i cut him out\u2014<br />\nmy doorway is small and it cannot let in an elephant, why take questions of an elephant in my room .<br />\n<br />\nthen he says --when do you plan to join?<br />\n<br />\ni said - after 2 months , after marrying and a nice honeymoon.<br />\n<br />\nhe angrily says --in this form you filled and signed --there is no indication of a 2 month delay.<br />\n<br />\ni said-- that sentiment was at that time --check out the date i filled it up.<br />\n<br />\nSince that date , i have changed mE mind - I am a flexible guy<br />\n<br />\nthen he says - your previous employers have been very kind to you-- they have given you a huge super tanker as your first command - why kick them in the teeth ?<br />\n<br />\ni said- that is a secret which i dont want to tell you !<br />\n<br />\nsindon paaji tells me -- you have accumulated long leave -- i suggest you dont resign from SCI, do a contract with us and then resign .<br />\n<br />\nA VEILED THREAT - TEEEE HEEEEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_15b+seedJqBWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_15b+seedJqBWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8949131394393473867\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_155M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/10722600136791602285\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">C.K. Vignesh</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html?showComment=1475056057589#c8949131394393473867\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 28, 2016 at 3:17 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_155MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nRespected Captain,<br />\n<br />\nThere was this old Bus Operator in Calicut called CCNKP (forgive me if the name is wrong).<br />\nIt is defunct now.<br />\n<br />\nI wanted to ask you if you know about their Manager-- Krishnan, who hailed Meenchantha.<br />\nSometimes your father maybe knowing him because he was active in the Jansangh and RSS.<br />\n<br />\nBut, he died early - 40 years ago. He happens to be my relative and I did hear from people close to him about staying in boats in the Arabian see, to escape arrests.</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THIS IS MY DAD AT THE AGE OF 72. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">NOT A LINE ON HIS FACE. &nbsp; &nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">A MAN OF GREAT CHARACTER , WHO REFUSED TAMRA PATRA / FREEDOM FIGHTERs PENSION &nbsp;WHEN ALL OTHERS GRABBED IT . &nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE DEEP TWO HOLES ON HIS FOREHEAD , HE GOT WHILE HIDING FOR 3 DAYS IN THE ARABIAN SEA. &nbsp; LOST LOT OF BLOOD &nbsp;AND WAS UNCONSCIOUS . .</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE BOATS WERE TIED TOGETHER AND IN ROUGH WEATHER THE COIR ROPES BROKE AND ALL BOATS CAPSIZED &nbsp;. .&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">NATURAM GODSE WAS NOT PART OF RSS . &nbsp; &nbsp; YET THE POLICE CAME TO ARREST ALL RSS MEMBERS .&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BEFORE THIS INCIDENT &nbsp;HE WORE PANTS AND SHOES -- AFTER THAT ONLY &nbsp;WHITE SHIRT AND WHITE DHOTI &nbsp;... &nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">I GUESS THIS WAS A<span style=\"color: red;\"> RUBICON LINE</span> IN HIS LIFE. &nbsp;</b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; . .</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/vzepWtjnfwI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/vzepWtjnfwI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/WiYscnj_L7A/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/WiYscnj_L7A?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6163084907921727430\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_230M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_26.html?showComment=1475144192629#c6163084907921727430\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 29, 2016 at 3:46 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_230MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nROTHSCHILDs RESIDENT REPRESENTATIVE AT MAHARAJA RANJITH SINGHs COURT DID THE LOGISTICS FOR THE SATI CEREMONY AFTER HIS DEATH .. TO ESTABLISH THAT SATI IS AN ANCIENT CUSTOM ..<br />\n<br />\nHere is the British account of Maharaja Ranjit Singh\u2019s last journey--<br />\n<br />\nWhen Ranjit Singh died, his body was bathed with fragrant waters, embalmed and then dressed in rich clothes and decorated with ornaments as when he was alive. The sacred Bhagwad Gita was placed on the Maharaja\u2019s chest and, Dhian Singh, having touched the body of his royal master and the book, swore loyalty to the new Maharaja Kharak Singh.<br />\n<br />\nThe Maharaja\u2019s body was placed on a decorated pier (Hawan) shaped like a ship. As the funeral procession advanced, large amount of coins were thrown amongst the crowd as alms.<br />\n<br />\nFor the first time in their lives, the Ranis of the Great Maharaja came out unveiled from the harem and followed the corpse bare-footed. They were dressed in pure, white silk and wore no ornaments. They had distributed all their jewels and valuables among the poor before leaving the Zenana for the final Sati.<br />\n<br />\nIn front of each Rani, at a distance of two or three paces, a man with his face turned towards her walked backwards. He held a looking glass before the Rani in front of whom he walked that she might see that her facial features were composed and unaltered-- that her resolution to sacrifice her life had no effect on her outer appearance.<br />\n<br />\nThe funeral pyre was constructed of sandalwood in the form of a square, six feet high and upon it were strewn inflammable substances such as cottonseeds etc. The bier, having been brought close to it, its valuable ornaments and coverings were given away to the people. The Brahmins and Gurus then recited passages from their holy books and offered prayers. This took about half an hour.<br />\n<br />\nThe ascent to the funeral pyre was by a ladder. The ministers and Sardars first ascended and helped in gently removing the royal body from the bier and placing it on the pyre. The four Ranis, with death-despising intrepidity, then ascended the fatal ladders one by one, according to their rank and solemnly occupied a place at the head of their royal husband, holding the head with their hands.<br />\n<br />\nThe Rajput princess of Kangra Guddan had his head on her lap . The 7 beautiful slave girls, with equal courage and contempt for death, then ascended the ladder and placed themselves at the foot of their lord.<br />\n<br />\nThe sathis having thus seated themselves were covered with red mats, on which oil had been profusely poured. Raja Dhian Singh at this moment approached the Ranis and begged them to offer prayers for the prosperity of the new Maharaja, but not a word was uttered by the Ranis, who with eyes closed and hand stretched towards the head of the Maharaja, which they were holding, maintained a solemn silence in expectation of the final moment.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_230BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_230b+seedDmD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_231T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_230b+seedDmD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_231TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_231TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_231TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_230b+seedDmD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_231TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_231TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_230b+seedDmD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_231TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_231TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_231TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\" unselectable=\"on\"><div style=\"zoom: 1;\" unselectable=\"on\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_230b+seedDmD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_231B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_230b+seedDmD\" kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3087810895463970071\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_231M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_26.html?showComment=1475144221118#c3087810895463970071\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 29, 2016 at 3:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_231MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nA strong, thick mat of reeds was then brought and saturated with oil with which all were covered. The Minister, Raja Dhian Singh and the Sardars then came down. Then Dhian Singh suddenly lost his composure and overwhelmed with grief , insisting on being burnt with the Ranis. Thrice, he even attempted to force his way forward and it was with difficulty, that he was physically prevented from sharing the fate of the sathis. For the new king Karakh Singh was a dull witted person.<br />\n<br />\nOil, atta and ghee were then profusely thrown on the pile. This being done, Prince Kharak Singh lit the pyre at each corner. In almost the twinkling of an eye, the unfortunate creatures who had been covered with the mats had ceased to exist and in a short time the whole mass was reduced to ashes.<br />\n<br />\nOn the third day, the ashes of the dead were picked out by the members of the family and put in separate urns and, placed in separate tents made of Kashmiri shawls, the poles of which were wrought with gold and silver. Preparations were then made to send the ashes to the Ganga.<br />\n<br />\nThe remains of the Maharaja and those of the Ranis, were placed in separate, richly caparisoned palanquins and brought out, in state, from the Fort. They were accompanied by costly presents such as valuable shawls, richly decorated elephants and horses, gold and silver utensils, rich cloth etc., which were to be distributed as alms among the Brahmins at Hardwar. On the procession leaving the Fort, a royal salute was fired.<br />\n<br />\nThe procession traversed the principal bazaars and streets; housetops, windows and balconies were all filled with spectators. The door of the palanquin that contained the ashes of the Maharaja was open; those of the other four containing the remains of the Ranis were closed.<br />\n<br />\nMourning was observed for thirteen days, the mourning costume being white. On the thirteenth day, the last funeral obsequies were gone through and thousands of rupees lavished on Brahmins and fakirs.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</span></li>\n<span id=\"bc_0_230b+seedDmD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_230b+seedDmD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_230b+seedDmD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_230b+seedDmD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_37B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2445162746085141098\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_37M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/09873070011027410061\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Shouri Suman</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_26.html?showComment=1475016154108#c2445162746085141098\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 28, 2016 at 4:12 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_37MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nYou did not answer my question about living in a society but not fronting up to defend it and die and kill. ONLY I CAN REVEAL ALL THIS. <br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />TODAY ALMOST ALL HINDU INTERNET SITES ARE RUN BY ANTI-HINDU CHARACTERS --MOST CONTROLLED FROM ABROAD .</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ALMOST ALL HINDU GURUS TODAY ARE FAKE -- ROGUES IN THE PAYROLL OF ANTI-HINDU WHITE MEN .</span></b><br />\n<br />\nOUR OWN PM MODI, EXTOLS THE VIRTUES OF ROTHSCHILD FAKE AND BACK DATED CREATIONS AND MUTTS<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WROTE MY POST ABOUT THE FAKE KANCHI MUTT, MANY TAMILIAN BRAHMINS HAS ATTACKED ME.<br />\n<br />\nTODAY THEY HAVE ALL BECOME QUIET-- THE EVIDENCE I GAVE IS SO OVERWHELMING<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Wikipedia has quietly\ndeleted the LYING episode of Adi Shankaracharya cutting his mother\u2019s dead body\ninto several pieces before cremation.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.kamakoti.org/hindudharma/part16/chap7.htm\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.kamakoti.org/hindudharma/part16/chap7.htm</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; The sannyasin has no sacrament involving the\nsacred fire: he has the fire of knowledge (jnanagni)in him. His body is not\ncremated - that is there is no Agni-samskara for it- but interred as a matter\nof respect. Strictly speaking, it<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> must be cut into four parts</span> and consigned to\nthe four quarters of a forest. There it will be food for birds and beasts. In\nan inhabited place the severed parts of the body would cause inconvenience to\npeople. That is why they were thrown into the forest. There it would be food\nfor its denizens; if buried it would be manure for the plants. Now over the\nsite of the interment of a sannyasin's body a Brindavana is grown [or built] :\nthis again is done out of respect. At such sites all that is to be done is to\nplant a bilva or asvattha tree. : UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The man who wrote the\nMINDLESS LIES above is Chandrashekharenda Saraswati Swami, the acharya of\nRothschild\u2019s fake and backdated Kanchi Mutt ( 68<sup>th</sup> Jagadguru ). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>He was tom tommed by Rothschild\u2019s historians\nas <span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">the greatest expert </span>on Sanatana Dharma.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chandrashekarendra_Saraswati\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chandrashekarendra_Saraswati</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a Hindu site\u2019s\npropaganda&nbsp; ..&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE \u201c Sankara\nencountered serious difficulties in performing the funeral rites of his mother.\nUsually, Sannyasins do not perform any of the rites or ceremonies which are\nenjoined on the householders. The Nambudiri Brahmins were all against Sankara.\nSankara's relatives also did not help him. They did not come forward to assist\nhim even in carrying the dead body to the place of cremation and refused to\ngive fire for igniting the funeral pyre. At last Sankara determined to perform\nthe funeral rites all alone. As he could not carry the entire dead body, <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">he cut\nit into pieces</span> and removed the pieces one by one to the backyard of the house.\nHe then made a pyre there of stems of plantain trees and set fire to it by his\nYogic power. Sankara wanted to teach the Nambudiris a lesson. He then made the\nlocal chief issue an edict that a corner should be set apart in each Illam or\nhouse of the Nambudiri Brahmins to burn the dead of the family and that they should\ncut the dead body into parts and then burn the same. This practice continues\neven today amongst Nambudiri Brahmins.UNQUOTE</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.hindupedia.com/en/Adi_Shankaracharya\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.hindupedia.com/en/Adi_Shankaracharya</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8645140081033187622\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_22M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_20.html?showComment=1474380386534#c8645140081033187622\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 20, 2016 at 7:36 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSomebody asked me about burial of Jivan Mukhts being BURIED .<br />\n<br />\nSORRY\u2014<br />\n<br />\nWE NEVER BURIED OUR JIVAN MUKHTS UNDER THE GROUND .<br />\n<br />\nWE INTERNED THEM ABOVE THE GROUND IN A MUNIYARA ( WE CALL DOLMENS MUNIYARAS ).<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WERE INTERNED IN YOGA NIDRA POSITON .<br />\n<br />\nMuniyaras are dolmens ( burial chambers ) made of four stones placed on edge and covered by a fifth stone called the cap stone<br />\n<br />\nWhen the white invader came to India we had more than 5000 muniyaras in Kerala alone \u2013 all of them on mountain tops of Western Ghats. Today there are just 400 muniyaras in Kerala\u2014ones which were NOT noticed by the white invader.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">https://www.tripadvisor.in/Attraction_Review-g303881-d1371324-Reviews-Muniyara_Dolmens-Munnar_Idukki_District_Kerala.html#photos;geo=303881&amp;detail=1371324</span><br />\n<br />\nThe white BASTARDS took away these huge slabs of granite by breaking them into pieces. This was an EXTREME form of cultural terrorism, because Europe , Russia , Korea, and the world over were full of Dolmens\u2014of Druids ( ancient Hindu sages )<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ancients-bg.com/dolmens-menhirs-cromlechs-the-magical-stones/</span><br />\n<br />\nBefore 7000 BC, india ruled the whole world ,and there was only ONE religion<br />\n<br />\nHINDUS NEVER EVER BURIED ANYBODY INDER THE GROUND\u2014VEERASHAIVA LINGAYATHS ( CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ) PLEASE NOTE<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; Looks like you have barked up the wrong tree. I am not a Tambram but I guess everyone has their bad days.</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_7BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_6T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_7b+seedFRXHD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_6TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_7b+seedFRXHD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_6TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_7b+seedFRXHD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_6B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4212070533048056098\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_6M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt.
