, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">QUOTE:--\n&nbsp;Buddhism and Jainism impose total non-\nviolence on their followers. Not so our religion except in the case of\nascetics. In Hinduism an exception to the general dharma of non-violence is\nmade in the case of a righteous or just war and in a sacrifice in which\nsometimes animals are killed. &nbsp; <span style=\"color: blue;\">It is to fetch the divine powers to earth and to\nappease them that animals are sacrificed in yajnas. &nbsp;It is our belief that the\nanimals so sacrificed will attain to a high state that they cannot otherwise\nthrough their own efforts. &nbsp; Altogether it means the good of the animals and the\nwelfare of the world.</span> UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px;\">Sorry, Buddhists all over the planet and in India eat meat . &nbsp;Unlike Jainism, vegetarianism was NEVER propagated by Buddha. &nbsp; They ate PIG --when in India nobody else did so. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px;\">The Dalai Lama eats BEEF and PORK openly--on advise of his doctors ( sic ). &nbsp; Hey Pujaniya His Highness Dalai Lama did you doctor also tell you to wear gold Rolex watched ?.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">TO\nTHIS I HAVE ONLY ONE THING TO SAY- &nbsp; WHY WASTE WORDS ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Pujaniya Jagadguru His Highness Chandrasekharendra &nbsp;Saraswati &nbsp;Swamigal&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">QUOTE:--\n&nbsp;God has given man the gift of speech so\nthat he may give expression to his thoughts and feelings. If what we speak is\nat variance with what we think (with our mind) God will take away the faculty\nof speech from us in our next birth- that is we will be born in the animal\nkingdom. UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is BULL by JPCSS \u2013\nPage 705<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; God has given man the gift of speech so that\nhe may give expression to his thoughts and feelings. If what we speak is at\nvariance with what we think (with our mind) God will take away the faculty of\nspeech from us in our next birth- that is we will be born in the animal\nkingdom. :UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE: Language of the Vedas is NOT Sanskrit.\n&nbsp;It is possible to be a ASTIKA even\nwithout believing in God. An ASTIKA is one who has faith in the Vedas . &nbsp;The Vedas do NOT speak of one god .&nbsp; They speak of many gods who are like humans.\nUNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; IMMEDIATELY YOUR BODY EMANATES SCALAR WAVES FASTER THAN LIGHT<br />\n<br />\nCHINESE ARE MAKING QUANTUM COMPUTERS BASED ON \"QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT \" -WHICH IS FASTER THAN LIGHT. YET WE TEACH OUR SCHOOL CHILDREN THAT FASTER THAN LIGHT COMMUNICATIONS ARE IMPOSSIBE<br />\n<br />\nLIGHT FROM QUASARS TRAVEL FASTER THAN LIGHT-- OUR GAYATRI MANTRA -BEING GRATEFUL TO OUR MOTHER WHICH PROVIDES LIGHT<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html<br />\n<br />\nAAJ KELIYE ITNA COFFEE-- NAY-- KAAFI<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IN NOW CONTINUED TO PART 67, BELOW--</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_26.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_26.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lTQ3IIPiK08/V-TNEq6YcvI/AAAAAAABMCs/Um1r8WyTEj8qQGWvQT59fGE7JqBr_XOcwCLcB/s1600/BBBBB1TBB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lTQ3IIPiK08/V-TNEq6YcvI/AAAAAAABMCs/Um1r8WyTEj8qQGWvQT59fGE7JqBr_XOcwCLcB/s640/BBBBB1TBB.jpg\" width=\"308\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "227", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6990161751628159875/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "8217034722958014676", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2016-09-22T14:49:00+05:30", "updated": "2016-09-23T01:25:41+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDc0NTc0MTQxNjEwCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/pandas-pediatric-autoimmune.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8217034722958014676", "title": "PANDAS,  Pediatric Autoimmune Neuropsychiatric Disorders Associated with Streptococcal Infections. - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1918377790751822143\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration: none;\">September 22, 2016 at 2:08 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_331MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCapt.,<br />\nWhat you say about PANDAS - Pediatric autoimmune neuropsychiatric disorders associated with streptococcal infections.<br />\nAny treatment suggestions please.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_331BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_332T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_332TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\" unselectable=\"on\"><div style=\"zoom: 1;\" unselectable=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_332B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_331b+seedFLD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6660785889567542304\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_332M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/01/effective-parenting-indian-way-capt.html?showComment=1474535771468#c6660785889567542304\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 22, 2016 at 2:46 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_332MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nsince the past ten years PANDAS has invaded india<br />\n<br />\npeople must know how the BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER is being breached.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/interstitial-lung-disease-nano-carbon.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/asd-atrial-septal-defect-hole-in-heart.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n</div>\n</span></li>\n<span id=\"bc_0_331b+seedFLD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_331b+seedFLD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_331b+seedFLD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_331b+seedFLD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>PANDAS REQUIRE THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER TO BE\nBREACHED.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">GOD HAS MADE THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER\nUNBREACHABLE .</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5Rz_VaUS4tM/V-OkdCx3FgI/AAAAAAABMBU/E-oK4N-p_V8iDhMHyD8HUoNNQcZPJlXiQCLcB/s1600/Cobblestone-ThrSoat-5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"372\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5Rz_VaUS4tM/V-OkdCx3FgI/AAAAAAABMBU/E-oK4N-p_V8iDhMHyD8HUoNNQcZPJlXiQCLcB/s400/Cobblestone-ThrSoat-5.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some children with\nPANDAS become hyperactive and then it can look like ADHD. &nbsp;&nbsp;Ignorant QUOTA/ DONATION PARTY doctors have\nmade huge mistakes. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What distinguishes\nPANDAS from autism symptoms or classic OCD is the sudden onset of symptoms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Importantly, these\nsymptoms are often accompanied by some tell-tale symptoms not usually seen with\nclassic OCD. &nbsp; These include sleep difficulties, loss of bladder control,\nbehavioral regression and loss of appetite.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many children with\nPANDAS also develop odd movements (e.g. tics), become irritable and moody or\nbecome noticeably more sensitive to loud noises or other stimuli.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/XtFlvS8NNGg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/XtFlvS8NNGg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PANDAS&nbsp; creates inflammation in a child\u2019s brain.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The child then QUICKLY repeat QUICKLY begins\nto exhibit life-changing symptoms such as OCD [obsessive-compulsive disorder],\nanxiety, <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>tics</b></span>, personality changes, decline in math and handwriting abilities,\nsensory sensitivities, restrictive eating and more<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/OrhuW-TBFXg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/OrhuW-TBFXg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The child suddenly\nexhibits irrational fears, separation anxiety, OCD symptoms such as incessant\nquestions regarding the size of things and hoarding of objects such as sticks\nand coins, arm-flapping, eyeblinking and emotional liability. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Considering India never\nhad this problem before, we can safely assume that this bacteria has been\nintroduced to India DELIBERATELY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/y_G2bOMsgNs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/y_G2bOMsgNs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The strep bacteria\nsurvives in its human host by hiding from the immune system as long as\npossible. It does this by putting molecules on its cell wall that look nearly\nidentical to molecules found on the child\u2019s heart, joints, skin, and brain\ntissues. This is called \u201cmolecular mimicry\u201d and allows the strep bacteria to\nevade detection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the molecules\non the strep bacteria are eventually recognized as foreign to the body and the\nchild\u2019s immune system reacts to them by producing antibodies. Because of the\nmolecular mimicry, the antibodies react not only with the strep molecules, but\nalso with the human host molecules that were mimicked.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cross-reactive\nantibodies then trigger an immune reaction that \u201cattacks\u201d the mimicked\nmolecules in the child\u2019s own tissues. some cross-reactive \u201canti-brain\u201d\nantibodies target the brain, causing OCD, tics, and the other neuropsychiatric\nsymptoms of PANDAS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PANDAS is considered a\npediatric disorder and typically first appears in childhood from age 3 to\npuberty.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain is being\ncontinuously damaged by the repeated attacks by streptococcus antibodies; and\nafter each attack the recovery of damaged brain tissues may not be as complete\nas we would hope. Eventually the child may develop a chronic psychiatric\ndisorder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Streptococci are\ndivided into two key groups:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">alpha-haemolytic \u2013 made\nup of two groups, including Streptococcus pneumoniae<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">beta-haemolytic \u2013 made\nup of several groups, including Group A and Group B streptococci<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bacteria associated\nwith PANDAS are known as Group A Beta-Haemolytic Streptococcus (GABHS).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PANDAS will not develop\nin every child with a strep infection.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">By definition, PANDAS\nis a paediatric disorder</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The diagnosis of PANDAS\nis a clinical diagnosis, which means that there are no lab tests that can\ndiagnose PANDAS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doctors order a special\nblood test that looks for Streptococcus antibodies (Serology for ASOT and\nAntiDNAseB).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An elevated anti-strep.\ntiter (such as an ASOT or an AntiDNAse-B) means the child has had a strep\ninfection sometime within the past few months, and his body created antibodies\nto fight the streptococcus bacteria<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Penicillin and other\nantibiotics kill streptococcus and other types of bactera.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The antibiotics treat the sore throat or\npharyngitis caused by the strep. by getting rid of the bacteria.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">However, in PANDAS, it the antibodies are\nproduced by the body in response to the strep.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Infection is the cause of the problem, not the bacteria\nthemselves.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Therefore one cannot expect antibiotics such as penicillin to treat the symptoms of PANDAS.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Western\ndoctors wont understand this wisdom as the goal of western medicines is to\nsuppress symptoms.</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The current standard Western treatment for acute episodes of PANDAS is to treat the strep infection causing\nthe symptoms (if it is still present) with antibiotics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A throat culture should\nbe done to document the presence of strep bacteria in the throat (oropharynx).\nIf the throat culture is positive, a single course of antibiotics will usually\nget rid of the strep infection and allows the PANDAS symptoms to subside.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PANDAS is in part\ncaused by an autoimmune response to a strep infection.&nbsp; Streptococcus is known to be associated with\na number of immune-related disorders, including rheumatic fever, scarlet fever,\nand acute glomerulonephritis (a kidney disorder).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The strep molecules are known\nto hide from the host immune system by mimicking host cells. Ultimately, the\nimmune system recognizes the foreign cells, and the antibodies produced attack\nthe bacterium, and unfortunately, some of the host's own cells are attacked as\nwell due to cross-reactivity.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>In some\nsituations, these antibodies attack brain cells, causing OCD, tics, and the\nother symptoms frequently observed in PANDAS patients.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PANDAS symptoms are\nsimilar to those of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), attention deficit\nhyperactivity disorder (ADHD), and motor or verbal tics.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other symptoms include separation anxiety\n(the child has difficulty separating from the parent), mood changes, changes in\nhandwriting, bedwetting or change in urinary frequency, and sleep disturbances.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Symptoms tend to appear suddenly, and the recovery period is variable. Often\nthe symptoms may worsen during streptococcal infections and improve in between.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doctors may prescribe\npenicillin, amoxicillin or some other antibiotic. For severe and refractory symptoms, the use of other treatments\naimed at controlling the immune response have been studied and found to be\neffective. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These include the use\nof intravenous immunoglobulin, steroids, and plasmapheresis (plasma exchange\ntherapy, in which blood is withdrawn from an individual and the liquid portion\nis removed and replaced and the blood is transfused back into the individual). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For both treatments,\nthe \"offending\" antibodies are removed. Steroids are less effective,\nbecause, although symptoms decrease during the treatment, they return soon\nafter stopping the drug.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Surgical removal of the\ntonsils and adenoids has not shown to be effective in preventing PANDAS and is\nthus not recommended. Group B strep (strep B) usually live harmlessly inside\nthe digestive system and in the vagina.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strep B can sometimes\ncause urinary tract infections (UTIs), skin infections, bone infections, blood\ninfections and pneumonia, particularly in vulnerable people, such as the\nelderly and those with diabetes.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WOMEN SCRATCH THEIR\nTWATS AND THEN HANDLE THE BABY WITHOUT WASHING HANDS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It's estimated around\none in every four pregnant western women have strep B bacteria in their vagina\nor digestive system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bacteria can\nsometimes be passed on to the baby through the amniotic fluid (a clear liquid\nthat surrounds and protects the unborn baby in the womb) or as the baby passes\nthrough the birth canal during labour.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most babies exposed to\nstrep B will be unaffected, but some can become infected. In some cases, a baby\ncan pick up a strep B infection a few weeks or months after birth.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your baby develops\nsymptoms of a strep B infection after they're born, they will have tests to\nconfirm the diagnosis and will be given intravenous antibiotics as soon as\npossible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most babies who become\ninfected can be treated successfully and will make a full recovery, although\nthere is chance they could die as a result of complications such as\nmeningitis.&nbsp; Some babies who survive are\nleft with permanent problems, such as hearing loss, vision loss, and problems\nwith memory and concentration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your doctor will\nconduct a physical exam, look for signs and symptoms of strep throat, and\nprobably order one or more of such tests:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rapid antigen test.\nYour doctor will likely first perform a rapid antigen test on a swab sample\nfrom your throat. This test can detect strep bacteria in minutes by looking for\nsubstances (antigens) in the throat. If the test is negative but your doctor\nstill suspects strep, he or she might do a throat culture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Throat culture. A\nsterile swab is rubbed over the back of the throat and tonsils to get a sample\nof the secretions. It's not painful, but it may cause gagging. The sample is\nthen cultured in a laboratory for the presence of bacteria, but results can\ntake as long as two days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PANDAS is both\nneuropsychiatric and autoimmune. It can be treated and often cured, but far too\nfew children ever get the right diagnosis<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first symptom is\nalways OCD or tics, or both. It will typically have a VERY SUDDEN on-set. The\nnext symptom is usually separation anxiety, within a few days from the first\nsymptom. The anxiety can be so severe that children cannot go anywhere without\ntheir parent in sight.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes this is\nanxiety about change in the home or a general anxiety about almost everything.\nThereafter, symptoms may vary, but will often be such as sensory processing\nissues, and even paranoia and hallucinations in some cases. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These children also\noften have urinary urges, increased urinary frequency, including bed-wetting,\nsome complain about pain, often in joints. Almost all of them will, during the\nacute phase have an impairment of fine motor skills which affects their ability\nto write and draw. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Difficulties with\nmathematics are also very common, and so are attention problems, some will be\nhyperactive and have rages, when they often look terror-stricken. Some children\nexperience sleep disturbances. Developmental regression, including \u201cbaby-talk\u201d\nis also common.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Streptococci are real\nsurvivors, they have the ability to escape the immune system by adding a\nmolecule on their cell wall that resembles molecules in the body tissue. When\nautoimmune, the body discovered the infection, attacks it, but also attacks the\nbody's own molecules the streptococci imitated.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a disease called rheumatic\nfever, which is also caused by streptococci, the heart may be affected because\nthe strep mimicked heart molecules, but in PANDAS the microbe have mimicked\ntissue found in the Basal Ganglia which is now attacked by antibodies from the\nchild\u2019s own immune system.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dYw-WUMcryo/V-PWAF_lkUI/AAAAAAABMBk/x6I6eA5JidcbU2VFPzGj1M8sAb3mI5qZQCLcB/s1600/basal-ganglia-clinical-angatomy-physiology-1-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dYw-WUMcryo/V-PWAF_lkUI/AAAAAAABMBk/x6I6eA5JidcbU2VFPzGj1M8sAb3mI5qZQCLcB/s640/basal-ganglia-clinical-angatomy-physiology-1-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PANDAS may involve\nstrep antibodies interacting with the part of the brain known as the basal\nganglia. This is what causes the sudden onset of tics or obsessive compulsive\nbehaviors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The good news is that\nPANDAS tends to resolve on its own once the strep infection is treated with\nappropriate antibiotics. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Sterilize or replace\ntoothbrushes during/following the antibiotics treatment, to make sure that the\nchild isn\u2019t re-infected with strep.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doctors are currently\nexploring how to treat PANDAS that persists beyond the active strep infection..\nThey&nbsp; are looking at anti-inflammatory\nmedicines. More aggressive treatments such as plasma exchange and\nimmunoglobulin (IVIG) have been effective in treating severe, strep-triggered\nOCD and tics. But these treatments come with serious side effects.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span>\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IVIG, is intravenous\nimmunoglobulin. This is produced by plasma from blood donors and that is\nlargely made up of the body's most common antibody. The treatment can block the\nantibodies which turned against the body and it can affect the immune system's\nlymphocytes producing harmful antibodies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are some modern\nresearchers who recommend categorizing PANDAS as a subset of other disorders,\nwhich includes similar neuropsychiatric symptoms called CANS (childhood acute\nneuropsychiatric symptoms) or PANS (pediatric acute-onset neuropsychiatric syndrome).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Amit Shah is already shacked up at <span style=\"color: red;\">KADAVU RESORT </span>( the No 1 on this planet ) awaiting PM Modi. &nbsp;This Chaliyar river side resort is just 5 km of my home.</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/NWn5bJSzrak/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/NWn5bJSzrak?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zg_A46vOFFk/V-QYSgJTq1I/AAAAAAABMB0/y2cN7VgnNuosKza3235jJ7weei-YCcL5ACLcB/s1600/Kadavu_4ExteriorViewfromnnChaliyarRiverBridge.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VK_ZtQY0tJQ/V-QYiqdFasI/AAAAAAABMB4/R2g0ZQ7A7poRLoEvN9KSdPnyXX80ppY6wCLcB/s1600/43732_r080913000100154882_STD.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"301\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VK_ZtQY0tJQ/V-QYiqdFasI/AAAAAAABMB4/R2g0ZQ7A7poRLoEvN9KSdPnyXX80ppY6wCLcB/s400/43732_r080913000100154882_STD.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-grQA7eMApQ4/V-QYvFDf_UI/AAAAAAABMB8/ezyTWfwadloXULbbTBWOYpHBEV-7zZ7ywCLcB/s1600/habcfitat.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"396\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-grQA7eMApQ4/V-QYvFDf_UI/AAAAAAABMB8/ezyTWfwadloXULbbTBWOYpHBEV-7zZ7ywCLcB/s640/habcfitat.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KRB2o6Oz7_E/V-QY-V-7XVI/AAAAAAABMCA/wBtRc91W-EUUHVAs919DePoGdwkKzco4gCLcB/s1600/kadavu-resort-ayurvedfda.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">karma phalaapekshaahi naaha,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">dharme nishtha karma mukhena (2)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
