, serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3iUaYzqnI/AAAAAAAABh8/ixpvmFTjGjA/s1600/images+%284%29.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_147\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1171\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3iUaYzqnI/AAAAAAAABh8/ixpvmFTjGjA/s1600/images+%25284%2529.jpg\"\n href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3iUaYzqnI/AAAAAAAABh8/ixpvmFTjGjA/s1600/images+%284%29.jpg\"\n style='width:139.5pt;height:203.25pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image014.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"images+%25284%2529\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3iUaYzqnI/AAAAAAAABh8/ixpvmFTjGjA/s1600/images+%25284%2529.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"271\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image014.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_147\" width=\"186\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">This drove all of them\naway from Goa, leaving the land behind. &nbsp;Some of them unwillingly\nconverted into Christianity.<br />\n<br />\nIt was NOT religious hatred alone, the main reason was to steal as many ancient\nSanskrit and Malayalam Vedic texts on Science, Medicine and Mathematics. It is\nfrom Xavier that Europe came to know about medicinal leech vaccination ( among\nother things )&nbsp;, and later Freemason Edward Jenner made a name for\nhimself. The ancient Maharishis from Kerala, like Imhotep, &nbsp;has been\nvaccinating the Pharaohs of Egypt, 6500 years before Edward Jenner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">The masses were\nconverted into Christianity, saddled with Portuguese surnames , given menial\njobs, made to eat Beef and Pork and drink cheap Feni ( a local brew made of\nCashew and Coconut ). This easy inebriated life destroyed their mindset and\ntill today no Catholic Goan boy has passed the IIT entrance exam. ( ala the Red\nIndians of North America and the Aborigines of Australia )&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3ijcMBkVI/AAAAAAAABiA/_AG5ABh7Svw/s1600/images+%285%29.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_146\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1170\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3ijcMBkVI/AAAAAAAABiA/_AG5ABh7Svw/s1600/images+%25285%2529.jpg\"\n href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3ijcMBkVI/AAAAAAAABiA/_AG5ABh7Svw/s1600/images+%285%29.jpg\"\n style='width:167.25pt;height:169.5pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image015.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"images+%25285%2529\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3ijcMBkVI/AAAAAAAABiA/_AG5ABh7Svw/s1600/images+%25285%2529.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"226\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image015.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_146\" width=\"223\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3hkW6dEPI/AAAAAAAABh0/gi6-b6uxV2g/s1600/images+%282%29.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_145\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1169\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3hkW6dEPI/AAAAAAAABh0/gi6-b6uxV2g/s1600/images+%25282%2529.jpg\"\n href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3hkW6dEPI/AAAAAAAABh0/gi6-b6uxV2g/s1600/images+%282%29.jpg\"\n style='width:225pt;height:126pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image016.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"images+%25282%2529\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3hkW6dEPI/AAAAAAAABh0/gi6-b6uxV2g/s1600/images+%25282%2529.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"168\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image016.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_145\" width=\"300\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">The Portugese viceroy\nConstantine De Braganza had ensconced himself in the Sultan\u2019s palace. He was\nunceremoniously told to buzz off from there and 200 prison cells were\nbuilt\u2014ordered by the Pope.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">The Taj Hotel at Fort\nAguada was also used as a torture cell.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3ex6I5CjI/AAAAAAAABg4/H3Ic5KTi5Bw/s1600/9.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_144\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1168\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3ex6I5CjI/AAAAAAAABg4/H3Ic5KTi5Bw/s1600/9.jpg\"\n href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3ex6I5CjI/AAAAAAAABg4/H3Ic5KTi5Bw/s1600/9.jpg\"\n style='width:192pt;height:126.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image017.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"9\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3ex6I5CjI/AAAAAAAABg4/H3Ic5KTi5Bw/s1600/9.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"169\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image017.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_144\" width=\"256\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3e3vxPCRI/AAAAAAAABg8/g77Kxg24AJE/s1600/10.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_143\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1167\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3e3vxPCRI/AAAAAAAABg8/g77Kxg24AJE/s400/10.jpg\"\n href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3e3vxPCRI/AAAAAAAABg8/g77Kxg24AJE/s1600/10.jpg\"\n style='width:300pt;height:225pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image018.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"10\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3e3vxPCRI/AAAAAAAABg8/g77Kxg24AJE/s400/10.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image019.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_143\" width=\"400\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fBgQ4uII/AAAAAAAABhA/DUzdsQbQfKI/s1600/11.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_142\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1166\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fBgQ4uII/AAAAAAAABhA/DUzdsQbQfKI/s400/11.jpg\"\n href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fBgQ4uII/AAAAAAAABhA/DUzdsQbQfKI/s1600/11.jpg\"\n style='width:300pt;height:225pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image020.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"11\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fBgQ4uII/AAAAAAAABhA/DUzdsQbQfKI/s400/11.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image020.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_142\" width=\"400\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">On Jan 31 st 1620, the\nPortugese government ordered that NO Hindu marriages can be performed in Goa.\nThey went one step ahead in 1625\u2014and ordered that NO Hindu infidel can be\nemployed in Goa.<br />\n<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br />\n<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Portuguese\nInquisition Laws filled 230 pages and the Inquisition was to be held behind\nclosed doors. Fr. Diago de Boarda and his advisor Vicar General, Miguel Vaz had\nmade a gruesome 41 point plan for torturing Hindus.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Under this plan Viceroy Ant\u00f3nio\nde Noronha issued in 1566, an order applicable to the entire area under\nPortuguese rule. I hereby order that in any area owned by my master, the king,\nnobody should construct a Hindu temple and such temples already constructed\nshould not be repaired without my permission. If this order is transgressed,\nsuch temples shall be, destroyed and the goods in them shall be used to meet\nexpenses of holy deeds, as punishment of such transgression.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In 1567, the campaign of\ndestroying temples in Bardez met with success. At the end of it more than 300\nHindu temples were destroyed. Enacting laws, prohibition was laid from 4\nDecember 1567 on rituals of Hindu marriages, sacred thread wearing and\ncremation.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All the persons above 15\nyears of age were compelled to listen to Christian preaching, failing which\nthey were punished. In 1583 all Hindu temples at Assolna and Cuncolim were\ndestroyed through army action.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt;\">Convered Hindus , who were\ndetected to secretly &nbsp;hold their old religion in esteem were burnt at\nthe&nbsp; stake or brutally tortured.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fGITlmMI/AAAAAAAABhE/KzcmdjNjR7I/s1600/12.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_141\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1165\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fGITlmMI/AAAAAAAABhE/KzcmdjNjR7I/s1600/12.jpg\"\n href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fGITlmMI/AAAAAAAABhE/KzcmdjNjR7I/s1600/12.jpg\"\n style='width:126.75pt;height:222.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image021.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"12\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fGITlmMI/AAAAAAAABhE/KzcmdjNjR7I/s1600/12.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"297\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image021.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_141\" width=\"169\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fKgZCTwI/AAAAAAAABhI/wyMM3vIMxGc/s1600/13.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_140\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1164\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fKgZCTwI/AAAAAAAABhI/wyMM3vIMxGc/s1600/13.jpg\"\n href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fKgZCTwI/AAAAAAAABhI/wyMM3vIMxGc/s1600/13.jpg\"\n style='width:168pt;height:168.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image022.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"13\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fKgZCTwI/AAAAAAAABhI/wyMM3vIMxGc/s1600/13.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"225\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image022.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_140\" width=\"224\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Brutal methods used were\n\u2013 To tear off the tongues-- &nbsp;To blind the victim with sharp sticks or\nred-hot iron spikes-- The pulling of the flesh with pliers-- The skinning of\nthe accused alive-- Quartering (in which the victims intestines would be pulled\nfrom the body) and impaling, in which a stake would be hammered through the\nvictim\u2019s body avoiding the vital organs, resulting in a slow death that could\nlast for hours or days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fP8w2BfI/AAAAAAAABhM/XY3A08FhNmU/s1600/14.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_139\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1163\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fP8w2BfI/AAAAAAAABhM/XY3A08FhNmU/s1600/14.jpg\"\n href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fP8w2BfI/AAAAAAAABhM/XY3A08FhNmU/s1600/14.jpg\"\n style='width:196.5pt;height:144.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image023.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"14\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fP8w2BfI/AAAAAAAABhM/XY3A08FhNmU/s1600/14.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"193\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image023.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_139\" width=\"262\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">A sharp iron fork was\nused to mangle breasts. Red hot pincers were used to tear off flesh. Red hot\nirons were inserted up vaginas and rectums. A device named the turcas was used\nto tear out fingernails. After the nails were ripped out needles were shoved\nin. Boots called bootikens were used to lacerate flesh and crush bone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fU5WFkgI/AAAAAAAABhQ/HguV9dhfPTg/s1600/15.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_138\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1162\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fU5WFkgI/AAAAAAAABhQ/HguV9dhfPTg/s1600/15.jpg\"\n href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fU5WFkgI/AAAAAAAABhQ/HguV9dhfPTg/s1600/15.jpg\"\n style='width:195pt;height:145.5pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image024.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"15\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fU5WFkgI/AAAAAAAABhQ/HguV9dhfPTg/s1600/15.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"194\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image024.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_138\" width=\"260\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Thumbscrews were used to\ncrush the fingers and toes. Acid was poured on victims and hands were immersed\ninto pots of boiling oil and water. Eyes were gouged out by irons. Alcohol was\npoured on the head of the poor victim and set alight. Water was poured down the\nvictims throat with a knotted cloth. The cloth was then jerked out tearing up\nthe victims bowels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fZYB5tbI/AAAAAAAABhU/yQgGZM9OmXU/s1600/16.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_137\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1161\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fZYB5tbI/AAAAAAAABhU/yQgGZM9OmXU/s1600/16.jpg\"\n href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fZYB5tbI/AAAAAAAABhU/yQgGZM9OmXU/s1600/16.jpg\"\n style='width:196.5pt;height:144.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image025.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"16\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fZYB5tbI/AAAAAAAABhU/yQgGZM9OmXU/s1600/16.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"193\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image025.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_137\" width=\"262\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">There was no limit to\nthe types and cruelty of the tortures. The inquisition meant anything was\nallowed. The inquisitors were sadistic and mentally disturbed. An\n\"Inquisition\" was supposed to be a legal inquiry by the church.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">After the poor victims\nconfessed to things they never did more torture was to follow. On the way to\nthe stake or gallows victims were flogged, burned, branded and had their hands\nand tongues hacked off.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Fillippo Sassetti , an\nItalian merchant from Florence, &nbsp;has chronicled everything. He was the\nfirst European to learn Sanskrit. His views were NOT the jaundiced views of a\nwhite man. Between 1578 and 1588 he had sent a huge number of letters to the\ngrand ducal court in Florence \u2013all about the Portugese inquisition and the\nIndian view point.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mDKNY8OmLqI/UELh0dIwvfI/AAAAAAAAQh8/IIenIyKpLXI/s1600/bbhhyy.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_136\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1160\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mDKNY8OmLqI/UELh0dIwvfI/AAAAAAAAQh8/IIenIyKpLXI/s400/bbhhyy.jpg\"\n href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mDKNY8OmLqI/UELh0dIwvfI/AAAAAAAAQh8/IIenIyKpLXI/s1600/bbhhyy.jpg\"\n style='width:199.5pt;height:300pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image026.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"bbhhyy\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mDKNY8OmLqI/UELh0dIwvfI/AAAAAAAAQh8/IIenIyKpLXI/s400/bbhhyy.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image027.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_136\" width=\"266\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">\"The fathers of the\nChurch forbade the Hindus under terrible penalties the use of their own sacred\nbooks, and prevented them from all exercise of their religion. They destroyed\ntheir temples, and so harassed and interfered with the people that they\nabandoned the city in large numbers, refusing to remain any longer in a place\nwhere they had no liberty, and were liable to imprisonment, torture and death\nif they worshipped after their own fashion the gods of their fathers.\"\nwrote Filippo Sassetti.( below )&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br />\n<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fidupwaI/AAAAAAAABhY/KLKzP8B-_pM/s1600/17.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_135\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1159\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fidupwaI/AAAAAAAABhY/KLKzP8B-_pM/s1600/17.jpg\"\n href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fidupwaI/AAAAAAAABhY/KLKzP8B-_pM/s1600/17.jpg\"\n style='width:116.25pt;height:135.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image028.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"17\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3fidupwaI/AAAAAAAABhY/KLKzP8B-_pM/s1600/17.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"181\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image028.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_135\" width=\"155\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">A French traveller by\nthe name of Dr.Charles Delone had got himself imprisoned in the Sultan\u2019s palace\n(1674-77) and saw things for himself . His observations are in his book\npublished in 1687 and is named \"L\u2019inquisition de Goa\". &nbsp;Charles\nDelone&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">was an eye witness to\nthe atrocities, cruelty and reign of terror unleashed by priests. He published\na book in 1687 describing the lot of helpless victims. While he was in jail, he\nhad heard the cries of tortured people beaten with instruments having sharp\nteeth.</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br />\n<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br />\n<!--[endif]--></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZTm8zvawxmE/UELby8jhrFI/AAAAAAAAQhE/kghO4dQpXQc/s1600/220px-Claudius_Buchanan00.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br />\nDr.Claudius Buchanan's&nbsp;&nbsp;(above ) &nbsp;a Scotsman of the Church of\nEngland ,&nbsp;witnessed some gruesome burning scenes in Great Hall of Goan\nInquisition in 1608,&nbsp;&nbsp;and wrote about the Portuguese Inquisition in\n1812.&nbsp;</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Voltaire\nwrote on the Portuguese Inquisition in Goa</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">\u2014 Quote \u201d Goa est malheureusement c\u00e9l\u00e8bre par son inquisition ,\n\u00e9galement contraire \u00e0 l'humanit\u00e9 et au commerce. Les moines portugais firent\naccroire que le peuple adorait le diable , et ce sont eux qui l'ont servi. (<i><span style=\"background: yellow;\">Goa is sadly famous for its inquisition, equally\ncontrary to humanity and commerce. The Portuguese monks made us believe that\nthe people worshiped the devil, and it is they who have served him</span></i><span style=\"background: yellow;\">.</span>)\u201d.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Historian\nAlfredo de Mello described the Portuguese in Goa</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;: Quote\u2014\u201c<i><span style=\"background: yellow;\">&nbsp;nefarious,\nfiendish, lustful, corrupt religious orders which pounced on Goa for the\npurpose of destroying paganism (ie Hinduism) and introducing the true religion\nof Christ</span></i>\u201d &nbsp;Unquote.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><br />\n<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br />\n<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In 2007, the Portuguese\nGovernment initiated a project to make available online by 2010 a significant\npart of the archives of the Portuguese Inquisition currently deposited in the\nArquivo Nacional da Torre do Tombo, the Portuguese National Archives</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">Traditional musical\ninstruments were banned and only western music was allowed\u2014 a tradition seen\neven today. A Goan Christian marriage MUST have a live band playing pop music .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); ( but when the Taliban shot off the Bamiyan Buddha,\n&nbsp;they found it necessary to cry foul )&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">On 11<sup>th</sup>&nbsp;Dec\n1553 , Xavier\u2019s dead body was shipped from China to Goa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\">The Pope\u2019s\n&nbsp;propaganda has caught on that viewing his dead embalmed body can bring\nmiraculous good fortune and can heal you of all your ailments. margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt;\">In Hindu and Buddhist\ntraditions , all are cremated. &nbsp;Only liberated saints are buried in salt\nand lime.</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GiOZh6PplZ8/UY2xYgyo5jI/AAAAAAAAiNY/hhg136v8RIo/s1600/20100216_5579_thumb.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_129\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1153\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GiOZh6PplZ8/UY2xYgyo5jI/AAAAAAAAiNY/hhg136v8RIo/s400/20100216_5579_thumb.jpg\"\n href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GiOZh6PplZ8/UY2xYgyo5jI/AAAAAAAAiNY/hhg136v8RIo/s1600/20100216_5579_thumb.jpg\"\n style='width:225pt;height:300pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image034.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"20100216_5579_thumb\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GiOZh6PplZ8/UY2xYgyo5jI/AAAAAAAAiNY/hhg136v8RIo/s400/20100216_5579_thumb.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image034.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_129\" width=\"300\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 19.8pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 13pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">When India became independent in 1947, Goa\nremained under Portuguese control. The Indian government of Nehru&nbsp;insisted\nthat Goa, along with a few other minor Portuguese holdings, be turned over to\nIndia. Portugal, however, refused. France, which also had small enclaves in\nIndia ( Pondicherry&nbsp;), gave them up.&nbsp;On December 16, 1961, Indian\ntroops crossed the border into Goa. Code named \" Operation Vijay ', the\nmove involved sustained land, sea, and air strikes for more than 36 hours; it\nresulted in the unconditional surrender of Portuguese forces on 19 December.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3gZaKaQyI/AAAAAAAABho/eGeakke79O4/s1600/images+%2821%29.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_128\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1152\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3gZaKaQyI/AAAAAAAABho/eGeakke79O4/s1600/images+%252821%2529.jpg\"\n href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3gZaKaQyI/AAAAAAAABho/eGeakke79O4/s1600/images+%2821%29.jpg\"\n style='width:177pt;height:132pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image035.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"images+%252821%2529\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3gZaKaQyI/AAAAAAAABho/eGeakke79O4/s1600/images+%252821%2529.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"176\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image035.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_128\" width=\"236\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A United Nations\nresolution condemning the invasion was proposed by the United States and the\nUnited Kingdom in the United Nations Security Council, but it was vetoed by the\nUSSR.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3gm2hyNRI/AAAAAAAABhs/sYUm6eE-Y7k/s1600/images.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_127\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1151\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3gm2hyNRI/AAAAAAAABhs/sYUm6eE-Y7k/s1600/images.jpg\"\n href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3gm2hyNRI/AAAAAAAABhs/sYUm6eE-Y7k/s1600/images.jpg\"\n style='width:204pt;height:138.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image036.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"images\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3gm2hyNRI/AAAAAAAABhs/sYUm6eE-Y7k/s1600/images.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"185\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image036.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_127\" width=\"272\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Despite this Portugal\ntried sending their Navy ( with blessings of USA and UK ) \u2014and President Nasser\nof Egypt promptly shut the Suez Canal.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3g0GQ-uqI/AAAAAAAABhw/Kc6qkYEYF24/s1600/images+%281%29.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_126\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1150\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3g0GQ-uqI/AAAAAAAABhw/Kc6qkYEYF24/s1600/images+%25281%2529.jpg\"\n href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3g0GQ-uqI/AAAAAAAABhw/Kc6qkYEYF24/s1600/images+%281%29.jpg\"\n style='width:170.25pt;height:166.5pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image037.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"images+%25281%2529\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TP3g0GQ-uqI/AAAAAAAABhw/Kc6qkYEYF24/s1600/images+%25281%2529.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"222\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image037.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_126\" width=\"227\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Indians have still NOT\nforgotten such favours.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Even today the mother\nlanguage of Konkani binds all the people of Goa.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt;\">How many\nof you know that</span><span style=\"background: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt;\">&nbsp;Roman\nItalian Inquisition&nbsp;</span><span style=\"background: yellow; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt;\">started\nonly in 1545, with the Indians in Goa, when Francis Xavier impressed on Pope Paul\nIII, the urgent need to punish the filthy pestilent Indians,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"background: yellow; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">worshiping&nbsp;evil back stones\nand following false doctrines . The same Inquisition blinded&nbsp;</span><span style=\"background: yellow; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt;\">Galileo</span><span style=\"background: yellow; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">&nbsp;in 1633.. All under\ninvestigation had to wear a huge red X symbol on their dress .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-oVyxQLl-BsA/TW8oL_8kS7I/AAAAAAAAD4U/GecSp7G-YnA/s1600/images+%284%29.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-hzBwEw_FElc/TW8oPYvbgAI/AAAAAAAAD4Y/q7m4MDmxr-0/s1600/images+%286%29.jpg\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt; text-decoration: none;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_124\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1148\"\n type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-hzBwEw_FElc/TW8oPYvbgAI/AAAAAAAAD4Y/q7m4MDmxr-0/s1600/images+%25286%2529.jpg\"\n href=\"https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-hzBwEw_FElc/TW8oPYvbgAI/AAAAAAAAD4Y/q7m4MDmxr-0/s1600/images+%286%29.jpg\"\n style='width:128.25pt;height:192pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'\n o:button=\"t\">\n <v:fill o:detectmouseclick=\"t\"/>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image039.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"images+%25286%2529\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-hzBwEw_FElc/TW8oPYvbgAI/AAAAAAAAD4Y/q7m4MDmxr-0/s1600/images+%25286%2529.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"256\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image039.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_124\" width=\"171\" /><!--[endif]--></span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">It was\nPope Paul III who restarted slavery in Rome , by repealing a timeless law that\nslaves could claim their freedom at the Emperor's statue at Capitol hill .\nAfter this all Muslims, man and woman , became slaves, automatically. This sick\nman made his grandsons cardinals even before the age of 14.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.0pt;\">Below is Francis Xavier,\nheeding the voice of GOD, to punish all the non-believers.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 18.0pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: rgb(204, 204, 204); font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">April 24, 2013 at 10:21 AM</span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">I have been doing some research on the\nPortuguese inquisition of goa and and have managed access to some fabulous\nbooks which depict the methods and techniques used for conversion! As part of\nthe conquest and colonization of goa - convicts, orphans, prostitutes, social\noutcasts and every other considered as an unfit scum for the prevalent\nPortuguese society was sent to populize goa -just like the British exiled\nconvicts to Australia<br />\n<br />\nThe Jesuit priests ni charge of conversions in Goan villages literally had a\ncompetition going amongst themselves to ensure they meet more\n\"targets\" in terms of people converted<br />\n<br />\nThe Portuguese names, Almeida, Lobo, Crasto, Martins etc etc were given based\non the names of Portuguese masters or surnames of those who became their godfathers<br />\n<br />\nIn Vasai (Bassein) the Portuguese names were given on basis of their\nprofessions/sections of society<br />\nKumbhars (potters) were D'souza, D'mello,Gracias, Pereira, Alphanso etc<br />\nKunbi (land tillers) were Almeida, Lopes, Colaco etc<br />\nVadvals (farm owners) wereGhosal, Vaz etc<br />\nKoli (fishermen) still maintain their old local Marathi Hindu surnames but\npractice Christianity<br />\n<br />\nMost interesting of all is the \"Khrista Purana\" written by Fr. Thomas\nStevens - the Old &amp; New Testament written in the ancient Hindu Puranic\nform. This was written in a mixture f Marathi, Konkani, Modi script - to ensure\nthe praying methods of he Hindus remain same, only that they are now praying to\nChrist and not their former Hindu Gods<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; It was\neven performed against the indigenous christians in India.<br />\n<br />\nIf you notice carefully the Syro malabar christians aka Nasranis and the Syro\nMalankara Christians were also accused of being heretics and imprisoned. Even\nthe churches that belonged to syrian catholics were destroyed due to their\nIndo-Chaldean rite practise. There was a big rift within christians in kerala\nand portuguese that resulted in the Coonan Cross.<br />\n<br />\nSecondly the inquisition also had muslims and jews branded as heretics, not\njust the hindus alone.<br />\nThirdly many Portuguese descent people left goa and took up employment under\nmany muslim rulers.<br />\n<br />\nBut sir i disagree with your assertion that goans are not bright merely\nclearing iit is not a sign of intelligence. Dr. Norman Francis Lewis would have\nwon the Nobel Prize in Physics if not for untimely death. His research was path\nbreaking. His work were simply great even the FAO invited him as Consultant.\nDr. Romar Correa have also had great progress in the field of economics esp\nGame Theory. Mere emphasis on academic life is not briliance.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nBesides there are goans who have made it to IITs.<br />\n<br />\nsee<br />\n<br />\nhttp://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2011-05-26/goa/29585784_1_rank-aieee-iit-entrance-exam<br />\n<br />\nor<br />\n<br />\nhttp://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2012-05-19/goa/31777441_1_lakh-students-entrance-goa-students<br />\n<br />\nor<br />\n<br />\nhttp://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2009-05-28/goa/28152837_1_iit-jee-joint-entrance-exam-iit-merit-list<br />\n<br />\nEasy life may distract many but cant distract all...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Ramesh Rattihalli</span></b></a><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/portuguese-inquisition-in-goa-and.html?showComment=1414499453417#c1712830090520072940\"><span style=\"color: #888888; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Dear Capt.<br />\n<br />\nAgain your blog not only just enlightened me but also made me cry. I had some\nknowledge about the past, Hindus escaping to Karnataka and Kerala from Goa but\nnow we know in detail.<br />\n<br />\nMy daughter had once told me that we Rattihallis are the decedents of\nRashtrakutas, the empire that once ruled Goa, It was all 100% Hindu that time.<br />\n<br />\nAlso that the famous church of Goa, basilica of bom jesus at Old Goa, where the\nbody of said, sfx is kept was once a Shiva temple and till date cross cannot be\nerected on it, like the cross on churches elsewhere. Everytime they tried, it\nfell down. Hence they put the cross much away from the church.<br />\n<br />\nAll along the road from Panaji to Ponda, there are Shiva or Nandi temples, most\nof them are converted to churches. In 1779, the Maratha Peshwa\nformed an alliance with the Portuguese allowing them to collect revenue from\nthe 79 villages of Dadra and Nagar Haveli.<br />\n<br />\nThe rule of the Portuguese in the region continued till the region gained\nindependence on 2 August 1954.<br />\n<br />\nOn the night of 21 July, United front of Goans, a group, working independently\nof the coalition, captured the Portuguese police station at Dadra and declared\nDadra as free. Subsequently on 28 July, volunteer teams of the RSS and AGD\ncaptured the territories of Naroli and Phiparia and ultimately the capital of\nSilvassa.<br />\n<br />\nThe Portuguese forces which escaped and moved towards Nagar Haveli, were\nassaulted at Khandvel and were forced to retreat till they surrendered to the\nIndian border police at Udava on 11 August 1954. A native administration was\nsetup with Appasaheb Karmalkar of NMLO as the Administrator of Dadra and Nagar\nHaveli on 11 August 1954.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1955, RSS leaders demanded the end of Portuguese rule in Goa and its\nintegration into India. When Prime Minister of India, Jawaharlal Nehru refused\nto obtain it by armed intervention, RSS leader Jagannath Rao Joshi led the\nsatyagraha agitation straight into Goa itself. He was imprisoned with his\nfollowers by the Portuguese police.<br />\n<br />\nThe peaceful protests continued but met with severe repressions. On 15 August\n1955, the Portuguese police opened fire on the satyagrahis, killing thirty or\nso people.<br />\n<br />\nThe CAPTURE of the rest of Goa by Indian armed forces was just a follow up in\nDec 1961\u2014 as Nehru felt that he would be deposed on this issue.<br />\n<br />\nI have heard the TRUE story of Operation Vijay from Indian Navy sailors who\nactually participated -who sailed with me . The population was 59% Hindu, 39 %\nCatholic Christians and 2% Muslim.<br />\n<br />\nAlmost the ENTIRE Catholics were on the side of the Portuguese.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hindus and Muslims were on the side of the Indian armed forces. These\nChristians tried to entice the Indian soldiers with drugged food and\nwater.<br />\n<br />\nBut the Navy had received news from spies about this and the soldiers were told\nNOT to eat or drink anything from ashore\u2014but to consume army rations.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; He came to Kerala by ship all the way\nfrom Greece 2500 years ago, to cure his debilitating epilepsy with cannabis\nextract.<br />\n<br />\nHe hung around in the Kerala School of Math , without understanding a dang\nthing-- - but he had some notes with him and went back as the planets No 1\nmathematician , thinker and a vegetarian to boot . .<br />\n<br />\n100 years later Plato would come to Kerala by ship and learn for a few years .\nAnd then he went back as a greater cat than Pythagoras , he was now the planets\nNo 1 THINKER !<br />\n<br />\nGreek Plato ( 427BC-347 BC ) also went back from Kerala as a Mathematician ( he\nwas smarter than Pythogoras ) and a philosopher. . He shared his spoils with\nhis mentor Socrates, and fellow homosexual side kick Aristotle ( 384 BC- 322 BC\n) and got himself immortalized as the founder of the Academy in Athens, the\nfirst institution of higher learning in the Western world.<br />\n<br />\nSocrates and Plato were hardcore homosexuals . Aristotle initiated Alexander\nthe great into homosexuality. Thus this gruesome HOMOSEXUAL TRIO of Plato,\nSocrates and Aristotle laid the foundations of Western philosophy and science\nwith stolen ( from India ) and patented knowledge .<br />\n<br />\nPythagoras gave his stolen Ayurveda ( excerpts from treatises of Susruta and\nCharaka ) to the grandfather of Hippocrates. Orpheus gave astrology and magic ( mantravadam ), vedic metaphysics (\nmagna grecia ) from Kerala to the west. Orpheus was a master in astrology, and\nall Greek astrology is though Orpheus. .<br />\n<br />\nEuropean Gods Thor/ Zeus is Maharishi Brihaspati . , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape\n id=\"Picture_x0020_27\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1051\" type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s45/*\"\n style='width:33.75pt;height:33.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image052.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"*\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s45/*\" border=\"0\" height=\"45\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image052.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_27\" width=\"45\" /><!--[endif]--></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\"><b><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span></b></a><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/portuguese-inquisition-in-goa-and.html?showComment=1424862800497#c1755523828044132708\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">February 25, 2015 at 4:43 PM</span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">EXCERPTS FROM WIKIPEDIA \u2013<br />\n<br />\nPunch into Google search -<br />\nCRITICISM OF MOTHER TERESA WIKIPEDIA .<br />\n<br />\nTeresa encouraged members of her order to baptize dying patients, without\nregard to the individual's religion. In a speech at the Scripps Clinic in\nCalifornia in January 1992, she said: \"Something very beautiful... not one\nhas died without receiving the special ticket for St. Peter, as we call it. We\ncall baptism ticket for St. Peter. We ask the person, do you want a blessing by\nwhich your sins will be forgiven and you receive God? They have never refused.\nSo 29,000 have died in that one house [in Kalighat] from the time we began in\n1952.\"<br />\n<br />\nIn 1998, among the 200 charitable assistance organizations reported to operate\nin Calcutta, Missionaries of Charity was not ranked among the largest charity\norganizations\u2013with the Assembly of God charity notably serving a greater number\nof the poor at 18,000 meals daily.[5]<br />\n<br />\nNone of the eight facilities that the Missionaries of Charity run in Papua New\nGuinea have any residents in them, being purely for the purpose of converting\nlocal people to Catholicism.<br />\nShe was sometimes accused by Hindus in her adopted country of trying to convert\nthe poor to Catholicism by \"stealth\".[6] Christopher Hitchens\ndescribed Mother Teresa's organization as a cult which promoted suffering and\ndid not help those in need. He said that Mother Teresa's own words on poverty\nproved that her intention was not to help people, quoting her words at a 1981\npress conference in which she was asked: \"Do you teach the poor to endure\ntheir lot?\" She replied: \"I think it is very beautiful for the poor\nto accept their lot, to share it with the passion of Christ. I think the world\nis being much helped by the suffering of the poor people.\"[2]:11[7]<br />\n<br />\nIn 1991, Robin Fox, editor of the British medical journal The Lancet visited\nthe Home for Dying Destitutes in Calcutta (now Kolkata) and described the\nmedical care the patients received as \"haphazard\". He observed that\nsisters and volunteers, some of whom had no medical knowledge, had to make\ndecisions about patient care, because of the lack of doctors in the hospice.\nFox specifically held Teresa responsible for conditions in this home, and\nobserved that her order did not distinguish between curable and incurable\npatients, so that people who could otherwise survive would be at risk of dying\nfrom infections and lack of treatment.<br />\n<br />\nMother Teresa herself referred to the facilities as \"Houses of the\nDying\".<br />\n<br />\nIn contrast to the conditions endured by the poor in her hospices, Mother\nTheresa sought the most advanced modern medical treatment available for\nherself, visiting world-renowned clinics in the United States, Europe, and\nIndia.<br />\n<br />\nIt has been alleged by former employees of Mother Teresa's order that Teresa\nrefused to authorize the purchase of medical equipment, and that donated money\nwas instead transferred to the Vatican Bank for general use, even if it was\nspecifically earmarked for charitable purposes.<br />\n<br />\nMother Teresa died in 1997. Despite her request that all writing and\ncorrespondence be destroyed, a collection was posthumously released to the\npublic in book form.[8] Her writings revealed that she struggled with feelings\nof disconnectedness that were in contrast to the strong feelings she had\nexperienced as a young novice.[9] In her letters Mother Teresa describes a\ndecades long sense of feeling disconnected from God[10] and lacking the earlier\nzeal which had characterized her efforts to start the Missionaries of Charity.\nAs a result of this, she was judged by some to have 'ceased to believe'.[11<br />\n<br />\nI WROTE MY POST MORE THAN FOUR YEARS AGO -- AT WHICH TIME WIKIPEDIA TREATED HER\nLIKE GOD .<br />\n<br />\nPunch into Google search -<br />\n<br />\n. . . . . DIABOLICAL MINISTERING ANGEL MOTHER TERESA VADAKAYIL . . . . .<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 12.0pt; margin-left: .5in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; text-indent: 0in;\">\n<!--[if !supportLists]--><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">63.<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape\n id=\"Picture_x0020_26\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1050\" type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s45/*\"\n style='width:33.75pt;height:33.75pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image052.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"*\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s45/*\" border=\"0\" height=\"45\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image052.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_26\" width=\"45\" /><!--[endif]--></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\"><b><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span></b></a><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/portuguese-inquisition-in-goa-and.html?showComment=1424872411362#c8205711117161738542\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">February 25, 2015 at 7:23 PM</span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br />\nAmartya Sen thinks that by resigning as Chancellor from Nalanda University he will\nescape prosecution as per Indian laws.<br />\n<br />\nPunch into google search - . .<br />\n. . . . CHANAKYA , THE TAXILA UNIVERSITY PROFESSOR WHO BECAME A KINGMAKER\nVADAKAYIL . . . .<br />\n<br />\nWHO SAYS NALANDA WAS AN ANCIENT BUDDHIST UNIVERSITY ?<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS AN ANCIENT HINDU UNIVERSITY FIRST .<br />\n<br />\nAryabhatta of 2700 BC, from my hometown of Calicut was the first to propound\nthe HELIOCENTRIC model of the cosmos, the Siderial day length, and that the\nearth rotates on its own axis, all the while moving in space -- in writing. .\n.<br />\n<br />\nHe presented his thesis at Nalanda University. \u2026 . .<br />\n<br />\nThose days Buddhism was NOT even a thought. . . .<br />\n<br />\nBiharis love to claim Aryabhatta as their own. . . It is like Ivy league\nCornell university trying to claim my son is American . . . .<br />\nOf course Aryabhatta ( senior ) he had gone there to present his thesis at\nNalanda university in Patna and also use their observatory.<br />\n<br />\nAryabhatta\u2019s ( Aryan Bhattathiripad ) astronomical calculations used a latitude\nnear Calicut.<br />\n<br />\nIf you say on April 14th and August 23rd , the sun was exactly overhead , it\nmeans that particular day the declination of the sun is the same as the\nlatitude 11 deg 16 min N of the place you stay. ( sun travelling from equator\nto tropic of cancer and back, due to tilting of earths axis )<br />\n<br />\nAryabhatta ( senior ) born in Kerala ( my home state ) in 2700 BC, was one of\nthe early members of the Kerala school of Math from where Isaac Newton stole\nhis Calculus. . Aryabhatta was the first to calculate Pi of 3.1416 and the\nsolar year of 365.358 days . He propounded a heliocentric universe 4200 years\nbefore Copernicus, with elliptically orbiting planets and a spherical earth\nspinning on its axis explaining the motion of the heavens. He was the father of\nplane / spherical Trigonometry and Algebra, when Europe was in the dark ages..\nToday you don't see this pioneers name in the list of top 100 mathematicians. .\n.<br />\n<br />\nAryabhatta was the first to compute the circumference of the earth, with an\nerror of just 64 miles.. Aryabhatta gave a method to find the cube root of numbers\nand dealt with arithmetic,geometric and indeterminate equations in algebra. He\ndealt with square, cube, triangle, trapezium, circle and sphere in geometry. He\nwas called Arjehir by the Arabs. . .<br />\n<br />\nCalculus was written in Malayalam atleast 200 years before THIEF Isaac Newton\nwas born, by the Kerala school of Calculus. . . .Calculus in Sanskrit was\nwritten 4800 years ago. . .<br />\n<br />\nPoor Galileo did a Aryabhatta 4 millenuims years later , that the earth is\nround and circles the sun , and the church blinded him , so that he can never\nlook into another telescope .<br />\n<br />\nVarahamihira ( Mihira Muni ) was a student of Aryabhatta . . .. Even today all\nastrology in Kerala belongs to Mihira Muni's method. . .Isaac Newton stole his\ngravity and laws of motion theories from the great work of Varahamihira<br />\n<br />\nThe white invader planted imaginary stories of how Sage Astronomer Varahamihira\n(2660 BC ) had conversations with Christians, to post date him to AD . . . .\nHow he stole Pascal's triangles and 5 square magic numbers.<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS THIS FOUL CONSPIRACY TO MAKE NALANDA A BUDDHIST UNIVERSITY, BEING\nTOLERATED ?<br />\n<br />\nPUNCH INTO Google search - . .<br />\n. . . . CHANAKYA , THE TAXILA UNIVERSITY PROFESSOR WHO BECAME A KINGMAKER\nVADAKAYIL. . . .<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; knowledge\neven at the time of bhagwaan shree krishnaa..<br />\n<br />\nEven jaraasandh ,the evil king didn't hamper the education system..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #EEEEEE; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape\n id=\"Picture_x0020_22\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1046\" type=\"#_x0000_t75\" alt=\"Description: http://img2.blogblog.com/img/b36-rounded.png\"\n style='width:27pt;height:27pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image044.png\"\n  o:title=\"b36-rounded\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://img2.blogblog.com/img/b36-rounded.png\" border=\"0\" height=\"36\" src=\"file:///C:/Users/win7/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image044.png\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_22\" width=\"36\" /><!--[endif]--></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #EEEEEE; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 12.0pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/03635982158769332826\"><b><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Aashutosh Kumaar Shaahee</span></b></a><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/portuguese-inquisition-in-goa-and.html?showComment=1426923584716#c3902077043418912040\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">March 21, 2015 at 1:09 PM</span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #EEEEEE; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Varna system was &amp; is the best system..<br />\nIt removes unwanted n excessive n unnecessary competition,naturally..<br />\nIt is:- do a/c to your limits n abilities..<br />\n<br />\nSo,same family used to have 1)Braamhans(not caste,but varna):- who performed\nrituals,as priests;they were teachers,professors,teaching n preaching from\nspirituality to science,morality to maths,arts,etc..<br />\n<br />\n2)Kshatreeya:- who fought for the nation.<br />\n<br />\n3)Vaishya:-agricultural,business,etc..<br />\nHere is a corollary.... If anyone used to sell paintings,whether he drew it or\nnot,he/she was a vaishya.. But,if anyone used to teach painting,he/she was a\nbraamhan.. Same case applied for doctors..<br />\n<br />\n4)Shoodra:- who had muscle power,but not the mental prowess.. They used to do\nsevaa karm for other people..<br />\n<br />\nBut there wasn't any discrimination a/c to varna or birth,yeah there were\nfeelings of upperness in terms of money(a natural blot on the face of humanity\nby those people who are not grounded); but it wasn't prevalent n wasn't the\ntrend n fashion of society..<br />\n<br />\nBut,slowly it started to become,then complacency among braamhans &amp;\nkshatreeyas forced these two to make a vicious collaboration that yielded in\ncaste system,i.e.,you are what,it is identified by your birth not your karm..<br />\nThen slowly started the discrimination &amp; now today it's in every state..<br />\n<br />\nYou believe it or not,but it is hurting our religion,our way of life from\nwithin..<br />\n<br />\nWe should try to revoke the varna system,the best in the world..<br />\n<br />\nEUROPE,AMERICA HAS RACISM VERY RAMPANT IN THEIR SOCIETY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #EEEEEE;
