font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span></b></a><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/portuguese-inquisition-in-goa-and.html?showComment=1427947618008#c1665183558523470346\"><span style=\"color: #888888; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">April 2, 2015 at 9:36 AM</span></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-left: 1.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">hi np,<br />\n<br />\ni have NOT yet written a post on it.<br />\n<br />\nThe conversations between Lord Shiva and Parvati had nothing to do with clean\nsex or perverted sex.<br />\n<br />\nIt was about 108 forms of meditation ( dharana or centering techniques ) to\nachieve cosmic consciousness\u2014and is called VIGYAN BHAIRAVA TANTRA.<br />\n<br />\nTantra does NOT mean sex\u2014it just means method.<br />\n<br />\nBhairava is \u201c beyond consciousness \u201c\u2014a NO MIND STATE.<br />\n<br />\nVigyan Bhaiva Tantra was penned down 7000 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nVigyan Bhaiva Tantra starts with a question from Devi regarding the nature of\nreality. Parvati asks Shiva about Universe, about fundamental nature of this\nworld, how one can go beyond space and time to understand this truth.<br />\n<br />\nThe book is all about Shiva\u2019s answers to Devi\u2019s queries. He does not tell her\nwhat is. He goes on and on giving her different dharanas.<br />\n<br />\nThe book starts with Parvati asking her husband Lord Shiva -<br />\nO Shiva, what is your reality?<br />\nWhat is this wonder-filled universe?<br />\nWhat constitutes seed?<br />\nWho centers the universal wheel?<br />\nWhat is this life beyond form pervading forms?<br />\nHow may we enter it fully, above space and time, names and descriptions?<br />\nLet my doubts be cleared!<br />\n<br />\nShe is NOT asking him about how to lick an purulent as$hole or suck a\nsyphilitic di#k or slimy methods to steal another man\u2019s wife .<br />\n<br />\nSingle messiah/ holy book readers will NOT understand the ramifications of Lord\nShiva\u2019s replies, as it is in such a loft plane.<br />\n<br />\nIt is NOT a dialogue between a Guru and shishya\u2014but a dialogue between two\nlovers\u2014and hence is refreshingly incisive, where the BEYOND IS EXPRESSED.<br />\n<br />\nYou need not be a woman to be a disciple, but you need to be in a feminine\nattitude of receptivity.<br />\n<br />\nPhilosophy ( every fu#kin\u2019 philosophy is a lie ) is concerned with the mind and\nthe brain is enough; your totality is not required. Tantra needs you in your\ntotality, your every cell among trillions .<br />\n<br />\nLord Shiva gives his wife Parvati most profound methods of centering oneself\nusing a lover ( this is NOT sex) , achieving pure awareness, quantum\nentrainment, consciousness , prana amplification , focusing the mind like a\nlaser beam, the meaning of OM, channeling the breath for Nitric oxide boost,\nthe alpha / theta frequency states, nadis, bindu of Sri Yantra geometry ,\nshabda brahman, advaita brahmAn , raising kundalini, the chakras, mudras,\ntattwas, delusions of Maya, core of Shakti etc etc -<br />\n<br />\nThe modern man is NOT intelligent enough or perceptive enough to understand the\nancient Tantra\u2014which has been reduced to sex and perversion.<br />\n<br />\nTantra stands for deep experiences. Anything experienced can be transcended;\nanything suppressed can never be transcended.<br />\n<br />\nIf at all sex is involves it is only to achieve purity. A small child is NOT\naware that he is stealing . He is NOT aware of his nakedness. This is why we\nHindus do NOT cremate our young children who die. They do NOT have egos .<br />\n<br />\nTheir minds are not harnessed by laws . Tantra transcends the mind and accept\nthe whole of the human in complete totality . Mind is an order and it lives\nwith de\ufb01nitions and disciplines..<br />\n<br />\nOne of Lord Shiva\u2019 methods of PURE AWARENESS in Vigyan Bhairava tantra is used\nat Sabarimala\u2014the world\u2019s largest pilgrimage centre where people worship Lord\nAyyappa , the 9th avatar of Lord Vishnu.<br />\n<br />\nShiva tells Parvati \u2013take your pick-- he tells her to choose anyone of the 108\nmethods.<br />\n<br />\nYoga is suppression with awareness; tantra is indulgence with awareness.<br />\n<br />\nTantra method is to be aware of the desire , NOT to create any \ufb01ght, but to\nmove in desire with full consciousness,and only then you can transcend\nit.<br />\n<br />\nYoga is outgoing energy, while tantra is energy moving inwards.<br />\n<br />\nTantra is about depth, while yoga is about height.<br />\n<br />\nHOW MANY OF OUR FAKE GURUS, LIVING IN LUXURY, HAVING 150 BRANCHES THROUGHOUT\nTHE WORLD-- WHO COME ON BENAMI TV HAVE EVER TOLD YOU ALL THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0Lds3LIcqzA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0Lds3LIcqzA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">JUST BECAUSE BRITISH STONEHENGE HAS 27 PORTALS HOW CAN IT BE\nA HINDU STRUCTURE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">LISTEN--- 27 PORTALS IS FOR 27 NAKSHATRAS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Each of the 27 Nakshatra is divided into four Pada = 4\nquarters. 27 x 4 = 108= digital value of OM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">108 IS A DIVINE NUMBER --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">NOBODY CAN STEAL THIS NUMBER AND GIVE IT TO ANY OTHER LAND\nOTHER THAN INDIA , OR RELIGION OTHER THAN SANATANA DHARMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Nakshatra ( Asterism ) is the general term, referring to any\nidentified pattern of stars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The ecliptic is divided into each of the nakshatras\neastwards starting from this first point of Aries<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">First point of Aries is the spot where equinoctial cuts the\necliptic.. The First Point of Aries, is current at PISCES and is a mismomer .\nIt just show the Greeks lifted from Kerala astrology-- It, defines the\nzero-point for Right Ascension.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">BEFORE THE \u201c INTERSECTION OF EQUINOCTIAL AND ECLIPTIC \u201c WAS\nAT ARIES \u2014 ONLY KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING KNEW ASTRONOMY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">RISHABHAM- TAURUS (4300 BC ) / MEDAM- ARIES (2150 BC ) /\nMENAM- PISCES ( 1 AD ) / KUMBHAM - AQUARIUS (2150 AD )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The First Point of Aries is not a fixed point in space: it\nmoves along the Ecliptic at a rate of roughly one degree every seventy years.\nWhen the Equinox was first observed, thousands of years ago, the First Point\nactually lay in the constellation of Aries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">When the Sun reaches the First Point of Aries, as it does\nonce each year, an equinox occurs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Because the First Point of Aries is the zero-point for\ncalculating coordinates on the Celestial Sphere, its own coordinates are always\nfixed, regardless of its motion. They are, of course, zero hours Right\nAscension and zero degrees Declination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">KERALA SAGES FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY GAVE THE COSMIC\nALLEGORIES FOR THE BIBLE IN 325 AD AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA TO THE ROMAN\nEMPEROR .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">JESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">JESUS WAS A CLEVER COMBINATION OF COSMIC ALLEGORY/\nAPPOLONIUS OF TYANA , A KERALA SAGE AND HIS SIDE KICK DAMISA ( WHO MARRIED MARY\nOF MAGDALENE \u2013A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br text-align: justify;\">When JEW Luis de Torres ( Christopher Columbus's interpreter on his first voyage to America) landed on Hispanola he saw a bird which he thought was an Indian peacock and named it \u201ctuki\u201d, the Hebrew word for that bird.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; When they left they took 24 Indians as slaves and left smallpox blankets behind.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Only one Pawtuxet named Squanto had survived\u2013he had spent the last years as a slave to the English and Spanish in Europe\u2014and he was used as a language translator</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: justify;\">John Winthrop, a founder of the Massahusetts Bay colony considered this wave of illness and death to be a divine miracle.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: justify;\">He wrote to a friend in England, \u201cBut for the natives in these parts, God hath so pursued them, as for 300 miles space the greatest part of them are swept away by smallpox which still continues among them. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/nzqhymaPDNs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/nzqhymaPDNs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Recently I saw a western &nbsp;TV programme .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The subject of the debate was \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201c<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> WHY DID WHITE MANs KNOWLEDGE DRY UP AFTER\nTHE ANCIENT GREEKS, IN AS MUCH AS THERE WAS DARK AGES TILL THE WHITE MAN CAME\nTO INDIA \u2013 IN BETWEEN THEY SCROUNGED FOR SOME KNOWLEDGE FROM THE ARABS\u201d</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One fat white lady said most sarcastically\u2014<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> WELL\nTHE ANCIENT GREEK KNOWLEDGE WAS FOUND IN THE WATER.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The whole group then laughed loudly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">She had hit the nail on the head in one terse\nsentence..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b>All the ancient Greeks PYTHAGORAS, PLATO, ARISTOTLE , SOCRATES etc &nbsp;stole knowledge from Kodungallur University and patented it in their own names.</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Kodungallur was the cultural capital of Calicut king ( my hometown ) and also the SW monsoon time harbor ( Muziris ).</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b>When the University professors got wind of the foul deceit they black balled Greek students. &nbsp; They would NOT have minded if this knowledge was NOT twisted to suit Greek interests or even grossly misunderstood .</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b>Then the white Intellectuals used Arabs ( as a front ) &nbsp;to buy Kodungallur University knowledge for gold. &nbsp;The deal was fair and the Calicut King agreed. &nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b>However to prevent subversion , all knowledge was translated into Arabic and Persian and only then it was sold. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b>There was NO past practice in India of affixing your name to any book written as per our great Sanatana Dharma culture.</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">SO SO SO\u2014</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b>SINCE THE TIME THIEVING&nbsp;IMMORAL GREEKS WERE BLACKBALLED TO THE TIME THE WHITE&nbsp;INVADER CAME TO INDIA, &nbsp;THE WHITE MAN STOLE TRANSLATED ARABIC KNOWLEDGE , AND THEN PATENTED IT IN THEIR OWN NAMES.</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN KERALA THERE WERE ONLY TWO SECTS- THIRAYYARS\n, THE RULING CLASS , WARRIORS, NAVIGATORS &nbsp;AND INTELLECTUALS AND THE MALAYYARS , THE\nWORKING CLASS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NAMBOODIRIS OF KERALA WERE THE INTELLECTUAL\nCLASS AMONG THIYYAS AS THEY KNEW SANSKRIT AND EXCELLED IN VEDANTA , ASTRONOMY AND\nSCIENCE .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AMONG THE CREAMY LAYER OF THE NAMBOODIRIPPADS\nWERE BHATTATHIRIPPADS , &nbsp;WHO WERE HIGH\nLEVEL MATHEMATICIANS . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPPAD ( ARYA BHATTA ) &nbsp;IS ONE&nbsp;\n. .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Aryan did not mean a white skinned blue eyed blond man. &nbsp; The word </span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 200%;\"><b>ARYAN </b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">meant --a great intellectual .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Aryabhatta born in Kerala ( my home state ) in 2700 BC, was\none of the early members of this school.&nbsp;\nAryabhatta was the first to calculate Pi of 3.1416 and the solar year of\n365.358 days . He propounded a heliocentric universe 4200 years before\nCopernicus, with elliptically orbiting planets and a spherical earth spinning\non its axis explaining the motion of the heavens. He was the father of plane /\nspherical Trigonometry and Algebra, when Europe was in the dark ages.. Today\nyou don't see this pioneers name in the list of top 100 mathematicians. Aryabhatta\nwas the first to compute the circumference of the earth, with an error of just\n64 miles.. Aryabhatta gave a method to find the cube root of numbers and dealt\nwith arithmetic,geometric and indeterminate equations in algebra. He dealt with\nsquare, cube, triangle, trapezium, circle and sphere in geometry. He was called\nArjehir by the Arabs. Poor Galileo did a Aryabhatta 4 millenuims years later ,\nthat the earth is round and circles the sun , and the church blinded him , so\nthat he can never look into another telescope .</i><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">EVERY SINGLE PROFESSOR OF ANCIENT\nUNIVERSITIES TAXILA, NALANDA , SARASWARI DHAR BHOJ AND KODUNGALLUR WERE\nNAMBOODIRIS.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>CHANAKYA WAS A NAMBOODIRI PROFESSOR. &nbsp; &nbsp; THEY TIED THEIR KUDUMI ON THE SIDE FOR EASY\nRECOGNITION AND WERE RESPECTED BY ALL .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>In Vedic mythology the\nDanavas are a race descending from Daksha.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Daksha is Shiva\u2019s wife Sati\u2019s father.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I AM A DANAVA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/blogger.g?blogID=3564735312144269387\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;\"></a><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/blogger.g?blogID=3564735312144269387\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;\"></a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Maya Danava went to\nPeru on his own Vimana which was a spacecraft. He had designed several of these\nspacecrafts for Kubera.&nbsp;&nbsp; Lord Kubera,\nthe brother of King Ravana had several Vimanas, and he had gifted him one in\nreturn for services rendered.&nbsp; Maya was\nan architect and a metallurgist par excellence-- he was a magician literally\nwith palaces. He was the architect of Tripura ( Atlantis ) and the Lanka palace\nof Kubera which was usurped by his half brother Ravana along with the Pushpaka\nVimana. After the Ramayana war in 4300 BC, this vimana ( flying saucer with\nmercury plasma gyroscope vortex ) was returned back to its rightful owner\nKubera by Lord Rama. Maya was arm twisted by Arjuna in a foul manner, to build\nthe amazing Indraprasta Mahasabha for Yuddhisthira. In the ancient days having\nthe best palace among all kings had its own glory and held the awe factor for\nrespect. Mayasabha was a palace of illusions. Maya means illusion in Sanskrit. Guest\nking Duryodhana was circumspect while walking thorough, unable to figure out\nwhich is solid and which is liquid, causing Draupadi to laugh loudly in sarcasm\nfrom the balcony. Then King Duryodhana to preserve his honour, walked with less\ncaution and fell headlong into a pool of water, and Draupadi laughed again in\nsarcasm--this time louder.&nbsp; Duryodhana\ncame out of the pool dripping wet and shouted at her \" This laugher will\ncost you dear!\". This was the root cause for the Mahabharata war in 4000\nBC.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">King Ravana\u2019s race from\nthe maternal side was that of Danava and from his paternal side was of PRAJAPATI\n(Lord Brahma's descendents).&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 24.64px;\" /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/MRKgbwl8vCY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/MRKgbwl8vCY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above video: &nbsp;ATP was discovered by\nan Indian named Yellapragada \u2014but it was stolen by his team boss at Harward , a\ncrypto Jew named Cyrus Hartwell Fiske<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 4 electrolytes \u2013\nsodium, potassium, calcium and magnesium \u2013 form a kind of dance over 24 hrs\ncalled the day-night shift.&nbsp; Magnesium\nand potassium live normally within the cell, and sodium and calcium are found\noutside.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the day sodium\ninvades the cell, taking a hydrogen ion with it, which is acidifying. In order\nto buffer this acidity, which is toxic to the cell, calcium also moves in. This\nhas the effect of displacing potassium and magnesium which is shoved out of the\ncell.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At night due to the\neffect of the moon, the opposite takes place and potassium and magnesium move\nback into the cell, pushing out the calcium and sodium, which takes the\nhydrogen ion with it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This has the effect of\ncleansing the cell, so you should wake up bright and refreshed. When the body\nis not cleansing properly, this process is impaired and instead you wake up\ntired and lethargic . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress dehydrates the\nbody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the body starts to\nfeel dehydrated the integrity of the cell is threatened. In order to preserve\nthe cell the body puts cholesterol, a hard fatty substance, into the fluid cell\nmembrane to stabilise it and stop the cell collapsing and therefore dying.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This has the effect\nhowever of making it more difficult for things to move through the membrane, so\nthe acidity, excess sodium, water, hydrogen and calcium do not fully exit the\ncell. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The deeper this\npicture, the more rigid the cell membrane becomes and the less the cellular\ncleanse takes place and the more tired and generally unwell you feel. A clear\nmarker of this are elevated cholesterol levels in the blood. The rightful\nposition of magnesium, along with its partner potassium, is inside the cell not\noutside.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the sodium goes\ninside the cell during the day it grabs an extra hydrogen ion. This creates\nacidity within the cells.&nbsp; When the\nmagnesium goes back inside the cells at night, shoving&nbsp; out the sodium, it has an alkalizing\neffect.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a very important\nrole that magnesium carries out inside the cell, completing the night time\ncleanse, so that in the morning the person feels refreshed and the acidity\nlevels have been reduced greatly inside the cell. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Part of the cleansing\nprocess is to ensure that as the cell is rehydrated, the cholesterol coating\nlessened, and the cell can start to \u2018clean house\u2019 the toxins can be taken\ndirectly out of the body. The cell puts toxins into the lymph, which transfers\nit to blood, which takes it to liver, which processes it into bile, into the\nbowels and out. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If any part of this\npicture is not functioning properly you effectively have blocked plumbing, with\nsubsequent results of toxins backing up into the system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is lymph? Ayurveda\nknew it 6000 years ago, while modern science knew about it just 60 years back.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sodium and calcium are\nresponsible for the contraction of the muscles whilst potassium and magnesium\nare responsible for the relaxation or extension process.&nbsp; So if people are tense, this shows up in the\nmuscles, and most particularly within the internal muscles such as those in the\ndigestive tract, the bowels, the urinary tract and in all of the lung activity.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This contraction and\ntightness is caused by magnesium not returning inside the cell during the night,\nthus leaving the cells uncleansed and acidic and the muscles contracted. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium is the natural\ncalmer. It is crucial that magnesium is in pushes out the calcium , to create\nthat calm, cleansed feeling .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flatulent gas is build\nup by indigestion and eating unsuitable food.&nbsp;\nRice is easily digestible the only starch that does not cause gas.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Indian\nMaharishis did NOT drink cow\u2019s milk at a skewed Calcium Magnesium ration of\n1:10.&nbsp;&nbsp; Rather they made curd ( yoghurt )\nor boiled the milk in Cinnamon and other spices rich in Magnesium.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are all giant\nbatteries that run on electricity. The source of that electricity are minerals,\nespecially the four key electrolytes: calcium, sodium, potassium, and\nmagnesium.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sodium is the fluidity\nelement. It keeps our joints and ligaments supple and prevents arthritis.\nSodium keeps calcium and magnesium in solution in your system.&nbsp; It provides nerve balance as part of an\nimmensely sensitive and complicated Sodium/Potassium/Magnesium/Calcium\nhomeostatic feedback mechanism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sodium and potassium\nare essential dietary minerals and electrolytes. They dissociate into ions\n(charged particles) in solution, making them capable of conducting electricity.\nNormal body functioning depends on the right regulation of sodium and potassium\nboth inside and outside of cells.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sodium is the principal\nion in the fluid outside of cells, while potassium is the principal ion in the\nfluid inside of cells. Sodium concentrations are more than ten times lower\ninside than outside cells, and potassium concentrations are about 30 times\nhigher inside than outside cells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concentration\ndifferences between potassium and sodium across cell membranes create an\nelectrochemical gradient known as the membrane potential. A large portion of\nenergy in the body is dedicated to maintaining sodium/potassium concentration\ngradients, underscoring the importance of the balance between sodium and\npotassium in sustaining life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tight control of cell\nmembrane potential is critical for heart function, as well as nerve impulse\ntransmission and muscle contraction.&nbsp;\nSodium concentration in plasma modulates the volume of water retained in\nthe blood, and therefore the \"pressure\" on the membrane walls, known\nas blood pressure. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sodium is essential to\nmaintain the water distribution in the body (or water balance) and to maintain\na stable level of blood pressure.&nbsp; Sodium\nallows muscle contraction.&nbsp; It is\nessential to ensure the transmission of the nervous influx to the cell\nmembranes and muscle contraction, called the muscle function. The sodium\nconcentration outside the cells is tightly regulated by renal function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because the sodium\noutside the cells tends to migrate inside the cells, a sodium \u2013potassium\npump&nbsp; exists at the cell membranes to\nhold permanently the sodium concentration outside the cell. Sodium is only half\nof the story. Every mineral in the body is supposed to be balanced by at least\none other.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sodium must be balanced\nwith potassium. When sodium and potassium are properly balanced in the body,\nsodium will not raise blood pressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Potassium &nbsp;</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">is absolutely essential for the\ntonicity of the heart muscle tissue.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potassium is sodium\u2019s partner .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sodium -Potassium pump maintains electrolyte gradient in the 100\ntrillion cells. Potassium is the mineral that gets things moving.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potassium is known as\nan anion when it is broken down because it has more electrons than protons and\ncarries a negative charge. Sodium is known as a cation because it has more\nprotons than electrons and carries a positive charge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When there is ample\npotassium inside of your cells and sodium outside of your cells, proper cell\nsignaling from your nervous system can take place.&nbsp;&nbsp; Magnesium plays a large role in the\nutilization of potassium; it modulates a primary potassium transport system in\nand out of individual cells, and is crucial in preventing intracellular\npotassium loss. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium provides for\noptimum utilization of potassium and protects stores of potassium from\ndepletion. Magnesium is necessary for the function of the sodium/ potassium\npump.&nbsp; If a magnesium deficiency occurs,\nthen pumping sodium out of the cell and pumping potassium into the cell is\nimpaired.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prescription diuretics\ntend to deplete magnesium and potassium. In this situation, magnesium intake\ncan normalize both magnesium and potassium levels in the muscle . Potassium is\nunable to cross the cell membrane on its own, and requires magnesium to unlock\nthe door for its entrance. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the cell membrane\nis open, the cell can absorb all of the potassium it needs for a proper\nbalance. This process of achieving sodium and potassium balance accounts for 20\nto 40 percent of the resting energy your body expends, demonstrating how\ncrucial it is to healthy body function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Warning symptoms of\npotassium deficiency include abnormally dry skin, acne, chills, cognitive\nimpairment, constipation, depression, diarrhea, diminished reflexes, edema,\nnervousness, excessive thirst, glucose intolerance, growth impairment,\nhypoglycemia, high cholesterol levels, insomnia, low blood pressure, muscular\nfatigue, headaches, salt retention and hypersensitivity to salt, and\nrespiratory distress.&nbsp; Hormone\nfluctuation may also result in reduced levels of potassium.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you cut your\nsodium intake, your body will quickly compensate by holding more sodium in and\nreleasing potassium out thereby decreasing fluid inside the muscle cell. When\nyou increase your sodium intake your body will compensate by holding more\npotassium in (increasing intra-muscular fluid) and increasing the excretion of\nsodium.&nbsp; Ions are transported so rapidly\nin our body that the nerve cells carry messages to any point in the body in as\nlittle as 1/1000th of a second.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium deficiency\nwill always be followed by potassium deficiency secondarily and because\npotassium and magnesium are the most important intracellular cations--\npotassium and magnesium deficiency first of all is a deficiency of the cell.\nCucumbers are rich in potassium help control fluid balance within and outside\nour cells. Potassium works in sodium-potassium pumps in cell walls which control\nintake of nutrients and excretion of cellular metabolic wastes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a critical\nprocess for those suffering the imbalance that leads to cancer cell overgrowth.\n. Potassium is also critical in transmitting electrical energy throughout our\nnervous system. Sodium and potassium are both minerals essential to water\nbalance and healthy nerve function.&nbsp; High\nsodium levels and low potassium intake leads to high blood pressure and heart\ndisease. Use of diuretics or laxatives lowers potassium levels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caffeine, tobacco and\nheavy sugar consumption reduce potassium absorption. Mental and physical stress\ncan also lead to low potassium levels. Potassium is alkaline and constitutes 5%\nof the total mineral content of your body. It\u2019s easily absorbed, but almost 90%\nof it is excreted through the kidneys. It\u2019s also vital in the elimination of\nbody wastes. Potassium will also be lost from cellular spaces if an excessive\nloss of sodium occurs, and a magnesium deficiency contributes to potassium\nloss.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potassium depletion can\ncause problems within your body and lead to symptoms such as:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fatigue<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dry skin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muscle weakness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Slow reflexes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If these symptoms are\nignored, potassium depletion can lead to heart problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">is essential for the flow of electrical\nenergy throughout the body.&nbsp; It is a\nmuscle constrictor.&nbsp; Ionic ( the form in\nnatural salt) calcium is one of the most important transfer agents for bringing\nnutrients into the cell.&nbsp; Calcium is\npro-inflammatory.&nbsp; However calcium is\nregulated and controlled by magnesium.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium represents\nstructure, compressive strength, and stability in the body. Calcium is also a\nbuffer element and&nbsp; a damper.&nbsp; It is very alkaline-forming in most\ncompounds. .&nbsp; Calcium is found mainly\noutside of the cells.&nbsp; Calcium is\nconstipating.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium is hydrophobic,\nwhile magnesium is hydrophilic ( loves water ). Calcium is required for nerve\nconduction and relaxes the muscles. Calcium and Magnesium act together to help\nregulate the body's nerve and muscle tone.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In many nerve cells,\nmagnesium serves as a chemical gate blocker - as long as there is enough\nmagnesium around, calcium can't rush into the nerve cell and activate the\nnerve. This gate blocking by magnesium helps keep the nerve relaxed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium&nbsp; promotes blood coagulation , while magnesium\ninhibits it. If you take high amounts of calcium daily, you may have a\nmagnesium deficiency. Calcium and magnesium compete for the same absorption\nchannels, so too much of one will preclude the other from being properly\nabsorbed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The total calcium content\nof cow\u2019s milk is high, but the acidic nature of milk may not lend itself to\nproper calcium assimilation.&nbsp; Like I said\nbefore cow\u2019s milk has a Calcium Magnesium ratio of 10:1.&nbsp; Too much cow\u2019s milk will lower magnesium\nlevels . The correct balance of calcium and magnesium can rectify&nbsp; osteoporosis, heart disease, blood pressure,\ndepression, and anxiety.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High calcium intake\nblocks magnesium absorption. Magnesium is needed to carry calcium into your\nbones. Calcium causes contraction in skeletal muscle fibers, and magnesium\ncauses relaxation. When there is too much calcium and insufficient magnesium\ninside a cell, you can get sustained muscle contraction: twitches, spasms and\neven convulsions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smooth muscles directed\nby too much calcium and insufficient magnesium can tighten the bronchial tract,\ncausing asthma; cause cramping in the uterus and painful periods; and cause\nspasms in blood vessels, resulting in hypertension.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium and magnesium work\nso closely together that the lack of magnesium immediately diminishes the\neffectiveness of calcium. Adequate levels of magnesium are essential for the\nabsorption and metabolism of calcium.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">Magnesium</span></span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> relaxes you, helps improve digestion,\nincreases alkalinity of the blood and flexibility of the tissues. It is a\nmuscle relaxant.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium is found in\ngreater quantity inside the cells. Magnesium is critical for the assimilation\nof calcium into the bones and is crucial for regular heart function. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its deficiency lead to\nconstipation. Magnesium is anti-inflammatory and a de-toxifier. Magnesium is\nthe master molecule of the human body and is needed in over 300 different\nprocess the body performs. It is the catalyst of life.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium is vital for\nthe absorption of calcium into our bones.&nbsp;\nLack of Magnesium impacts our cell\u2019s efficiency and duration of its\nuseful life. The main reason for magnesium deficiency in the human body is\nstress, as stress causes Magnesium to be flushed out through the urine or\nbowels . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deficiency of magnesium\ncauses the body to accumulate toxins, degenerate quickly and premature aging\nleading to a host of other diseases.&nbsp;\nOptimum daily amount of Magnesium is 700 mg per day.&nbsp; Low magnesium intake is associated with\nmuscle spasm, tremors and convulsions.&nbsp;\nAthletes use magnesium to increase energy and endurance. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium plays an\nimportant role in carbohydrate metabolism. It also influences the release and\nactivity of insulin, the hormone that helps control blood glucose (sugar)\nlevels. Low blood levels of magnesium (hypomagnesemia) are frequently seen in\nindividuals with type 2 diabetes.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If there is not enough\nmagnesium to do this job, both insulin and glucose become elevated. The excess\nglucose gets stored as fat and contributes to obesity.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium is essential\nfor proper electrical and neurotransmitter function in the brain.&nbsp; It help prevents cognitive decline and\nimprove brain plasticity to better deal with stress and anxiety.&nbsp; Magnesium plays an important role in\nregulating blood pressure. A diet with high magnesium, potassium, and calcium,\nand low sodium and fat is ideal for lowering blood pressure.&nbsp; Diuretics can cause Magnesium deficiency. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coconut water is an\nexcellent health drink.&nbsp;&nbsp; It has Calcium\n2%, Magnesium 9%, Potassium5%.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nMagnesium compounds keep calcium in solution.&nbsp; If you are deficient in magnesium, you can\nget kidney or gall stones that contain insoluble forms of calcium.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium represents a\ncongealing or cementing quality, while magnesium represents dissolution or\nflexibility.&nbsp; Magnesium is a\nlaxative.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium is involved\nin nerve and muscle function.&nbsp; Magnesium\ndeficiency can trigger muscle tension, muscle soreness, muscle spasms, muscle\ncramps, and muscle fatigue.&nbsp;&nbsp; Magnesium\nactivates the enzymes necessary for a number of physiological functions,\nincluding neuromuscular contractions, heart and cardiovascular function, and\nthe regulation of the acid-alkaline balance in the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is necessary for the\nmetabolism of carbohydrates, amino acids and fats; also for energy production,\nand the utilization of calcium, phosphorus, sodium, and potassium.&nbsp; Magnesium helps utilize B-complex vitamins,\nvitamin C, and vitamin E.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium absorption\nwhen ingested is carrier-mediated and is influenced by transit time through the\ngut, dietary intake of magnesium, and the amounts of phosphorous and calcium in\nthe diet&nbsp; These minerals compete for\nabsorption sites in the intestinal mucosa.&nbsp;\nExcess magnesium that is not deposited in bone or retained in tissue is\nexcreted through the urine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alcoholism, renal\ndisease, diabetes mellitus may all cause a magnesium deficiency to occur.\nMagnesium helps blood pressure become and stay regulated, reduces the formation\nof plaque in arteries, and reduces spasms. Magnesium prevents excessive amounts\nof calcium from damaging heart cells. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It also dilates your\narteries, allowing better blood flow. Depression and anxiety can begin with an\nimbalance of calcium and magnesium. Too much calcium can contribute to\ndepression and irritability, whereas magnesium helps your brain make the\ncalming chemical called dopamine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium, not calcium,\nis the mineral that calms your emotions as well as your muscles.&nbsp; Serotonin is a natural antidepressant, but\nyour brain needs magnesium in order to make serotonin.&nbsp; Low serotonin production can cause a number\nof symptoms including depression, obsessive thinking, and anxiety. When you're\nunder stress your body loses more magnesium than usual.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress causes your\nadrenal glands to produce more adrenaline and other hormones, like cortisol,\ncausing more magnesium excretion. When your magnesium is low, your adrenal\nglands produce still more cortisol, which in turn decreases your levels of\nDHEA, -- an anti-aging hormone .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress causes fatty\nacids to be released in your body and attach themselves to magnesium, which\nmakes it more difficult for magnesium to be absorbed.&nbsp; Magnesium regulates the enzyme that makes\ncholesterol. The body makes cholesterol for a reason. All steroid hormones that\nrun our bodies (stress hormones, sex hormones, and so forth) are ultimately\nmade from cholesterol.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium is essential\nfor proper insulin levels. You cannot produce insulin, you cannot secrete\ninsulin, and your cells cannot recognize insulin without proper levels of\nMagnesium.&nbsp; An imbalance of too much\nCalcium and too little magnesium causes depression. In USA&nbsp; the top 20 highest-selling drugs are\nantidepressants ,which could be well solved with a proper diet and exercise ,\ninstead of continuing with junk food.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">72% of Migraines are\nrelated Calcium magnesium imbalance. Magnesium is required for the body to\nproduce and store energy. Without magnesium there is no energy, no movement, no\nlife. It is that simple.&nbsp; Magnesium permits\na small amount of calcium to enter a nerve cell, just enough to allow\nelectrical transmission along the nerves to and from the brain, then forces it\nback outside. Even our thoughts, via brain neurons, are dependent on magnesium.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium is indicative\nin playing a role in the prevention and/or treatment of the following health\nconditions:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alcoholism<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
