, serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WHISTLE BLOWERS HAVE SPOKEN !<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>ALL IN GOOD TIME !!</b></span></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><b style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: Tahoma, Calibri, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">International call:<br />Support people\u2019s war in India !</b><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: Tahoma, Calibri, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot; , &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;geneva&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">In India an impetuous people\u2019s war against the Indian </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot; , &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;geneva&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">bourgeoisie</span><span style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot; , &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;geneva&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\"> and the imperialism is developing and spreading more and more in nearly one third of the districts of the country.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: Tahoma, Calibri, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot; , &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;geneva&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">It is not simply a guerilla waged by few thousands of fighters, coming from the castes and tribal areas of the country. It is a real people\u2019s war, led by the Party of the </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot; , &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;geneva&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">proletariat </span><span style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot; , &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;geneva&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">of India, the Communist Party of India (Maoist), in which are involved \u2013 or is supported by \u2013 millions of poor peasants, women, \u201cuntouchables\u201d, fighting to free themselves and it has already took big areas throughout a dozen of states of the Indian Federation.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: Tahoma, Calibri, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot; , &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;geneva&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">The people\u2019s war began where the root of the riot, the poverty, the tribal and capitalistic exploitation, the caste oppression, the plundering of the natural resources were deeper and therefore the contradictions brought by the Indian capitalism ruled by the imperialism were sharper. Today this people\u2019s war is winning masses of young people, students, democratic and revolutionary intellectuals also in the cities and gains attention and support over the world.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: Tahoma, Calibri, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot; , &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;geneva&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">Against the people\u2019s war, the Indian State, supported by the imperialists, launched a giant repressive offensive called \u201cGreen Hunt\u201d, a real manhunt that hits the poor masses in India as animals to exterminate. The Indian State launched an internal military offensive against the people, waged by hi-tech-armed troops, police units and paramilitary militias, in order to spread terror and genocide in the villages, with raids, crop destroying, massive rapes and killings, selective murders, mass detentions and disappearing \u2013 like the recent genocide offensive occurred in Sri Lanka against the Tamil people and liberation movement.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: Tahoma, Calibri, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot; , &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;geneva&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">All this with the illusion to drown in blood the struggle of the people for their liberation.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: Tahoma, Calibri, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot; , &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;geneva&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">With the silent/consent of the imperialist governments of US, Europe, Russia, and their mass-media, the crimes of the Indian State found the internal opposition of a wide front of intellectuals \u2013 including the prominent representative of the world anti-globalization movement, the writer Arundhati Roy. And in all countries of the world political activists denounced those crimes and mobilized to stop \u201cGreen Hunt\u201d.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: Tahoma, Calibri, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot; , &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;geneva&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">A world campaign of information and solidarity has been launched by ICAWI.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: Tahoma, Calibri, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;\">But we need more than the condemnation of the crimes of the counter-revolution in India.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #f2f6f8; color: #4e4e4e; font-family: Tahoma, Calibri, Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2315516026647341295\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_11M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/communist-maoist-naxalite-movements-in_11.html?showComment=1473626358157#c2315516026647341295\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 12, 2016 at 2:09 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_11MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nOUR BONG PRESIDENT PRANAB MUKHERJEE WILL BE JUDGED BY HISTORY AS THE WORST EVER . .<br />\n<br />\nHE DOES NOT KNOW HIS OWN POWERS WHEN IT COMES TO COLLEGIUM JUDGES SYSTEM , WHICH IS AGAINST OUR CONSTITUTION . .<br />\n<br />\nArticle 124(2) in The Constitution Of India 1949<br />\n(2) Every Judge of the Supreme Court shall be appointed by the President by warrant under his hand and seal after consultation with such of the Judges of the Supreme Court and of the High Courts in the States as the President may deem necessary for the purpose and shall hold office until he attains the age of sixty five years: Provided that in the case of appointment of a Judge other than the chief Justice, the chief Justice of India shall always be consulted:<br />\n(a) a Judge may, by writing under his hand addressed to the President, resign his office;<br />\n(b) a Judge may be removed from his office in the manner provided in clause ( 4 )<br />\n<br />\nThe Lok Sabha on 13 August 2014 and the Rajya Sabha on 14 August 2014 passed the National Judicial Appointments Commission (NJAC) Bill, 2014 to scrap the collegium system of appointment of Judges. The President of India has given his assent to the National Judicial Appointments Commission Bill, 2014 on 31 December 2014, after which the bill has been renamed as the National Judicial Appointments Commission Act, 2014.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE THREE JUDGES CASE CANNOT OVER RULE THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThe Supreme Court shockingly struck down the entire NJAC law, holding that the law would affect judicial independence and the primacy of the judiciary, which are basic features of the Constitution.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Court did not even attempt to read down the law to make it constitutional. THIS IS PUNISHABLE AND THE JUDGES INVOLVED MUST FACE THE LAW.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nAfter the NJAC verdict, the government is asking the Collegium to do what the Third Judges case had directed the Collegium to do, namely to record and send to the government the views including the dissent of any member. Chelameswar\u2019s dissent is a protest against the Collegium not recording and sending the views of all to the government as mandated by the Third Judges case. This in short is the reason for the stand off between the judiciary and the executive today<br />\n<br />\nParagraph 26 of the judgment in the Third Judges case makes it clear that an appointment can only be made if it is unanimously reiterated.<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, if the collegium does not keep a record of its proceedings, how will the government know whether the original recommendation, or its reiteration when asked to reconsider, is a unanimous one?<br />\n<br />\nThe Supreme Court rejected the National Judicial Appointments Commission (NJAC) Act and the 99th Constitutional Amendment which sought to give politicians and civil society a final say in the appointment of judges to the highest courts.<br />\n<br />\nThe Collegium system is one where the Chief Justice of India and a forum of four senior-most judges of the Supreme Court recommend appointments and transfers of judges. However, it has no place in the Indian Constitution. The system was evolved through Supreme Court judgments in the Three Judges Cases (October 28, 1998)<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS NJAC--<br />\n<br />\nIt will consist of six people \u2014 the Chief Justice of India, the two most senior judges of the Supreme Court, the Law Minister, and two \u2018eminent persons\u2019. These eminent persons are to be nominated for a three-year term by a committee consisting of the Chief Justice, the Prime Minister, and the Leader of the Opposition in the Lok Sabha, and are not eligible for re-nomination.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">OUR JUDICIARY IS NO LONGER TRUSTED BY \"WE THE PEOPLE\".</span></b><br />\n<br />\nOUR PRESIDENT IS USELESS .<br />\n<br />\nread all 7 parts of the post below--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mining activity forms\nthe main cornerstone of the Maoist finances. The Maoists and naxlas milk the\nmining industry in the red corridor<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Big corporate houses\ntoo have become a source of large funds that finds itself in the Maoistcoffers.\nWhy are the corporates funding the Maoists? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money is extorted in\nexchange of which the Maoists guarantee no hurdles from their side. There has\nbeen political will to stop this. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These transactions\nbetween the Maoists and the corporate houses are more of a transaction of convenience\nand mutual self-interest. &nbsp;So, while the\nMaoists extract huge sums from the corporates, they spend a sufficient portion\nof it to fight the security forces and the government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contrary to popular\nbelief, the Maoists have created a&nbsp; self-sustaining\nfinancial empire. Not only that, they have also kept themselves abreast with\nthe&nbsp; latest technologies and equipment in\nwarding off any offensive from the security forces.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Condoms are part of the outdoor off location shoot store inventory ..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women have had to rough\nit out in Maoists camps, a case in point being that of Shobha Mandi alias Uma\n(23). She was sexually exploited repeatedly by senior leaders, which ultimately\nled her to desert the camp and surrender.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was first raped at the age of 17\nby a leader named Bikash, and underwent repeated sexual humiliation at the\nhands of others in the future too. Uma\u2019s case is one among the many women who\nhave had to pass through such ordeal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">An important point that\nemerged from Uma\u2019s submission was that women felt protected only if they chose\nto enter \u2018companionship\u2019 with a senior leader or entered marital union with\nhim. Or she becomes open maal &nbsp;( common sex doll property ) if she is attractive .</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-M4uI1ufdeas/V9XH1O1oIQI/AAAAAAABLxo/7paO11AKEXcXsNMkGPdBraYKKGCZd3q_QCLcB/s1600/FemaleNaxalite1S1-777x437.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-M4uI1ufdeas/V9XH1O1oIQI/AAAAAAABLxo/7paO11AKEXcXsNMkGPdBraYKKGCZd3q_QCLcB/s640/FemaleNaxalite1S1-777x437.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such union also meant\nthat they rose up the ranks faster. This phenomenon has been found to hold true\nas many women leaders caught by security personnel are wives or \u2018partners\u2019 of\ntop Maoist commanders and members of the Politburo, the highest decision making\nbody of the CPI (Maoist).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSex is demanded at gun-point. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Islamic separatists (\nISI controlled ) &nbsp;and Maoists sleeper\ncells have joint operations in Bangalore and certain big cities like Hyderabad.\nA lot of these commies in Bangalore are IT experts .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The well-known global\nintelligence company, Stratfor, had warned as early as 2009 that the ISI is\nforging an alliance with the Maoists in a bid to destabilise the Indian state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two sleeper cell Al\nBadr jehadis arrested in Bangalore on October 25, 2006 - 24-year-old Karachi\nresident Fahad and his accomplice Ali Hussain - had acquired expertise in\nexplosives making.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A CD recovered from\nthem had allegedly revealed designs of the group to blow up important\ninstallations, including the Karnataka Vidhan Sabha and the High Court<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TRAINING VIDEOS FOR\nNAXALS/ MAOISTS ARE TRANSMITTED BY COMMIE FEMALE JNU PROFESSORS BY INSERTING\nPROTECTED MICRO SD ( THE ONES YOU INSERT IN YOUR MOBILE AND TAB ) INTO THEIR\nVAGINAS .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALWAYS CHECK NAXALS\nLEADERS MOBILE PHONE FOR MICRO SD CARDS .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In January 2007, the\nBhopal police raided a Maoist sleeper cell in the vicinity of the Bharat Heavy\nElectricals Ltd (BHEL) facility in the city. The cell was disguised as a\nprivately owned ancillary unit. In this garb, it was engaged in the manufacture\nof fairly sophisticated weaponry.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So impressive was the cache that the Indian\nOrdnance official deputed to help the police team collate the weapons\nsardonically exclaimed that the Maoists should be invited to help the Indian\nArmy.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Heading the Maoist\nfactory in Bhopal was Chakka Krishna, an engineer from Andhra Pradesh who had\nearlier worked in a BHEL ancillary unit in Hyderabad. Krishna was a member of\nthe Maoist Central Technical Committee, the rebel movements very own\nmilitary-industrial complex.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His Bhopal operation resembled a regular SME. Machines\nwere acquired from legitimate suppliers as far away as Surat, and then\nreverse-engineered. These were used to make munitions.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2008, nearly more\nthan 500 Maoists/ Islamic terrorist comine &nbsp;had undergone training with the banned\nStudents Islamic Movement of India in the Vagamon hills on the Idduki-Kottayam\nborder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The arrest of\nLashkar-e-Tayyeba\u2019s notorious Nepal-based head, Mohammed Omer Madani, by Delhi\nPolice in 2009 further confirmed the ISI\u2019s support to the Maoist insurgency.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His diaries also gave a clear idea of the plans being made by the ISI to\ndismember India through Maoist insurgents. Madani himself had carried out\nextensive research into the Maoists\u2019 organisational structure and functioning,\nand had also been receiving fake currency to fund terror activities in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Madani\u2019s 2009 arrest\nwas followed by the arrest of six members of the Dawood ga</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ng by Bangalore\npolice in August 2010.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These men were in touch with at least two top Maoist\nleaders in Bangalore, making it amply clear that D Company was now making\ninroads into the southern States of Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka and Kerala as\nwell. Then, in October 2010, two Muslim militants belonging to a larger group\nfrom Mallalapuram in Kerala were killed in the Lolab mountains of Kashmir.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE ARE HAWALA\nCHANNELS IN BANGALORE.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Slain Maoist leader\nKoteswara Rao, popularly known as Kishenji, had made clear that he did not\nsupport the manner in which the 26 /11 Mumbai massacre was carried out as \u201cmost\nof the victims were Muslims\u201d. In June 2009, he also openly declared his support\nfor the Islamic upsurge in India<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kannada film actor\nRajkumar was kidnapped by forest brigand Veerappan on July 30, 2000 during the\ncourse of an armed attack on a farmhouse belonging to the actor in Gajanur,\nTamil Nadu, India.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rajkumar was released\nby Veerappan on November 15, 2000 after spending 108 days in his custody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The kidnapping resulted\nin the further deterioration of already strained relations between the Indian\nstates of Tamil Nadu and Karnataka and created a tense situation in the two\nstates\u2014a Hegelian dialectic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GOBtnv9VDho/V9bg4isMVUI/AAAAAAABLzI/1BGncDMBTMc7LHKaXkGS946qCiZCYRzUQCLcB/s1600/clinton-fresnel-pr33ism-glasses-620x446.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/communist-maoist-naxalite-movements-in_11.html?showComment=1473698542292#c949064586132824913\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 12, 2016 at 10:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_40MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME WHAT TYPE OF GLASS IS HILLARY CLINTON IS USING ON HER LEFT EYE.<br />\n<br />\nshe has a bad left ear too . . this is NOT a coincidence<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A FRESNEL LENS, APPLIED ONLY ON ONE EYE TO MANAGE DOUBLE VISION.<br />\n<br />\nTypically, the nondominant eye is chosen for the application of the Fresnel because of the effect on visual acuity. Horizontal and vertical prism can be achieved through the oblique application of an appropriate prism onto the spectacles. In cases of reduced visual acuity in one eye, for example, from macular disease or optic neuropathy, the Fresnel can be effectively used to eliminate diplopia<br />\n<br />\nA stroke is an episode of decreased blood flow to the tissues of the brain. This decreased blood flow can be caused by a blockage in a blood vessel (an ischemic stroke) or from damage to a blood vessel that causes bleeding from the blood vessel and prevents the area supplied by that vessel from receiving adequate blood flow (a hemorrhagic stroke).<br />\n<br />\n\"Ischemic\" meaning a decrease in blood supply to a part of the body, caused by constriction or blockage of the blood vessels..<br />\n<br />\n\"Hemorrhagic\" means excessive discharge of blood from the blood vessels or, literally, \"blood bursting forth\"..<br />\n<br />\nWhat Happens During a Stroke?<br />\n<br />\nDuring a stroke, the part of the brain that is affected receives insufficient oxygen and nutrients. This tissue is ischemic, meaning it receives insufficient blood flow to function normally. Ischemic tissue is injured but not dead, and the tissue injury from ischemia can be reversible.<br />\n<br />\nIf an area in the brain is infarcted, some brain tissue has died, and the effects of the stroke will be permanent.<br />\n<br />\nIf an area in the brain is ischemic, meaning it is injured but not dead, there may be some recovery of function.<br />\n<br />\nIf the stroke-like episode lasts less than 24 hours and the symptoms resolve, the event is called a transient ischemic attack, or TIA.<br />\n<br />\nStrokes can affect vision in a number of ways, including decreased vision and DOUBLE vision.<br />\n<br />\nDecreased vision is caused by damage to the fibers that transmit visual information from the eyes to the brain. This can occur in a variety of locations, since the nerve fibers that transmit vision have a long course from the eyes to the rearmost part of the brain, called the occipital lobe.<br />\n<br />\nDouble vision is caused by damage to nerves responsible for moving the eyes and ensuring that both eyes are aligned (i.e. looking at the same place).<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/DfqaYpXYSDY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/DfqaYpXYSDY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qUYU5WV0V5Q/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/qUYU5WV0V5Q?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Below: If Hillary Clinton has to live longer than two years--she must do pranayama ( for Nitric oxide MMMMM &nbsp;) and drink Vedic organic beet root juice.</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-decoration: none;\">September 12, 2016 at 10:08 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_41MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHi Captain,<br />\n<br />\nYou are right about the Hegelian Dialectic (Maoist - Naxal - Islamist Nexus) regarding the Cauvery water dispute. As per intelligence inputs, BREAK INDIA forces are on full swing to drive wedges between Indians and instigate violence between Tamils and Kannadigas.<br />\n<br />\n####################<br />\n<br />\nCAUVERY DISPUTE: ROGUE ELEMENTS PLANNED BLOODBATH, REPLAY OF 1991 RIOTS<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.deccanchronicle.com/nation/current-affairs/110916/cauvery-bandh-some-wanted-bloodbath-repeat-of-1991.html<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThere was an alleged sinister plan by some vested interests to \u201creplay\u201d the infamous December 1991 Cauvery riots on Friday, especially in Bengaluru, during the Karnataka bandh on the Cauvery water issue, an official source in state police department<br />\n<br />\nThere were specific intelligence inputs on massive efforts from some sectors to replay the December 1991 bloodbath on Friday.<br />\n<br />\nThe Chief Minister was constantly briefed about the intelligence inputs and last minute decisions were made in Vidhana Soudha to seek Central police forces for deployment in the city. In one night, intervening September 8 and 9, the police had picked up 596 anti-social elements from across the city and put them under preventive custody. They were released on Friday late evening,\u201d the officer added.<br />\n<br />\nThere were credible inputs that some anti-social elements would indulge in large scale violence leading to loss of lives and property. Besides the bandh the police also had to ensure a peaceful Ganesha procession on Tannery Road the same night. Any spillover from the bandh violence would have proved very dear to the State administration. A contingency plan was immediately drawn; for massive deployment and bundobast.<br />\n<br />\nThe State police requisitioned Central police forces and the reserve police forces from Kerala and Andhra Pradesh.<br />\n<br />\nIn the infamous 1991 Cauvery riots, which are said to be the worst in the history of Karnataka, 28 people were killed in the city and thousands were injured and displaced from across the state. Thousands of Tamil families fled Karnataka in fear. All educational institutions in the state were shut down for nearly a month. The loss to property was estimated to be around Rs 19 crore.<br />\n<br />\n####################<br />\n<br />\nPM Modi and Home Minister Rajnath Singh must speak live on TV regarding Cauvery issue and must appeal for calm and peace across Karnataka and Tamil Nadu and must instruct the police of both states to take strict actions against vandals.<br />\n<br />\nSooner the JNU type univs (Den of Naxal and Maoist terrorists where violent ideologies are bred) are shut down, the better.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_41BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; BR Ambedkar- , EVR Periyar\nstudents unions in universities are now controlled from abroad.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;For the Maoists, this offers an opportunity to\nget the Dalit communities in their fold. &nbsp;</span></span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">ONLY CAPTAIN AND TWO CADETS WERE INDIAN , REST ALL WERE FILIPINO.</span></span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS IS NOT SIMPLE WITH FILIPINO CREW, &nbsp;AS USUALLY THE CAPTAIN WILL GET KNIFED. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">CAPTAIN AND TWO CADETS SLEPT WITH OPEN DOORS AT NIGHT ( MY ORDERS ) &nbsp;, BEFORE I CRUSHED THE MUTINY TO PULP THE NEXT DAY. &nbsp;</span></span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/the-captain-does-it-his-way-crushing.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/the-captain-does-it-his-way-crushing.html</a><o:p></o:p><br />\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">STRENGTH OF A LEADER IS RESPECTED &nbsp;BOTH BY FRIENDS AND FOES . .&nbsp;</span></span></b></span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; NOT THE FARMERS.<br />\n<br />\nFarmers on both sides of the border (who are the ones who are mostly affected) are only doing peaceful protest while those who indulge in violence are mostly university / college going youths in the city.<br />\n<br />\nOne can also notice many skull caps (Muslim youths) in those videos who indulge in violence and vandalism across bangalore. Strange that Muslims in karnataka (who are not part of the agriculture / farming sector) are shedding crocodile tears engaging in violence and riots.<br />\n<br />\nWon't be surprised if all this was an instigation by a larger nexus between JNU Commies - Maoists - Naxals - Pakistan ISI - Islamist Jihadis - BR Ambedkar / EVR Periyar student union types.<br />\n<br />\nFew years back in 2012, after there was a communal incident between muslims and north east people settled in bangalore, there were rumours by forces who tried to create communal tension which resulted in North East people fleeing Bangalore in large numbers to save themselves from attacks by Muslims.<br />\n<br />\n####################<br />\n<br />\nAfter rumours, northeast people flee Bangalore<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.thehindu.com/news/national/karnataka/after-rumours-northeast-people-flee-bangalore/article3776549.ece<br />\n<br />\nIndians from Assam flee 'Muslim threats' in Bangalore<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.theguardian.com/world/2012/aug/16/indians-assam-muslim-threats-bangalore<br />\n<br />\n####################<br />\n<br />\nClearly there are Break India forces at work trying to wreck havoc and disrupt the unity among Indians.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_64BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; letter-spacing: inherit; margin: inherit; padding: inherit;\">Tuesday, 13 September 2016</span></h2>\n<div class=\"date-posts\" style=\"color: #222222; font-family: Georgia, Utopia, &quot;Palatino Linotype&quot;, Palatino, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 19.6px;\">\n<div class=\"post-outer\">\n<div class=\"post hentry uncustomized-post-template\" itemprop=\"blogPost\" itemscope=\"itemscope\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/BlogPosting\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; min-height: 0px; position: relative;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #fff9ee;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/null\" name=\"9125000252607407882\"></a></span><br />\n<div class=\"post-header\" style=\"background-color: #fff9ee; font-size: 12.6px; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0px 0px 1.5em;\">\n<div class=\"post-header-line-1\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"post-body entry-content\" id=\"post-body-9125000252607407882\" itemprop=\"description articleBody\" style=\"font-size: 15.4px; line-height: 1.4; position: relative; width: 570px;\">\n<div dir=\"ltr\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #fff9ee;\">The modern King Canute</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #fff9ee;\">The Supreme Court's order to the Karnataka Government to release 12000 cusecs water daily to Tamilnadu reminds me of King Canute.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #fff9ee;\">He commanded that his throne should be set on the sea shore, when the tide began to rise. And then he spoke to the rising sea saying \u201cYou are part of my dominion, and the ground that I am seated upon is mine, nor has anyone disobeyed my orders with impunity. Therefore, I order you not to rise onto my land, nor to wet the clothes or body of your Lord\u201d. But the sea carried on rising as usual without any reverence for his person, and soaked his feet and legs.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Our Supreme Court is the modern King Canute. Although its Judges regard themselves as Emperors ( not just kings )</span><span style=\"background-color: #fff9ee;\">, often nobody pays any heed to them, as is being witnessed in Karnataka and Tamilnadu today.</span><br />\n<a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Cauvery-row-Apex-court-reads-the-riot-act-to-Karnataka-vandals/articleshow/54300816.cms\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"background-color: #fff9ee; color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\" target=\"_blank\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Cauvery-row-Apex-court-reads-the-riot-act-to-Karnataka-vandals/articleshow/54300816.cms</a></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">WHERE IS THE LEADERSHIP DURING AN EXTREME CRISIS ?</span><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHY WERE BENAMI MEDIA TV CHANNELS ALLOWED TO DO EXTREME RABBLE ROUSING , &nbsp;THREE DAYS AGO?</span></span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THESE DESH DROHI TV CHANNELS WHIPPED UP PASSIONS-- I HAVE LOST RESPECT FOR MOHANDAS PAI . . .</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: VENKAIH NAIDU ALLOWED BENAMI TV STATIONS TO AIR TAMILIANS / KANNADIGAS BEING BEATEN UP AND BEING DEGRADED AS HUMANS?</span></span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />WE WANT THESE TV MEDIA BARONS TO BE ARRESTED AND FINED</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">BARKHA DUTT HAD AIRED A BURNT I know several ex-JNU\nstudents who became sailors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This JNU strategy based\non creating extremist student unions which espoused the Left cause.&nbsp; Thse student unions with the connivance of\nCommie professors created a cadre of storm troopers to mould mindsets early.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was no shortage\nof causes in India as there were issues of caste, land, disparity, water and\nmuch else. Many initial\nsuccesses against the Maoists were frittered away due to fickle political\nconcerns, pressure from desh drohi International human right organizations, &nbsp;and lack of a coherent long-term strategy to\ncontain the Maoists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u201cblow hot, blow\ncold\u201d strategy of the State Government proved disastrous in the long term.\nSuccesses on the security front and the advantages accrued as a result were\noften nullified due to a soft political approach to the Maoists <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">with NHRC and\nCollegium Judiciary in cahoots.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>In Andhra Pradesh, the\nlate Chief Minister KAMMA N.T. India is the world\u2019s top supplier of affordable generic\nversions of drugs (for diseases such as cancer, diabetes, etc) under patent. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subramanian\u2019s\nprescriptions will inevitably put these drugs out of reach for crores of poor\nIndian patients. In March 2014, Subramanian submitted his testimony to the US\nCongress in writing: \u201cIf India does not address the problems created by Section\n3(d) of the patent legislation or by compulsory licensing for nonworking, the\nUnited States should consider initiating WTO disputes against India.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subramanian is an\nIndian who deposed before US Congress, egging the US to take action against\nIndia, unless India stops safeguarding the access of poor Indian citizens to\naffordable medicines, and agrees instead to sacrifice crores of Indian lives to\nthe greed of US Big Pharma. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 22 April 1969\n(Lenin's birthday), the AICCCR gave birth to the Communist Party of India\n(Marxist-Leninist) (CPI (ML)).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All India Coordination\nCommittee of Communist Revolutionaries was formed in 1967 as a pro-People's\nRepublic of China splinter group of Communist Party of India (Marxist)\n(CPI(M)). , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AICCCR claimed that the\nIndian political situation was ripe for armed revolution and denounced participation\nin the Electoral Politics<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chakravyuh, a film by\nPrakash Jha, was released in 2012. &nbsp;It\nrevolves around the theme of Naxalites, but received critical feedback for\nallegedly showing sympathy for Maoists. The Madhya Zonal Committee of the CPI\nMaoists, had expressed gratitude for the film<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prakash Jha contested\nand lost election to the Lok Sabha from his native Champaran in 2004. He again\nlost election to the Lok Sabha in 2009 as Lok Janashakti Party candidate from\nWest Champaran. He again contested 2014 Elections as a JD(U) Candidate from\nBettiah and fell PHUTT on his phukkin\u2019 phace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CPI chose Kakdwip\nin West Bengal as its main base to start an armed struggle.&nbsp; &nbsp;Krishna Binode Ray, the president of the\nBengal Provincial Kisan Sabha, reported that they want to transform the Tebhaga\nmovement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kakdwip was a\ncollection of isolated islands, far away from the administrative centres. &nbsp;&nbsp;It was almost inaccessible during the greater\npart of the year, especially in the monsoon. &nbsp;Some of its southern villages were about\ntwenty miles from the Kakdwip thana. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The only reason this\ngodforsaken place as chosen was because it wasan ideal place for arms smuggling\nand guerilla training, being surrounded on all sides by dense forest and a\nnumber of rivers;&nbsp; Lothian island to the\neast of Kakdwip was used for large-scale guerilla training:&nbsp; For murderer Naxals chased by police it would\nprovide a very good sanctuary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN THE EARLY SEVENTIES\nNAXALS AS PIRATES WOULD TRY TO STEAL MOORING ROPES WHEN THE SHIP ANCHORED OFF\nSAGAR ISLAND. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY WOULD ALSO STEAL GOLD&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">JEWELRY</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;FROM HINDU PILGRIM WOMEN AT SAGAR ISLAND GHATS ( GANGASAGAR ). &nbsp; &nbsp; THE COMMIE GOVT POLICE NEVER BOTHERED.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today there are too\nmany Bangladesi Islamic militants in Gangasagar area and there will soon be a\nmosque there with Mamata Bannerjee in power. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the event of Makar\nSankraman, last day of Paush month, lakhs of Hindu devotees come to this holy\nplace from every corner of India and abroad to take a holy dip in the\nconfluence of Ganga river and the Bay of Bengal.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9TQ-UpGTaH8/V9gF_Bf0vGI/AAAAAAABL1I/Mxj7BaQtGokmVFNhDwodDfs91tlt1WVeACLcB/s1600/ganga_sagar_dmela_01.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amnesty Internationals\nand human rights orgs cry , that there is&nbsp;\nis no regard for human rights in the RED CORRIDOR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">CONSTITUTION</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE DO NOT WANT THE\nCOLLEGIUM JUDCIARY TO DEAL WITH FOREIGN FUNDED INTERNAL THREATS TO THE\nWATAN.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE DON\u2019T TRUST OUR LAWYER TURNED JUDGE MELORDS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS WAS A TIME WHEN THE WHOLE WORLD WAS\nHINDU. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS WAS A TIME WHEN INDIA RULED THE WHOLE\nWORLD&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS WAS A TIME WHEN PATALA ( THERE IS NO\nHELL IN HINDUSIM ) WAS PERU AREA \u2013THE OTHER END OF THE PLANET.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">TO TELL THE TRUTH ASURAS ( DANAVAS ) WERE\nMORE ADVANCED THAN THE DEVAS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I AM A DANAVA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MAYA DANAVA WROTE THE SURYA SIDHANTA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Maya, Inca and Aztec civilizations were\nfounded by ancient Indians. The Mayan calendar , which everybody knows about ,\nis nothing but a calendar made by Maya Danava.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Western astrology takes the tropical\napproach, whereas Hindu astrology takes the ACCURATE sidereal one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sidereal time is a \"time scale that is\nbased on Earth's rate of rotation measured relative to the fixed stars\"\nrather than the sun.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hindu astronomy uses sidereal time which\ntakes into account the precession of the equinoxes\u2014though the white man tries\nto ridicule us for NOT knowing this\u2014 and that too after immorally after copying\nfrom us.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every calendar on this planet ,including the\nMayan calendar has been lifted from the Hindu calendar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Maya Danava\u2019s Surya Siddhanta\u2014Siderial year\nand modern Siderial year is same duration<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The sidereal day is the time it takes for the\nEarth to complete one rotation about its axis with respect to the \u2018fixed\u2019\nstars. &nbsp; &nbsp;By fixed, we mean that we treat the stars as if they were attached to an\nimaginary celestial sphere at a very large distance from the Earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A measurement of the sidereal day is made by\nnoting the time at which a particular star passes the celestial meridian (i.e.\ndirectly overhead) on two sucessive nights. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A mean sidereal day is 23 hours, 56 minutes,\n4.0916 seconds<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Our usual definition of an Earth day is 24\nhours, so the sidereal day is 4 minutes faster. This means that a particular\nstar will rise 4 minutes earlier every night, and is the reason why different\nconstellations are only visible at specific times of the year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ONAM AND VISHNU ARE CELEBRATED ONLY BY KERALA\n. &nbsp;FESTIVALS FROM YORE NEVER LIE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/04/vishu-new-year-festival-of-kerala-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/04/vishu-new-year-festival-of-kerala-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE WILL NOT ALLOW OUR ANCIENT HISTORY TO BE\nHIJACKED ANYMORE , EVEN BY HINDU CULTURAL TERRORISTS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVERY HINDU YAGNA WAS A BLOODLESS ONE\u2014ONLY GHEE\nWAS USED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NO HINDU YAGNA COULD BE DONE BY A MAN WHO WAS\nNOT MARRIED .&nbsp; A WIDOWER COULD NOT DO A\nHOMAM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ASHWAMEDHA YAGNA WAS A BLOODLESS \u201cVOTE OF\nCONFIDENCE\u201d\u2014TRANSPARENT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; THEY WERE GIVEN TO HIM BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO MAKE A KITCHIDI...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nExample?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nThe \u201ctheory of surplus value\u201d was already espoused by Pierre-Joseph Proudhon..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nThe theory of the \u201cimmiseration of the proletariat\u201d was espoused by Louis Blanc.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nThe theory of the \u201cwithering away of the State\u201d and the \u2018governing of men giving way to the administration of things\u2019 was espoused by Henri de Saint-Simon.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nThe theory that a relatively small vanguard should conspire to take over the State and usher in the dictatorship of the proletariat is lifted from works of Louis Auguste Blanqui.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nKarl Marx injected mindless Hegelian religious nonsense into his socialism. Marx clung so dearly to Hegel that he ended up espousing a sort of \u201cCalvinism without God,\u201d turning Marxism into a quasi-religious ideology..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nHis Hegelian ideology led him to espouse a most unscientific socialism. Marx called his theory \u201cscientific socialism,\u201d not because he followed the scientific method, but merely because it was dialectical and materialist.&nbsp;</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nDialectics is not scientific as much as practical. Materialism is a metaphysical creed, not science.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nMarx baby lifted from the works of Carl Menger and Murray Rothbard.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nMarx does not condemn the capitalist. Instead, he dissects the structural constraints inherent in the dominance of capital.</div>\n<span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: xx-small;\"></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: small;\">Marx gets overly caught up in economistic drivel and pedantic UNREADABLE nonsense, so as to sound like the intelligensia.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: small;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: xx-small;\"></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">To an intelligent man Marx sounds like a CUNT.</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: xx-small;\"></span><br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DARES ROMILA THAPAR, SUNEET VARMA, DANIEL RAJA , SITARAM YECURY, BRINDA KARAT , PRAKASH KARAT ETC TO DEBATE ON DAS CAPITAL LIVE ON TV... Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1525771090590#c7174753694009767256\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 8, 2018 at 2:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_4MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCommunism collapsed 3 decades ago\u2014but our JNU commie and pathetic commie leaders keep the ideology alive..<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s cousin JEW Karl Marx did not invent communism. Radicals, including Pierre-Joseph Proudhon (1809-65) and the Chartist movement in England, had long used language that modern-day readers would identify as \u201cMarxist\u201d\u2014\u201cto enjoy political equality, abolish property\u201d; \u201creserve army of labour\u201d and so forth.<br />\n<br />\nWhat, then, was his contribution?<br />\n<br />\nMuch of his time was spent disagreeing with other radicals, attacking Proudhon in particular, whom he likened to one of the \u201cbourgeois economists\u201d. Far more significantly, he attempted to provide an overall theoretical description of how capitalism worked, especially in Das Kapital, which was published in 1867.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's Das Kapital, fails to mention that money is printed out of thin air and keeps the name of his cousins, the Rothschilds, out of it, despite the fact that they were the richest and most powerful capitalist family in the whole world\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild hired Marx to draft a social doctrine to invert moral order for centralizing their nation state\u2019s wealth Into Rothschild controlled coffers... Marx saw free trade as positive because it undermines established nations and cultures.<br />\n<br />\nMillions of people are still under the misapprehension that Marxism / Communism is against profiteering dishonest banks and multi national companies.. The Rothschild banking family - the richest and most powerful banksters, for the past 200 years - financed Karl Marx's pretense of an attack on the profiteering dishonest.banksters, in order to fool the masses, and it worked. ..<br />\n<br />\nMarx's hidden message was: \u201cForget your individual rights and privileges and trust in the State and the Trade Unions, and they'll do your thinking for you.\u201d ..Millions of people believed that nonsense, and subsequently allowed 'others' to do their thinking for them.<br />\n<br />\nThe trade unions and the governments are ALL working for the Rothschild's - who own the banks, including Bank of England, US Federal Reserve,and all the big multi national companies, dangle politicians like rag dolls and hold all of the people as tax-debt slaves, through their corrupt central banks and their funny money.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's writing style was a calamity: full of sometimes puerile vehemence, Marx heaped scorn on his opponents, inaugurating the long Marxist tradition of mercilessly deriding anyone with incorrect opinions. In Marx\u2019s pamphlets, mudslinging abounds: Marx's heavy-handed insults tend to make us doubt Marx himself, since he relies so much on vituperation instead of reasoned argument.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's conclusion that aggregate price and profit are determined by\u2014and equal to\u2014aggregate value and surplus value is bullshit. There goes his his theory that the exploitation of workers is the sole source of profit.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's essential idea, was that capitalism would become less and less profitable and that its downward spiral toward the abyss of deflation\u2014lower prices, lower profits\u2014would be followed by worldwide revolution.<br />\n<br />\nThe laws of dialectics at the very base of Marxism are fundamentally flawed-- some are \"truisms with no specific Marxist content\", others \"philosophical dogmas that cannot be proved by scientific means\", yet others just bullshit. Some Marxist \"laws\" are vague and can be interpreted differently, but these interpretations generally fall into one of the aforementioned categories of flaws as well.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_4BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; EVER WRITTEN</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations, Jew Rothschild\u2019s agent Adam Smith proposed that the free market, where producers are free to produce as much as they want and charge consumers the prices they want, would result in the most efficient and desirable economic outcome for consumers and producers alike due to the \u201cInvisible Hand.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe rationale for his proposal was that each individual would try to maximize his own benefit. In doing so, consumers would only pay as much as or less than they would value the benefit derived from a good, and producers would only sell for as much as or higher than they would have spent on producing a good.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn his idealistic economy, there would be no surplus or deficit supply or demand; markets would always be in equilibrium, and the benefits to consumers and producers alike would be maximized. There would be a limited role for the government in such an economic system.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn contrast, Karl Marx in his Das Kapital reasoned that workers would be exploited by any capitalist, or factory owners, for the capitalist system provides an inherent advantage to the already rich and a disadvantage to the already poor segments of society. The rich would get richer and the poor would get poorer. Furthermore, the \u201ccapitalist\u201d is always in a better position to negotiate a low wage for his workers, he argued.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOne of his notable and more contentious theories \u2013 the labor theory of value \u2013 claims that the value of a good or service is directly connected to the amount of labor required for its production.
