Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529836889823#c5001973479494635782\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 4:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_38MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1---</span></div>\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">The&nbsp;</b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\"><b>constitution</b></span><b style=\"font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;of JOHN DEWEY</b></span><b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;( with BR Ambedkar as a front ) was adopted by the Constituent Assembly on 26 November 1949, and came into effect on 26 January 1950..</b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Judiciary interprets the Constitution as its final arbiter.. judiciary cant create laws.. The Indian constitution is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It imparts constitutional supremacy and not parliamentary supremacy, as it is not created by the Parliament but, by a constituent assembly, and adopted by its people, with a declaration in its preamble.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Parliament cannot override the constitution.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When the Constitution of India came into force on 26 January 1950, it repealed the Indian Independence Act. India ceased to be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic republic.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY DID JEW ROTHSCHILD KEEP THE BRITISH CONSTITION AS A BUNCH OF LOOSE PAPERS ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL HE COULD INSERT AND REMOVE LAWS AT WILL.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE BEST PART IS NOBODY BUT ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS (&nbsp; JUDGES / POLITICIANS) KNEW THE CONTENTS OF THE BRITISH CONSTITUTION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The DEEP STATE of America too do not want citizens to know the US law ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EXAMPLE : The State of Georgia has sued Malamud for providing the Official Code of Georgia Annotated on his website, describing it as \"a form of 'terrorism. If you publish Georgia\u2019s state laws, you\u2019ll get sued for copyright ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://www.theregister.co.uk/2015/07/25/georgia_sues_terrorist_for_publishing_its_own_laws/</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Carl Malamud is an America public domain advocate, known for his foundation Public.Resource.Org. He founded the Internet Multicasting Service. During his time with this group, he was responsible for developing the first Internet radio station, for putting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's EDGAR database on-lineand for creating the Internet 1996 World Exposition.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For the past over 25 years, an amazingly dedicated man named Carl Malamud has taken it upon himself to singlehandedly publish for free on his website Public.Resouce.org every local, State and US Federal government law ever enacted\u2014a stupendous feat...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has become so big, neither the US Congressional Research Service or the American Bar Association have enough staff to adequately categorize every law this nation has on the books.( DELIBERATE )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">United States, became the first society in all of recorded human history to outlaw its citizens from knowing the laws they live under!</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; SHIP CAPTAIN I KNEW MY HUGE POWERS , VESTED IN ME BY THE INDIAN MERCHANT SHIPPING ACT-- ( NOT COMPANY BLUE BOOK )<br />\n<br />\nASK EVEN MY WORST DETRACTORS WILL SHOUT ALOUD IN GLEE THAT CAPTAIN WAS \"THE\" MOST POWERFUL CAPTAIN AT SEA . . . .<br />\n<br />\nI WAS FAMOUS FOR KICKING MY BOSSES ON THEIR COLLECTIVE BALLS - -<br />\n<br />\nTHE TOP HONCHO WAS MY FAN IN EVERY SINGLE COMPANY I SAILED - - HIS HAND WAS ON MY HEAD- -<br />\n<br />\n10% was competence and merit-- 90% was knowing the powers vested in me.<br />\n<br />\nonce i had a passenger ship radio officer who used to be in a deep sulk like a small girl perpetually .<br />\n<br />\nhe was getting increasingly difficult, but i let it be as he was a senior man . .<br />\n<br />\none day while passing though the great barrier reef in australia, the pilot wanted to send a SITREP message.<br />\n<br />\nhe gave to to me and i told the OOW to go to radio officers cabin and give the paper slip to him and tell him captain wants immediate transmission..<br />\n<br />\nsulking radio officer tells the officer on watch --I WILL SEND AFTER ONE HOUR, RIGHT NOW I AM RESTING.<br />\n<br />\nto cut matters short --<br />\n<br />\ni charged him for IMPEDING THE PASSAGE OF THE VOYAGE --which entails dismissal at next port and heavy cut of one months wages.<br />\n<br />\nbefore i entered the it in the OFFICIAL LOG BOOK -- i called the purser, a goan catholic like the radio officer ( his bst friend ) and asked him to come to my cabin along with this radio officer<br />\n<br />\nthen i read out the impending log entry -- i am entering and signing this log entry, after which it is PAIN for the rest of your life -- do you have anything to say --<br />\n<br />\nhe nearly died out of shock--<br />\n<br />\nEPPIDI NAAN PAKKAWAI ILLAI - -<br />\n<br />\ni sent the purser away-- i said sit down-- gave him a cold coke --<br />\n<br />\ni asked him--<br />\n<br />\nWHAT THE FUCK IS YOUR PROBLEM MAAN--YOU HAVE BEEN SULKING SINCE THE FIRST WEEK ON BOARD .<br />\n<br />\nhe says-- you call chief officer and wife, second engineer and wife to your cabin for a drink , but you never called me -- i am also a THREE STRIPER like them as a SENIOR radio officer with a superior certificate.<br />\n<br />\ni replied-- THAT IS BECAUSE BOTH OF THEM CARRY WIVES ( WHILE YOU DONT ) AND MY WIFE WOULD LIKE TO TALK TO THEM -- AND BY THE WAY , YOU MUST START WEARING TWO AND A HALF STRIPES FROM NOW ON -- NOT THREE --<br />\n<br />\nthis was a revelation to him after two decades on the job--<br />\n<br />\nhe immediately apologized profusely --he said --nobody told me that i must wear 2.5 stripes not 3.0 ( lt commander wears two and a half stripes in the indian navy , while a full commander wears three stripes )<br />\n<br />\n<span font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/communist-maoist-naxalite-movements-in_9.html?showComment=1473527541331#c2192731444833944836\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 10, 2016 at 10:42 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_48MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/Wal-Mart-stops-selling-Egyptian-cotton-sheets-made-by-Welspun/articleshow/54261616.cms<br />\n<br />\nVEDIC INDIAN COTTON WAS FAR SUPERIOR TO EHYPTIAN COOTON DUE TO FIBRE LENTHH AND QUALITY . .<br />\n<br />\nBASTARDS IN THE PAY ROLL OF ZIONIST JEW KILLED VEDIC COTTON AND SUBSTITUTE WITH GM COTTON WITH SHORT FIBRE OF PATHETIC QUALITY .<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW WHO THESE BASTARD DESH DROHIS ARE . . THEY WANT THEIR LEGACY TO BE PROTECTED BY ROTHSCHILD MEDIA<br />\n<br />\nSORRY-- THIS BLOGSITE CAN OVERRIDE SUCH KOSHER PROTECTION . . .<br />\n<br />\nThe fibre / lint quality of GMO cotton is very poor. . .<br />\n<br />\nWhen a BT Cotton pod breaks the flying SHORTER LENGTH LINT gives lung problems. . .<br />\n<br />\nMonsanto SHOUTS cotton yields are up,-- B A L L S , YOU LIARS ! . .<br />\n<br />\nHey Monsanto c u n t s ---understand the meaning of the word SHORT LENGTH OF LINT ? ..<br />\n<br />\nThe amount machines are able to extract from the picked cotton has diminished. . .<br />\n<br />\nIn other words, Bt cotton produces both less cotton lint, and lint of an inferior quality. . .<br />\n<br />\nCotton fiber quality is defined by the physical properties that relate to its spin ability into yarn and contribute to textile performance and quality. . .<br />\n<br />\nThe most important of these properties are those associated with the length, strength and fineness (micronaire) of the fiber. One of the most important aspects of cotton fiber quality is fiber or staple length. . .<br />\n<br />\nFiber length is the normal length of a typical portion of the fibers of a cotton sample. Longer fibers can be processed at greater efficiencies and produce finer and stronger yarns by allowing fibers to twist around each other more times, while shorter fiber require increased twisting during spinning, causing low-strength and poor-quality yarns. . .<br />\n<br />\nFiber fineness is another important component of fiber quality because of its direct impact on processing performance and the quality of end product. . .<br />\n<br />\nFiber strength is important because the inherent breaking strength of individual cotton fiber is considered to be the most important factor in determining the strength of the yarn spun from those fibers. . .<br />\n<br />\nPMO WILL CALL THIS FICTION . . .<br />\n<br />\nThey have just focused on a single single trait \u2013 pest resistance ( SIC )\u2013 compromising on cotton quality. ..<br />\n<br />\nMy hometown Calicut produced the best cotton fabric ( CALICO ) on this planet\u2014today with BT Cotton all this is history. ..<br />\n<br />\nFiber strength is an important parameter in determining yarn spinning value. . .<br />\n<br />\nJEW DARLINGS never have the commonsense to understand this \u2013 WHEN YOU RAISE QUANTTY , QUALITY REDUCES ---<br />\n<br />\nHigh fiber strength is impossible to obtain without sacrificing yield. . .<br />\n<br />\nPATHETIC !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/buried-truth-at-jasenovic-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/buried-truth-at-jasenovic-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wanna know a crypto Jew\nCommie who became a Catholic &nbsp;POPE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/last-crusader-of-last-inquisition-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/last-crusader-of-last-inquisition-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Russian Orthodox\nChurch, which had 55,000 parishes before World War I, was reduced to 450 by\n1940 by Bolshevik Jew Commies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite the Soviet\nUnion's attempts to eliminate religion, other former USSR and anti-religious\nnations, such as Armenia, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Turkmenistan, Kyrgyzstan,\nTajikistan, Belarus, Moldova and Georgia have high religious populations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Black Book of\nCommunism, a set of academic essays on mass killings under Communist regimes,\ndetails \"'crimes, terror, and repression' from Russia in 1917 to\nAfghanistan in 1989\".&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a distinct association\nbetween communism and criminality.&nbsp; Communist\nregimes ... turned mass crime into a full-blown system of government . Criminality\nlies at the level of ideology rather than state practice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mass killings\nstrategies are chosen by Communists to economically dispossess large numbers of\npeople and grab private and public lands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Social transformations\nof this speed and magnitude have been associated with mass killing for two\nprimary reasons. First, the massive social dislocations produced by such\nchanges have often led to economic collapse, epidemics, and, most important,\nwidespread famines. ..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second reason that\ncommunist regimes bent on the radical transformation of society have been\nlinked to mass killing is that the revolutionary changes they have pursued have\nclashed inexorably with the fundamental interests of large segments of their\npopulations. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Few people have proved\nwilling to accept such far-reaching sacrifices without intense levels of\ncoersion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jacques Semelin founder\nof the Online Encyclopedia of Mass Violence wrote \"communist systems\nemerging in the twentieth century ended up destroying their own populations,\nnot because they planned to annihilate them as such, but because they aimed to\nrestructure the 'social body' from top to bottom, even if that meant purging it\nand recarving it to suit their new Promethean political imaginaire.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Historian Helen\nRappaport describes Nikolay Yezhov, the bureaucrat in charge of the NKVD ( The\nPeople's Commissariat for Internal Affairs )during the Great Purge, as a\nphysically diminutive figure of \"limited intelligence\" and\n\"narrow political understanding.... Like other instigators of mass murder\nthroughout history, compensated for his lack of physical stature with a\npathological cruelty and the use of brute terror.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A lot of Commie and\nMaoists leaders in India belong to the same category\u2014ugly people, with limited\nintelligence , inferiority comples and character going overboard with their own\nfalse sense of ethos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration: none;\">September 11, 2016 at 8:41 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHi Captain,<br />\n<br />\nBJP Govt at last is showing some interest in preserving A2 Milk producing native Indigenous Vedic humped Cows, along with numerous other Projects dealing with Roads, Shipping, Textiles, Tourism, Agriculture, Heritage, Railways etc to develop, repair and rebuild the holy city of Varanasi.<br />\n<br />\n###############<br />\n<br />\nhttp://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/politics-and-nation/its-projects-galore-in-varanasi-the-pm-narendra-modis-constituency/articleshow/54271330.cms<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTeams of veterinary doctors will scout for a desi elite cow breed named Gangatiri in the villages of eastern Uttar Pradesh. Their mission: to purchase 100 such cows, as part of a cow conservation project launched by the Union agriculture ministry last year in Varanasi's Shahnshahpur village. Housed in a state government dairy farm established way back in 1950, the Gangatiri Cows' Conservation and Development Center has added new infrastructure \u2014 a water tank, a veterinary dispensary and a huge cowshed to accommodate the 100 purebred Gangatiri cows.<br />\n<br />\nThe purchase committee has already been formed. The fund is ready. But the challenge is to spot pure Gangatiri cows (as against crossbreeds). Our doctors will look for the cows in the villages of Varanasi, Allahabad, Ghazipur and Balia,\" says farm manager Sarvjeet Singh. He goes on to share the characteristics of this desi breed, its cost, milk yields and fat content, and why there is an urgent need to conserve this rare strain found in the eastern belt of UP.<br />\n<br />\n###############<br />\n<br />\nIndian Govt must initiate more such vedic cow protection programmes to preserve, grow, breed and multiply more such variety of humped desi cows across India. The day all Indians are able to afford to buy and drink A2 Milk for daily consumption, will truly be a real white revolution for India.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">German Jew Karl Marx,\nthe blood relative of German Jew Rothschild &nbsp;viewed the unfolding process of history as\nfollows:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">First in ancient and&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">medieval</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;society the landed and wealthy had oppressed the slaves and the\npoorest&nbsp;plebeians and labourers.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then, as new\ntechnologies were invented and market forces grew stronger, everything changed.\nThe middle classes - gaining wealth and power from trade and manufacture -\nchallenged the power and authority of the old rulers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But at this stage a new\nstruggle was formed between the <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">bourgeoisie</span> (the property owning class) and the\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">proletariat </span>(the industrial working class).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>BOLO TOH-- BAAP KI\nPEEPTA ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://maoistroad.blogspot.in/2014_09_01_archive.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://maoistroad.blogspot.in/2014_09_01_archive.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is an extract of\nTelugu Commie PWG: &nbsp; \u201cThe programme of our Party has declared<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">that India is a vast\n\u2018semi-colonial and semi-feudal country\u2019, with about 80 per cent of our<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">population residing in\nour villages. It is ruled by the big-bourgeois big landlord classes,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">subservient to\nimperialism. The contradiction between the alliance of imperialism, feudalism<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and comprador\nbureaucrat-capitalism on the one hand and the broad masses of the people on<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the other is the\nprincipal contradiction in our country. Only a successful People\u2019s Democratic<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Revolution i.e. New\nDemocratic Revolution and the establishment of People\u2019s Democratic<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dictatorship of the\nworkers, peasants, the middle classes and national bourgeoisie under the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">leadership of the proletariat\ncan lead to the liberation of our people from all exploitation and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the dictatorship of the\nreactionary ruling classes and pave the way for building Socialism and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Communism in our\ncountry, the ultimate aim of our Party. People\u2019s War based on Armed<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Agrarian Revolution is\nthe only path for achieving people\u2019s democracy i.e. new democracy, in<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">our country.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEEEE HEEEEEEE !</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">If so why do they form political parties to fight\nelections?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">AKKAL NAHI HAI KYA ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Communist Party of\nIndia (Maoist) came into existence in September 2004 following the merger of\nthe Maoist Communist Centre (MCC) and the People\u2019s War Group (PWG).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The merger\nwas officially recognized in November 2004 at a press conference in Hyderabad\non the eve of the peace-talks between the PWG and the Andhra Pradesh\nGovernment.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PWG had been trying to bring together various Left Wing\nExtremist groups under one umbrella for years ( with a COMMON MINIMUM PROGRAM\n)&nbsp; with the objective of overthrowing\nwhat they called \u201cthe comprador bourgeois and big landlords classes who control\nstate power in collusion with imperialism\u201d and \u201cto establish in its place the\nNew Democratic State under the leadership of the proletariat\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEE HEEEEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The creation of the State\nof Jharkhand in the year 2000 and the security offensive mounted by the\nAdministration acted as a ballast for closer cooperation between the PWG and\nthe MCC which resulted in their coming together under one umbrella which later\ncame to be known as the CPI (Maoist) in 2004.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The coming together of\nPWG and the MCC wasn\u2019t a smooth ride and was fraught with hurdles along the\nway. &nbsp; &nbsp; Clashes between the MCC and the PWG would occur on regular basis and the period\nis referred to as a \u201cBlack Chapter\u201d by Maoist outfits. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">COMMON MINIMUM PROGRAM\nKO CHOONA LAG GAYA KYA ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later, in November\n2002, the introduction of the Prevention of Terrorism Act (POTA) and its use\nagainst the Naxal cadres only strengthened the idea of a merger of the MCC and\nthe PWG along with other splinter Left-Extremist groups. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">COMMON MINIMUM\nPROGRAMME &nbsp;KI JAI !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/communist-maoist-naxalite-movements-in_9.html?showComment=1473581701975#c3686728623039369073\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 11, 2016 at 1:45 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_98MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nsome one asked me -<br />\n<br />\ndoes QURAN allow homosexuality ?<br />\n<br />\nNO NO NO !!<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">ANY MUSLIM PUSHING HOMOSEXUALITY IS CONTROLLED BY ZIONIST JEWS </span></b>--<br />\n<br />\nQuran (7:80-84) - \"...For ye practice your lusts on men in preference to women: ye are indeed a people transgressing beyond bounds.... And we rained down on them a shower (of brimstone)\" -<br />\n<br />\nMuslim scholars have interpreted the \"rain of stones\" that homosexuals should be stoned ( repeated in suras 15:74, 27:58 and 29:40).<br />\n<br />\nbrimstone rained on SODOM ( bible ) ..Then the LORD rained on Sodom and Gomorrah brimstone and fire from the LORD out of heaven.. ANAL SEX is called SODOMY today.<br />\n<br />\nThe Bible too clearly and explicitly condemns homosexuality as an immoral and unnatural sin (Leviticus 18:22; 20:13; Romans 1:26-27; 1 Corinthians 6:9)..<br />\n<br />\nThe term sodomy, which is derived from the story of Sodom and Gomorrah in chapters 18 and 19 of the Book of Genesis in the Bible, was restricted to anal sex...The connection between Sodom and homosexuality is derived from the depicted attempt of a mob of city people to rape Lot's male guests. The specific sin of Genesis 19 was forcible anal rape of a man by another man.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At a February 2003\nmeeting, a decision was taken to come out with a comprehensive document on\nideological issues and the future of the Naxalite Movement to survive POTA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Prevention of\nTerrorism Act, 2002 (POTA) was an Act passed by the Parliament of India in\n2002, with the objective of strengthening anti-terrorism operations. The Act\nwas enacted due to several terrorist attacks that were being carried out in\nIndia and especially in response to the attack on the Parliament.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The POTA Act was\nrepealed in 2004 by the Ialian waitress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bill was defeated\nin the Rajya Sabha (the upper house) by a 113-98 vote due foreign payroll Rajya\nSabha members .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However it was passed\nin a joint session (425 Ayes and 296 Nos), as the Lok Sabha (lower house) has\nmore seats. It was only the third time that a bill was passed by a joint\nsession of both houses of Parliament.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Analogous to the\nprovisions contained in TADA, the law provided that a suspect could be detained\nfor up to 180 days without the filing of chargesheet in court. It also allowed\nlaw enforcement agencies to withhold the identities of witnesses, and to treat\nconfessions made to the police admissible in evidence. Under the provisions of\ncriminal law in India, a person could deny such confessions, in court, but not\nunder POTA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">S.A.R. Geelani, a\nlecturer at Delhi University, was sentenced to death by a special POTA court\nfor his alleged role in the 2001 attack on the Indian Parliament. He was later\nacquitted on appeal by the Delhi High Court on a legal technicality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhattarai, a brainwashed\ncommie product of New Delhi's Jawaharlal Nehru University, had close links with\nthe Maoist Communist Center (MCC) and the People's War Group (PWG).&nbsp; He was in the conspiracy to eliminate the\nentire Nepal royalty. He would\nbecome PM of Libya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHY DOES INDIA SAY THAT\nONLY PAKISTAN EXPORTS TERROR?</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PWG and the MCC\nwere instrumental in setting up an umbrella organization called the\nCoordination Committee of Maoist Parties and Organizations of South Asia\n(CCOMPOSA). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The formation of the\nCCOMPOSA came to light in a joint statement issued by these organizations on\nJuly 1, 2001, which indicated that nine left-wing groups of Nepal, India,\nBangladesh and Sri Lanka had joined hands to \"unify and coordinate the\nactivities of the Maoist parties and organizations in South Asia\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PWG congress washeld\nin Buzurmad village, in the Dandakaranya forests of Madhya Pradesh, between\nMarch 3 and 22, 2001. &nbsp;At the congress,\nthe PWG resolved to jointly conduct programs with the Communist Party of Nepal\n(Maoist), the Communist Party of the Philippines, the Communist Party of Peru\nand the Communist Party of Turkey-Marxist-Leninist with a COMMON MINIMUM\nPROGRAMME.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At CCOMPOSA's second\nannual conference in 2002, a declaration was issued, outlining the vision\nCCOMPOSA had for its role in revolutionary politics, how it would operate, and\nhow the political situation in South Asia and the world looked from their point\nof view.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was declared that the organization would follow the ideas carved by\nKarl Marx, Vladimir Lenin and Mao Zedong, and, not least, to build on the\nexamples and experience of Protracted People's Wars in Peru, Nepal,\nPhilippines, India, Turkey and elsewhere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many parties of\nCCOMPOSA were members of the Revolutionary Internationalist Movement.&nbsp; The Revolutionary Internationalist Movement\n(RIM) was an international Communist organization founded in 1984 by 17 various\nMaoist organisations around the world.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It sought to \"struggle for the\nformation of a Communist International of a new type, based on\nMarxism-Leninism-Maoism\" As soon as parties are banned the same hour they\nchange name and carry on\u2014business as usual .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bamdev Cheetri was a\ncaretaker at the JNU Library since 1975 and was secretary of Akhil Bharat\nNepali Ekta Samaj (ABNES), a group banned under the Prevention Of Terrorist\nActivities (POTA) Act. At the time of arrest on 5<sup>th</sup> Sept 2002, ,\nthere was a reward of Rs 25 lakh on his head. Intelligence agencies claim that\nABNES was actively engaged in raising funds for Maoist insurgents in Nepal as\nwell as in recruiting cadres for the insurgents from among Nepalese settlers in\nIndia. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">ALMOST EVERY COMMIE\nPROFESSOR &nbsp;IN JNU KNEW THAT THIS MOST WANTED\nMAN WAS HIDING IN JNU LIBRARY . .</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2002 was the bloodiest\nyear of Maoist violence in Nepal with the highest number of fatalities \u2013 4896\ndeaths, almost a fourfold increase from the previous year.&nbsp; As soon as the Italian waitress came to power\nthe Maoists got breathing space.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JNU has long been a\nbreeding ground for the growth of extremist forms of communism. The university\nhas not only produced some of most dangerous and antiwatan political leaders\nand academicians of left wing ideology, but also foreign payroll elements who\nbelieve in VIOLENT war against the state and against so-called \u2018state\noppression\u2019 on the Protetariat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banshidhar alias\nChintan Da, a politburo member, &nbsp;was a JNU\nstudent having links with Maoists. He was arrested in 2006. &nbsp;He received a PhD and MPhil degree from JNU.\nHis commie JNU &nbsp;professors were in the\npayroll of foreign forces. &nbsp;Yet nobody\nhas dared to arrest a JNU thinker commie professor due to support from Jew Noam\nChomsky.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">Photopraph with high resolution cameras all desh drohi commie students\nwho cheered every speech of Kanhaiya Kumar and Umar Khalid lustily. &nbsp;&nbsp;Make sure they do NOT get any sensitive govt\njob and they are tracked when the travel abroad.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If police does NOT know \u2014this blogsite\nknows !<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The history of\nstudents\u2019 and teachers\u2019 association with Maoism is as old as the movement\nitself. Whether the National Institute of Technology (NIT) in Warangal, TISS,\nFTII Pune , Jadavpur University in Kolkata, Allahabad University or\nuniversities in Hyderabad, Dakshin Kannada, Mangalore and Shimoga, campuses\nhave been a preferred hunting ground for anti-watan and atheist Maoists.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VoKKkX4aPsI/V9VBaEkbezI/AAAAAAABLwI/jlpfau2UU84uwArieR9H5UcrOPVQtwvDwCLcB/s1600/JNU_27D39084f_2739560f.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VoKKkX4aPsI/V9VBaEkbezI/AAAAAAABLwI/jlpfau2UU84uwArieR9H5UcrOPVQtwvDwCLcB/s640/JNU_27D39084f_2739560f.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SUBJECT :&nbsp;&nbsp; \u2018JNU events signal culture of authoritarian\nmenace\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JNU students demanding\nthe release of union president Kanhaiya Kumar in New Delhi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reuters&nbsp; ---JNU students demanding the release of\nunion president Kanhaiya Kumar in New Delhi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eminent professors from\nprestigious universities, including Noam Chomsky and others, have written\ncondemning the arrest of Jawaharlal Nehru University student leader Kanhaiya\nKumar, and expressing solidarity with the students and faculty protesting the\ngovernment action on campus. The signatories also condemn \"the culture of\nauthoritarian menace that the present government in India has generated\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here's their statement\nand the list of signatories:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have learnt of the\nshameful act of the Indian government which, invoking sedition laws formulated\nby India\u2019s colonial rulers, ordered the police to enter the Jawaharlal Nehru\nUniversity campus and unlawfully arrest a student leader, Mr. Kanhaiya Kumar,\non charges of inciting violence - without any proof whatever of such wrongdoing\non his part.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From the reports of a\nlarge number of witnesses and the most highly respected journalists in the\ncountry, these are the known facts that no impartial observer denies: In a\nstudent meeting, acting well within the rights he possesses by the law of the\nland, Mr. Kumar spoke critically of the BJP government\u2019s policies. On the\nprevious day, at some other event, which he had no part in organising and at\nwhich he did not speak, a handful of other students, not even identifiable as\nstudents of the university, were shouting slogans about the rights of Kashmiris\nto independence from Indian military oppression over the last many decades. Mr.\nKumar, whose speech (widely available on a video) cannot in any way be connected\nwith the slogans uttered on the previous day, was nonetheless arrested for\n\u2018anti-national\u2019 behaviour and for violating the sedition laws against the\nincitement to violence. Since there is no evidence to establish these charges,\nwe can only conclude that this arrest is further evidence of the present\ngovernment\u2019s deeply authoritarian nature, intolerant of any dissent, setting\naside India\u2019s longstanding commitment to toleration and plurality of opinion,\nreplicating the dark times of an oppressive colonial period and briefly of the\nEmergency in the mid-1970s.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These actions of the\npolice have brought great dishonour to the government; and the failure of the\nVice-Chancellor to speak out against these actions and moreover to allow the\nsuspension of seven other students on charges that have not been established by\na fair and transparent inquiry, will bring great dishonour to the most\nprominent university in the country in the eyes of the academy all over the\nworld.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We, the undersigned,\ntake a stand of heartfelt solidarity with the students and faculty of\nJawaharlal Nehru University in their efforts to resist these developments on\nits campus and, in the name of the liberties that India and Indian universities\nuntil recently could take for granted, we not only condemn the culture of\nauthoritarian menace that the present government in India has generated, but\nurge all those genuinely concerned about the future of India and Indian\nuniversities to protest in wide mobilisation against it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Signed by:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Noam Chomsky,\nEmeritus Professor of Linguistics and Philosophy, Massachusetts Institute of\nTechnology, USA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a crying need\nto be vigilant about the urban movement of Maoists which employs students in\nunderground political activities, essentially to expand its reach to new\nsections of urban India. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Students with similar\nmental disposition and ideology are easy to indoctrinate\u2014to go against their\nown motherland , like how Indian commies supported China ( an alein yellow\nskinned slit eyed race ) when India had a war with them in 1962.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Certainly, expansion\ninto elite universities like JNU is just a fraction of the Maoists\u2019 plan, but\nthis needs to be seen in the wider context of the destabilization of India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Notwithstanding\nintellectual perspectives&nbsp; given by\nleftist scholars, it is imperative that we control and combat Maoist expansion\nin our universities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We want PM Narendra\nModi to make a national policy regarding this . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the initial\nyears of the movement, the main objective of the Naxalite movement was to carry\nout an \u201carmed struggle\u201d against the landlords and win back tribal land for\ntilling and other agricultural activities. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This is just a euphemism of grabbing lands,\nsubdividing the lands to small fragments and then snatching it back from\npeasants who cant till and make a profit on such a small piece of land.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WE WANT THE MODI GOVT\nTO MAP EVERY INCH OF LAND IN INDIA USING OUR SATELLITES.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>EVERY PRIVATE LAND MUST\nBE COMPUTERISED WITHIN A DEADLINE . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>IT IS THE ONUS OF\nPRIVATE LAND OWNERS TO GET THEIR LANDS TO BE RE-REGISTERED AT A NOMINAL COST\nUSING AADHAR CARD FOR IDENTITY . . <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>PHOTOS AND THUMB\nIMPRINTS/ SIGNATURES MUST BE TAKEN BY THE LAND REGISTRY OFFICES . .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>IF ANY PRIVATE OWNER\nCANNOT PRODUCES A GENUINE ORIGINAL LAND DEED IN HIS NAME , IT MEANS THAT THE LAND\nIS STOLEN OR FAKE BENAMI&nbsp; . . <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DURING TELGI SCAM MANY\nDEEDS WERE REGISTERED ON FAKE STAMP PAPER.&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The People\u2019s War Group\nwas formed in Southern Indian State of Andhra Pradesh on April 22, 1980 by\nKondapalli Seetharamaiah, one of the most influential Naxalite leaders in the\nState and a member of the erstwhile Central Organising Committee of the\nCommunist Party of India\u2013\u2013Marxist-Leninist, (CPI-ML).&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Seetharamaiah was later expelled from the\ngroup. He died unsung on April 12, 2002.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PWG\u2019s operations commenced in\nKarimnagar district, in the North Telengana region of Andhra Pradesh, and\nsubsequently spread to other parts of the State as well as in other States.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PWG traces its\nideology to the Chinese leader Mao Tse Tung\u2019s theory of organised peasant\ninsurrection. It rejects parliamentary democracy and believes in capturing\npolitical power through protracted armed struggle based on guerrilla warfare.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nstrategy entails building up of bases in rural and remote areas and\ntransforming them first into guerrilla zones and then as liberated zones,\nbesides the area-wise seizure and encircling cities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The eventual objective is\nto install a \"people\u2019s government\" through the \"people\u2019s\nwar\". In short, as the PWG claims, it wishes to usher in a New Democratic\nrevolution (NDR).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr. P Vara Vara Rao (\nshit poet ) is projected as the PWG\u2019s principal \u2018ideologue\u2019. &nbsp;&nbsp;Yet another leader is balladeer ( shit song\nwriter ) Gaddar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gummadi Vittal Rao,\npopularly known as Gaddar is a revolutionary Telugu balladeer and local\nNaxalite activist from the state of Telangana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild media sponsored\nfilm director B. Narsing Rao made Gaddar famous. He works in tandem with Shyam\nBenegal and FTII commie consider them as godfathers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">B. Narsing Rao, is the founder\nof a forum called 'Art Lovers Association' and he tries to show that Bhagat\nSingh was a atheist Communist ( he was NOT !).&nbsp;\n&nbsp;B Narsing Rao was a sponsor of\nthe Communist Party of India (Marxist-Leninist).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gadar's song \"Amma\nTelanganama Akali kekala gaanama\" has been selected as the state song of\nTelangana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Jana Natya Mandali was regarded as the\ncultural wing of the Communist Party of India (Marxist-Leninist) People's War,\na Maoist party active in Telangana, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Bihar and\nOdisha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After four-and-a-half\nyears of hiding , Gaddar emerged &nbsp;when\nthe then Congress government led by Dr Marri Chenna Reddy adopted a 'liberal\nattitude' towards the Naxalites. On February 18, 1990, Gaddar met the media.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Two days later, Jana Natya Mandali celebrated its 19th anniversary at Nizam\nCollege Grounds in Hyderabad. A staggering 200,000 people came to watch Gaddar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2001, the Telugu\nDesam government accepted a proposal to have peace negotiations with Naxalites\nand the then Communist Party of India (Marxist-Leninist) People's War announced\nthe names of Varavara Rao and Gaddar as its emissaries to work out modalities\nfor the proposed talks<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the words of &nbsp;Kancha Ilaiah SQUEAK nay Shephard , 'Gaddar\nwas the first Telangana intellectual who established a link between the\nproductive masses and the literary text and, of course, that text established a\nlink between the masses and educational institutions.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
