font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is an intellectual\ninspiration to many Dalit foreign sponsored associations like the Ambedkar\nStudents Association (ASA) and the Ambedkar Periyar Study Circle (APSC) whose\nmembers promote his ideas, calling for a civil war which will lead to the\ndemise of Hinduism itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regarding the\npractice of cremation prevalent among most Hindus, here is the ignorant professor\u2019s\nstandpoint:&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Cremation&nbsp; is&nbsp; an\nunscientific&nbsp; method&nbsp; of&nbsp;\ndealing&nbsp; with&nbsp; dead&nbsp;\nbodies&nbsp; because it&nbsp; leaves&nbsp;\nno history&nbsp; in&nbsp; the&nbsp;\nform&nbsp; of&nbsp; fossils\u2026Brahminism must have evolved this\npractice in ancient India as the Hindus killed several Dalit Bahujans who had\nrevolted against them to destroy evidence of torture and murder\u2026.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAAAYYYYYY !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEE HEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In another one decade\nalmost every Christian on this planet will&nbsp;\nCREMATE their dead .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2006, Prime Minister\nManmohan Singh called the Naxalites / Maoists the \"single biggest internal\nsecurity challenge ever faced by our country\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Naxalites' long-term\ngoal is to establish an Indian Marxist state. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2011, Indian police\naccused the Chinese government of providing sanctuary to the movement's leaders,\nand accused Pakistani ISI of providing financial support.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 6 April 2010,\nNaxalite rebels killed 76, consisting of 74 paramilitary personnel of the CRPF\nand two policemen. Fifty others were wounded in the series of attacks on\nsecurity convoys in Dantewada district in the central Indian state of\nChhattisgarh.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The attack resulted in the biggest loss of life security forces\nhave suffered since launching a large-scale offensive against the rebels .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>&nbsp;The\ncommie professors of JNU partied at night along with their commie students .</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Yet the govy has done nothing to cleanse this den of commie traitors..\nRothschild double agent Jew Noam Chomsky interferes every time a commie\nprofessor is caught by the police assisting Naxals.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 17 May, a Naxalite\nlandmine destroyed a bus in Dantewada district, killing up to 44 people\nincluding several Special Police Officers (SPOs) and civilians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fighting force of\nthe PWG is organised as the People\u2019s Guerrilla Army (PGA). It has a flag and an\ninsignia, too. The PGA was formed in December 2000.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The outfit, at present\nis active in parts of, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Andhra\nPradesh, Orissa, Jharkhand, West Bengal and Bihar. The outfit has been making\nattempts to establish and expand its presence in several other States such as\nTamil Nadu, Kerala and Karnataka in Southern India, Uttar Pradesh, Haryana,\nPunjab and Rajasthan in Northern India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some examples?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 28 May 2010 the\nderailment of a Kolkata\u2013Mumbai night train killed at least 150 persons. Police\nalleged that Maoists had caused the derailment by removing a short (46 cm or\n1\u00bdft) piece of track<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 29 June 2010,&nbsp; more than 27 policemen are killed in a Maoist\nattack in the central Indian state of Chhattisgarh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During May 2011 ,\nNaxalites killed and dismembered ten policemen, including one senior officer in\nthe Gariyaband, Chhattisgarh area on the border with Orissa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 27 March 2012 , an\nexplosion blamed on Maoists killed 15 Indian policemen in Maharashtra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">28 February 2014 : Six\npolice personnel, including a SHO, killed in Maoist attack in Chhattisgarh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11 March 2014 : 15\nsecurity personnel and 1 Civilian were killed in Chhattisgarh Naxal attack in\nTongpal village, close to the Darbha Ghat area, of Sukma district in south\nChhattisgarh, while they were engaged in a road opening exercise in the area.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11 May 2014: 7 police\ncommandos killed in a Maoists landmine blast in the forests of Gadchiroli\ndistrict of Maharashtra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11 April 2015 : 7\nSpecial Task Force (STF) personals were killed in a Maoist ambush near Kankerlanka,\nSukma, Chhattisgarh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">13 April 2015 : 5\nChhattisgarh Armed Force (CAF) Jawans were killed in a Maoist ambush near\nKirandul, Dantewada, Chhattisgarh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">30 March 2016 : 7 CRPF\nJawans were killed in Dantewada attack by Naxalites.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Naxal groups have\nrecruited children in different capacities and exposed them to injury and death.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In November 1995, the foreign\nsponsored PWG conducted an All India Conference where two important documents\nwere adopted. The \u201cParty Programme\u201d states, \u201cIndia is a semi-feudal,\nsemi-colonial society; here the New Democratic Revolution (NDR) has to be\ncompleted victoriously paving way to the Socialist Revolution and to advance\ntowards the ultimate goal of Communism. The Indian people are weighed down by\nthree big mountains: feudalism, imperialism and comprador bureaucrat capital;\nthese are the targets to be overthrown in the present stage of NDR.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The document also states,\n\u201cIndia is a multi-national country--a prison-house of nationalities and all the\nnationalities have the right to self-determination including secession. When\nNDR is victoriously completed, India will become a voluntary and genuine\nfederation of all national people's republics.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The advocacy of\nsecession to assert regional sub-nationalism seems to be a strategic ploy by\nthe Maoists to weaken the Indian State which could prove to be an important tool\nin its armoury to achieve its principal objective of capturing power. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>JEALOUS FOREIGN FORCES\nWANT INDIA TO IMPLODE FROM WITHIN.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SCREW ALL THIS RIDICULOUS BULLSHIT ABOUT&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">BOURGEOIS</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">&nbsp;VERSUS PROLETARIAT ( WHOSE COMRADES &nbsp;HAVE AN ACE UP THEIR DIRTY HAIRY ARMPITS-- <span style=\"color: red;\">THE COMMON MINIMUM PROGRAMME</span> ) &nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Addressing the Maoist\nphenomenon through a security standpoint alone is a delusionary path in itself.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is important to identify the \u201c JNU commie professor fuel that is adding to\nthe Maoist fire\u201d and creating havocin the deep forests of India.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the\nregions that have remained the showpiece of the Maoist ideology is the forests\nof Dandakaranya, which lie in between the borders of Madhya Pradesh, Orissa,\nChhattisgarh and Maharashtra.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is here, where historically the Maoists\ncapitalized on local sentiments to expand their influence. The Dadakaranya\nmodel was adopted in other areas as the movement of the PWG gained momentum and\nstrength.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arun Shourie wrote:-&nbsp; <i>The Naxalites first commence with surveys of\n\u201cProspective Areas\u201d that they seek to target. These surveys are carried out\nprofessionally &nbsp;and incorporate\ninformation about land pattern holdings, crops, problems of each crop, issues\nrelating to wages and tenure, caste composition etc. Then the front organisations\nof the CPI (Maoist) are formed to instigate the local people on these issues culminating\ninto agitations and strikes. Success achieved through such agitations brings\nthe local community closer to these front organisations and in the Maoist net\nof influence. If instead of success, the State unleashes force, this too\ncreates sympathy for the front organisations among the locals as they are seen\nto be fighting for their cause. Sustained agitations and fights for the local\npeople helps the Maoists consolidate their position in the area allowing them\nto then raise dalams or Village level militia. The whole process approximately takes\n5-6 years.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b style=\"color: red; font-size: xx-large;\"></b></span><br />\n<div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4300396988934819416\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: black; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_158M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/sox-and-nox-emissions-from-ships.html?showComment=1512920248008#c4300396988934819416\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 10, 2017 at 9:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_158MC\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.timesnownews.com/india/article/banaras-hindu-university-triple-talaq-nikkah-halala-alauddin-khilji-political-science-question-paper-ma-students-master-of-arts-degree/143420<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY IN INDIA HEARD OF CHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..'<br />\n<br />\nCHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND BHAKTI MOVEMENT ARE JEW ROTHSCHILDs FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS.<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA ALLOWS ONLY SHRADDHA --NEVER BHAKTI....<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nAll the BHAKTI MOVEMENT HEROES are FAKE and backdated creations of Jew Rothschild who ruled India \u2014the most famous being the DASA characters .<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s historians LIED that Bhakti movement was a revival, reworking and recontextualisation of ancient Vedic traditions..<br />\n<br />\nIn Sanatana Dharma the six virtues are Sama, dama, uparati, titiksha, SHRADDHA and samadhana..<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna also gives importance to Shraddha and says in the Bhagavad Gita:--<br />\n<br />\nOne who has Shraddha ( not BHAKTI ) gains knowledge.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha hrudayya yakutyaa shradhayaa vindate vasu. --(Rig Veda 10/151/4) 5000 BC.<br />\nMeaning: Shraddha (faith) is the symbol of the high sentiment of the heart.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha cannot be aptly translated into English. Loosely put, it may be be called faith / trust.<br />\n<br />\nYour willingness to know the unknown is shraddha...shraddha is not blind faith, but enlightened faith based on verification.<br />\n<br />\nIf your mind is fixed, and says \u201cThat\u2019s it. I know it all\u201d, that is ego. The more you know, the more will be the feeling that you don\u2019t know. Recognition of the unknown is Shraddha....<br />\n<br />\nShraddha means unwavering faith in the sacred scriptures or shastras and in the moral codes they contain as well as in the atma ( soul )...<br />\n<br />\nThe shastras are designed to ensure the peace and prosperity of the world and the spiritual perfection of mankind..<br />\n<br />\nThis is not blind faith like is SINGLE MESSIAH, SINGLE HOLY BO RELIGIONS...<br />\n<br />\nIt is based on accurate reasoning, evidence and experience. Then only it can be lasting faith. Then only it can be perfect, unshakeable faith....<br />\n<br />\nSuperstitious beliefs, beliefs in mere religious traditions ( like AGAMA ) or social customs cannot help one in spiritual advancement......<br />\n<br />\nNo spiritual progress is possible without shraddha. ..From shraddha comes nistha or one-pointed devotion and from nistha comes self-realization. If the faith is flickering, it will die soon and the aspirant will be drifted aimlessly hither and thither...<br />\n<br />\nAncient maharishis talked about the quality of \u201cshraddha\u201d which is a positive energy that comes from within. ..<br />\n<br />\nShraddha should not be translated as a \u201csimple\u201d faith / trust, --it also conveys mental and intellectual firmness...<br />\n<br />\nSINGING BHAJANS LIKE ASSHOLES ( BHAKTI MOVEMENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD ) BEATING DHOLAKS AND SHAKING ASS , HAS NEVER BEEN PART OF HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nBHAJANS IN VERNACULAR ARE NOT MANTRAS IN SANSKRIT..<br />\n<br />\nIn the opening verses of the 17th chapter OF Bhagwad Gita , Krishna says that faith results from our most steadfast convictions.<br />\n<br />\nWhen our mind is pure, he says, we find faith in benevolence, having little attachment to what we ourselves can gain.<br />\n<br />\nAt such times, faith leads us to value yoga as a means for curtailing sorrow and suffering, and for directing our mind toward transcendental truths.<br />\n<br />\nYoga itself is an act of faith arising from the heart, and by having faith in the fundamental aims of yoga, \u201ca faithful person obtains knowledge.\u201d (Bhagawad Gita 4.39- 4000 BC)<br />\n<br />\nA Hindu free of BHAKTI dogma ( like in other single holy book religions ) is skeptical when this question of trust / faith arises because faith is always understood to be blind faith.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is more than mere faith. It also implies self\u2013reliance, an independent sense of right and wrong, reliance on conscience and the courage of one\u2019s own conviction<br />\n<br />\nSHRADDA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND SANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_158BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; A girl like goddess born to humans. 'There was none on earth to match her loveliness. Gods, anti-gods, and yakshas yearned for such celestial beauty.' (169:45-47, Adi Parva, Mahabharata)<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi\u2019s biological parents were Agni and Swaha . She was adopted by Drupad, King of Panchala, which is why her name was changed from Agni Jyotsna to Princess of Panchala to Drupad Kanya to Draupadi. The sages called her Yajna Seni as she was born from the sacrificial fire.<br />\n<br />\nShe was a fully grown woman, dressed in the best of sSilk, unusually rare jewelry. A dark complexioned maiden, so dark, that when her hair brushed over her face, the black raven like hair, looked golden brown, so dark was her complexion.<br />\n<br />\nVoluptuous with a slender waist. She had a naturally aromatic odor that could be sensed a \u2018yojana\u2019 away (a measurement for distance).<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi as Kundalini has five human chakras she has to cross before she finds refuge in the topmost Sahasrara chakra ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BASTARD WHITE INVADER MADE DRAUPADI A DAUGHTER (NALAYANI ) OF NALA AND DAMAYANTI IN HER PREVIOUS BIRTH .. WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF NALA AND DAMAYANTI TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nRAHU AND KETU WERE WOVEN INTO THE \"BHAKTI MOVEMENT \" BULLSHIT STORY .. ROTHSCHILD GOT THIS FAKE STORY ADAPTED INTO KERALA KATHAKALI..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE BASTARDS WROTE A BULLSHIT BOOK ON COOKERY ( PAKADARPANAM-- WITH BEEF ) AND TOLD THAT NALA , AN EXCELLENT COOK WROTE IT. ROTHSCHILD GOT THE CRYPTO JEW KARALA PRINCE RAVI VARMA TO PAINT NALA AND DAMAYANTI.<br />\n<br />\nTHE BHAKTi MOVEMENT AND ITS HEROES WERE CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.. Ambiguous and wrong translations, \"creative\" interpretations, hoax writings, fictional accounts, and the breaking of non-existent codes within his quatrains all contribute to a vast body of BULLSHIT work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of everything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium;\">\nCheetham's books were full of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains, with word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called them \"amazingly accurate predictions\".</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium;\">\nOccasionally she went out on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went with none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her books with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium;\">\nNEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. OUR COLEGIUM JUDICIARY CRIED \u201c FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION\u201d.<br /><br />BUT WITHIN A WEEK UC ANANTHAMURTHY HAD KIDNEY PROBLEMS AND TO DEFRAY THE EXPENSES OF EXPENSIVE DIALYSIS THE ITALIAN WAITRESS MADE HIM VC OF AN UNIVERSITY..<br /><br />OF COURSE UC ANATHAMURTHY WOULD NEVER PISS ON A STATUE OF JESUS / MARY OR THE HOLY KORAN TO BRAND THEM POWERLESS TO STRIKE BACK..<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ATHEIST RATIONALISTS MUST KNOW THAT SANATANA DHARMA HAS ZERO SUPERSTITION..</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span>THE DAY MODERN SCIENCE CAN TIDE UP AND BREACH THE LAST FRONTIER TO MEET SANATANA DHARMA AND SEE EYE TO EYE , THERE WILL BE PRALAYA ( COSMIC DISSOLUTION ) DUE TO STAGNATION..<br /><br />FOR EXAMPLE -- ALBERT EINSTEIN STOLE ALL HIS AWARD WINNING THEORIES FROM VEDANTA..<br /><br />EINSTEIN JUST PUT SOME MATH AND MADE SUBJECTIVE ANCIENT VEDANTA LOOK LIKE OBJECTIVE MODERN SCIENCE.. THE BEST PART IS THAT HE OUTSOURCED HIS MATH TO INDIA AND HE WAS POOR IN MATH..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</span><br /><br />VISHNU IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY ..AN ENERGY FIELD --JUST LIKE BRAHMA AND SHIVA ON A MACRO AND MICRO SCALE..<br /><br />A BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE FIRST TO REVEAL THIS.. THAT IS WHY HE IS THE NO 1 WRITER ON THE PLANET WITH PROFILE VIEW OF 739 MILLION...<br /><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</span><br /><br />THE WIVES OF THE TRINITY ARE ALSO COSMIC ALLEGORIES.<br /><br />FOR EXAMPLE THE WHITE MAN AND COMMIES WHO ARE INVITED FOR DROHI LITERARY FESTS RIDICULED THAT BRAHMA DID INCEST WITH HIS OWN DAUGHTER SARASWATI..<br /><br />IF YOU GOOGLE \u201c&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BRAHMA INCEST</span></b>&nbsp;\u201c YOU WILL GET 4.8 LAKH POSTS ..<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">SARASWATI ( WIFE OF BRAHMA ) IS THE MIGHTY QUASAR WHICH IS SEVERAL TRILLION TIMES MORE BRILLIANT THAN THE SUN....</span></b><br /><br />THE VEDAS WHICH WENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE IT WAS PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO REFERS TO SARASWATI..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</span><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SHIVA WIFE PARVATI ( DEVI/ BHAGAWATI/ DURGA / KALI ) IS A MIGHTY COSMIC ALLEGORY.. IN HER DESTRUCTIVE FORM SHE IS THE BLACK HOLE WHICH CAN DEVOUR ENTIRE GALAXIES IN SECONDS..</span></b><br /><br />LONG AGO WHEN MEAND MY WIFE CLIMBED UP KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN, MANY READERS ASKED ME WHY I DID THAT..<br /><br />WELL MY WIFE DID ORGONE ENERGY MAPPING..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/kudajadri-mountain-chitramoola-cave-adi.html</span><br /><br />IN THE POST ABOVE I WROTE ABOUT DEVI FOLLOWING ADI SHANKARACHARYA AND TELLING HIM NOT TO LOOK BACK.. NOW, DEVI ( WIFE OF SHIVA ) IS ENERGY.. SHE IS NOT A MORTAL WOMAN..<br /><br />THE SPOT ADI SHANKARACHARYA LOOKED BACK, DEVI DISAPPEARED AND HE CONSECRATED THE POWERFUL MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE THERE ..<br /><br />THOUGH THE TEMPLE IS IN KOLOOR KARNATAKA, ONLY MALAYALIS DEVOTEES GO THERE ..WE KNOW WHAT IT IS..<br /><br />THERE ARE UNDERGROUND WATER CHANNELS FROM THE TOP OF KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN TO THE INNER SANCTUM OF MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE..<br /><br />DURING THESE RECENT FLOODS THE TEMPLE WAS PARTIALLY SUBERGED..<br /><br />SAME IN GIZA PYRAMIDS.. I HAD WRITTEN ABOUT THE APEX OF THE PYRAMID EMITTING A BLUE PLASMA GLOW WHICH COULD BE SEEN FOR THOUSANDS OF MILES IN ANCIENT TIMES .. THERE ARE WATER CHANNELS FROM THE RIVER NILE UNDER THE PYRAMIDS..<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_34BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_32B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1950966935418826789\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_32M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. ( GEOMETRY OF OM -108), ULAM SPIRAL, LUCAS NUMBERS, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC -- EMBEDDED IN IT.&nbsp;</span></b><br /><br />THIS IS WHY WE SAY VEDAS WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AKASHA BY MAHARISHIS , AND THERE IS NO MORTAL AUTHOR..<br /><br />BY RECITING VEDIC SRUTI EVERY HUMAN CONDITION OR COSMIC CONDITION COULD BE ADDRESSED AND RESOLVED INSTANTLY ..<br /><br />SANATANA DHARMA IS BASED ON THE SCALAR LONGITUDINAL WAVE WHICH TRAVELS FASTER THAN LIGHT..<br /><br />MY WIFE INTEGRATES ISOTOPE MAGIC ( SRUTI VERSES REDUCED TO DIGITS ) INTO HER DISTANT REIKI\u2014TACHYON ENERGY FASTER THAN LIGHT ..<br /><br />MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.20 %</span></b><br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_32BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_32B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_33B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2392855216779193670\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_33M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
